In the Ferrara orchards area, investigations have been carried on the bearing pattern of pear trees on quince. Observations have been made on 22 varieties at three different ages (3-4 years; 5-7 years; 8-10 years old). Generally speaking, from the beginning till the full bearing a great change occurs in the type and in the amount of the fruiting shoots and branches: with the aging of trees, spurs are prevailing. At the beginning, the bearing shoots are mainly inserted on two-years old branches, while in the older trees the fruiting wood is prevailingly  brought  by the three or more old branches. Great differences exist amoung the varieties in relation to their bearing pattern, as it is emphasized in the  appendix . Some practical suggestions are then supplied on the pruning methods to be applied to the different varieties, in relation to their typical behaviour.

A tal fine sono stati posti allo studio, in confronto con un testimone sarchiato e rincalzato secondo la tecnica tradizionale, nove differenti formulati  Amiben, Alanap 3, Aretit, Gesaprim, Premerge, Tenoran, Weedazin, Alipur e Gesagard  applicati in pre-emergenza allo scopo di eliminare, in tal modo, la prima sarchiatura-scerbatura. Nelle parcelle diserbate chimicamente  stata pertanto eseguita una sola rincalzatura a 30-40 giorni dalla emergenza, con la quale  stato interrato anche l'azoto in copertura.  emerso, in particolare, che l'azione diserbante  influenzata dalla composizione della flora spontanea e dalla entit delle precipitazioni nel periodo immediatamente successivo al trattamento. I risultati offerti da Amiben, Aretit, Premerge e Tenoran lasciano tuttavia intravedere che con l'impiego di questi prodotti si pu eliminare la sarchiatura-scerbatura. Modesta selettivit hanno manifestato invece Gesoeprim, Alanap 3 e Weedazin. Weedazin, Alipur, and Gesagard; they have been applied before growth, with the view of so eliminating the first weeding-eradication. In plots which have been chemically freed of weeds, an earth-up only has been applied at 30-40 days from the growth at which the azote has also been earthed. The results given by Amiben, Aretit, Premerge and Tenoran show that by the use of these products we can eliminate weeding and weed-eradication. On the contrary Gesaprim, Alanap 3, and Weedazin have shown poor selectivity.
42874922|Gli Autori hanno condotto una serie di prove allo scopo di esaminare gli effetti esercitati sugli organi fiorali, sulla allegagione e, infine, sulla fruttificazione di tre specie da frutto (albicocco, pero e melo) da parte di alcuni fra i pi comuni fitofarmaci impiegati durante I'antesi. Sull'albicocco sono stati usati Ziram 80 allo 0,20% e TMTD allo 0,15%, mentre sul pero e sul melo sono stati impiegati Ziram 80 allo 0,20%, Zineb 80 allo 0,20% e Dodina 65 allo 0,10%. I risultati conseguiti hanno messo in evidenza che i danni variano in rapporto alla specie, al prodotto impiegato ed alle condizioni in cui avviene l'impollinazione. Nelle prove di laboratorio e di impollinazione controllata  emerso quanto segue: a) nell'albicocco i trattamenti eseguiti con Ziram, e in particolare con TMTD, hanno esercitato un influenza negativa sulla vitalit del polline ed hanno ridotto l'allegagione in varia misura; b) nel pero i trattamenti a base di Ziram e Dodina hanno diminuito la vitalit del polline e l'allegagione, mentre quelli a base di Zineb non hanno determinato alcun danno; c) nel melo i trattamenti con Zineb e Dodina hanno ridotto la germinabilit del polline e l'allegagione, mentre quelli con Ziram sono risultati dannosi solo quando erano stati praticati sui fiori in piena antesi. Nelle prove di impollinazione naturale e in quelle relative agli effetti sulla produzione non si sono per riscontrate differenze, su tutte e tre le specie fruttifere considerate, tra le piante trattate o meno. The Autors have carried out some researches in view to ascertain the effects of some of the most usual pesticides applied during the flowering, on the flower organs, the fruit set and the yield of apricot, pear and apple trees. The results have shown that injuries change according to the fruit species, the kind of pesticide applied, and the environmental conditions under which the pollination occurs. The laboratory tests and the pollinations trials have put in evidence that: a) in the apricot tree Ziram and, specially, TMTD exert a negative influence on the pollen viability and reduce the fruit set; b) in the pear tree Ziram and Dodina reduce the pollen viability and the fruit set, while Zineb does not produce any injury; c) in the apple tree Zineb and Dodina reduce the pollen germination and the fruit set, while Ziram results noxious only when applied at the full bloom. The pollination trials and the investigations concerning the treatements effects on the yield have not shown differences, in all the three fruit species, among the treated and untreated trees.

42874925|In questa nota l'Autore riporta i risultati di alcune ricerche preliminari sulla biologia fiorale degli agrumi, con particolare riferimento all'arancio (" Biondo comune ", " Moro ", " Sanguinello ", " Sanguinello moscato ", " Tarocco "), al mandarino (" Avana ") e al clementine (" Monreal "). Le osservazioni sulla fioritura hanno mostrato che non esiste alcuna correlazione fra periodo di fioritura ed epoca di maturazione dei frutti. Le prove di germinabilit del polline hanno messo in evidenza che le cultivar a frutti apireni (" Tarocco ", " Moro ") possiedono polline scarsamente vitale nei confronti di quelle a frutti non apireni (" Biondo comune ", " Avana ", etc.); il miglior substrato di germinazione si  rivelato quello costituito da soluzione acquosa di saccarosio al 20%. Dalle prove di impollinazione artificiale  emerso che le cultivar " Moro " e " Tarocco " sono " autoincompatibili "; il " Tarocco " tuttavia possiede una notevole capacit a fruttificare per via partenocarpica. Tutte le altre cultivar esaminate sono risultate  autocompatibili , ma si avvantaggiano dell'impollinazione incrociata. In this paper the Author refers about some preliminary researches on the citrus floral biology, with reference to orange (" Biondo comune ", " Moro ", " Sanguinello ", " Sanguinello moscato ", " Tarocco "), mandarin (" Avana ") and clementine (" Monreal "). Observations on flowering showed that there is no correlation between flowering time and ripening. Pollen germination trials have evidenced that in the seedless varieties (" Tarocco ", " Moro ") pollen is less viable than in seedy varieties (" Biondo comune ", " Avana ", etc.); the best germination was found in 20% sucrose solution. Pollination tests showed that " Moro " and " Tarocco " are self-sterile; however " Tarocco " is able to set adequate quantities of parthenocarpic fruits. All above mentioned varieties are proved to be self-fertile, although crosspollination increases fruit-set.

42874594|The A. discusses the trials of reciprocal grafting of cylinders of bark between plants of high rooting ability and plants with low rooting ability, carried out by MES on Citrus medica and Citrus aurantium and by Scaramuzzi on a rootstock clone of quince and on a pear and a quince variety. After the bark pieces had heald in place, the stems were made into cuttings: the rooting behaviour of the grafted bark pieces was just as it was on intact, nongrafted cuttings. Instead in analogous trials carried out on P. marianna, Mirobalan B and Belgium mirobalan, the rooting ability proper to the plants had not been influenced by the cylinder of bark of other plants of different rooting ability, grafted on them. It is to be concluded that the different results in the experiments carried out by Mes and Scaramuzzi is due to the presence of preformed root primordia in the rings of bark at the time of grafting.
42874597|In the years 1964 and 1965 apple trees of Abbondanza were sprayed with SEVIN 50% at the rate of 2000 and 4000 p.p.m., with NAA at 10 and 20 p.p.m. ( 100 cc/q of Tween 20) and NAD at 40 and 80 p.p.m. (+ 100 cc/q of Tween 20). The results were:  All the treatments resulted, in the 2 years, in a reduction in the number of small fruits (<18).  The application with NAA at 20 p.p.m. had, on the fruit size and weight, a similar effect to that of hand thinning (150 fruitlets/100 blossom clusters), but the vegetation was damaged lightly.  The thinning effect of NAA in concentration of 10 p.p.m. was similar to that of hand thinning (200 fruitlets/100 blossom clusters).  The application with Sevin 50% at 4000 p.p.m. had a satisfactory result, which was similar to that of hand thinning (250 fruitlets/100 blossom clusters) on fruit size and weight. Recommendations are made by the Authors for Sevin 50% in concentration of 4000 p.p.m. for its easy use and for its no phythotoxicity.

42874630|The Authors relate about the results of their investigations concerning the genetical behaviour of some characters of the strawberry flowers and fruits, on the basis of the obsevations performed on eighteen F progenies. The main conclusions are: a) the flowering and the ripening times of the F seedlings resulted prevailingly influenced by the phenological pattern of the mother varieties; b) the fruit size and shape and the flesh colour followed an intermediate inheritance, without any apparent connection with the parent behaviour; c) the F pattern of the achenes deepness resulted different from progeny to progeny; d) the sex inheritance has agreed with a Mendelian scheme, the crosses between female and hermaphrodite varieties having rised 50% hermaphrodite seedlings; e) the genetical behaviour of the core type and of the flower size has been prevailingly influenced by the environment conditions. On the basis of such results the Authors conclude with some observations about the strawberry breeding programs.
42874631|The effects of tris-(2-diethylamminoethyl)-phosphate trihydrochloride (SK&F 7997-A) and tris-(2-dimethylamminoethyl)-phosphate trihydrochloride (SK&F 7732-A) on the flowering in the tomato (cv. Michigan-Ohio Hybrid) were investigated. First anthesis was delayed by single application of both the chemicals at 5 mg/ml concentration. The number of nodes subtending the first inflorescence were increased with either compounds. Increase in node number was the function of increase in concentration and duration of the treatment. Effectiveness of SK&F 7997-A increased with the increase in number of applications. Tomato seedlings were most sensitive to the inhibitor treatment during 8 to 12 days following cotyledon expansion in August and from 12 to 14 days in November. The inhibitors ofsteroid biosynthesis had no effects on vegetative growth and number of flowers in the first and the second inflorescences. Number of nodes between the first and the second inflorescences remained unaltered by the inhibitor treatments.

42874633|La quantit di Co presente come impurit nei concimi utilizzati normalmente per formare soluzioni nutritive tende ad aumentare il tasso di cobalto nelle piante di Solarium Lycopersicum L. allevate in coltura idroponica. Concentrazioni di cobalto nelle soluzioni inferiori a 1,5  10 M non si sono mostrate tossiche per le piante, mentre concentrazioni superiori determinano turbe fisiologiche ed anatomiche nelle diverse parti. L'assorbimento del cobalto da parte della pianta  molto rapido ma le alterazioni compaiono dopo un periodo variabile, influenzate dalle condizioni ambientali. La luce sembra influire sull'assorbimento del cobalto da parte della pianta. Il cobalto si accumula in quantit diversa da specie a specie e nella stessa specie da organo a organo. Diviene tossico quando supera la concentrazione, nei tessuti, di 2 mg % di s.s. Se la concentrazione non  superiore a quella tossica si ha nei frutti di Solanum Lycopersicum L. un aumento del tasso di cobalto che pu superare 30 volte la normale. Alcuni accorgimenti possono essere presi per evitare l'eccessiva concentrazione di cobalto e i danni alle colture. The quantity of Co present as impurity in the manures, normally utilized for forming nutritive solutions, tends to increase the rate of Co in the plants of Solarium Lycopersicum E, raised in hydroponix cultures. Concentrations of Co in the solutions inferior to 1,5x10 M are not shown to be toxic for the plants, while superior concentrations determine physiological and anatomical disturbances in the various parts. The Co is absorbed from the part of the plant very rapidly, but the alterations appear after a variable period, influenced by the surrounding conditions. The light seems to act upon the absorption of the Co. The Co is accumulated in a different quantity from one species to another. It becomes toxic when the concentration in the tissues exceeds 2 mg percent of dry weight. Normally it the concentration is not more than the toxic level, it has in its fruits of Solarium Lycopersicum L. an increase of the rate of Co that can exceed thirty times its normal level. Some devices can be used to avoid the excessive concentration in the solution of Co and, at the same time, the damages to the cultures.

42874643|Observations carried out during the winter 1962-63 in several orchards of the Ferrara country, have proved that the cold hardiness of the Apple ("Stark Delicious") and the Pear ("Passa Crassana") is directly related to the time of pruning. Indeed, with pruning in the beginning of december, the cold injuries ("trunk splitting") were very evident on the trunks of all the pruned trees; they did'nt appear on the trunks of the unpruned apple trees and were less evident on those of the unpruned pear trees. In the case of the Peach ("J. H. Hale") the early winter pruning did'nt influence the cold hardiness of the flower buds. The Author believes that this different behaviour of the peach tree might be related to its more active metabolism which could extablish some more complete self-defensive mechanism to the cold. Instead, for the apple and the pear trees, the extablishment of this mechanism could be delayed or hindered as a result of an early winter pruning.

L'efficienza del processo fotosintetico  aumentata per la cv. "da taglio" sino a 10 volte circa rispetto al testimone, con il 70% di ombreggiamento. I consumi di acqua, nella prova in vaso, sono diminuiti con l'ombreggiamento sino al 75% rispetto al testimone nelle tesi di massimo ombreggiamento. A research about the effects of shading on lettuce (Lactuca Sativa L.) was carried out in 1966. This research was divided in three separate experiments: I) with lettuce, cv. "a cappuccio "in pots; II) with lettuce, cv. "da taglio "in field; III) test of germination of seedling, with natural shading of corn plants, in field. In experiment I) and II) the reduction of daylight was of 0, 30, 50 and 70%, respectively. The results showed a gain of yield in dry and fresh matter with shading. The maximum yield was reached at 50% of reduction of daylight. The photosyntetic efficiency increased with maximum shading (70% reduction of daylight), till 10 times, in comparison with test not shaded. The water compsumption in pots experiment was reduced at 75% with 70% of shading. The germination of seeds increased significatively with natural shading, too.
42874660|Gli AA. riferiscono sulle ricerche compiute sul sistema radicale del Pero innestato su cotogno, nell'ambiente dell'Agro Romano. Le indagini sono state effettuate su 6 piante di peri della cv. Abate Ftel di 10 anni di et allevate a palmetta piantate in terreno poco profondo con sottosuolo impermeabile. Gli AA. hanno messo in evidenza, tra l'altro: a) le radici assorbenti sono distribuite prevalentemente a partire da 25-30 centimetri dal tronco e per una profondit di 25-50 centimetri; b) esse si sono sviluppate pi nell'interfilarc che sul filare, ove lo sviluppo veniva ad essere limitato per competizione nutritiva a causa della breve distanza tra le piante; c) lo sviluppo delle radici  stato maggiore in un interfilarc che nell'altro, a causa del diverso vigore delle piante dei due filari contigui a quello in esame; d) non si  riscontrata correlazione tra l'orientamento della parte aerea e quella radicale, ma sembra confermato che questa trovi migliori possibilit di sviluppo ove esistono migliori condizioni di abitabilit; e) le radici sviluppatesi a meno di 20 centimetri di profondit sono risultate lese durante le lavorazioni eseguite al terreno. In considerazione di queste osservazioni gli AA. suggeriscono, di eseguire lavori di drenaggio al terreno prima dell'impianto che assicurino il perfetto sgrondo delle acque, che le lavorazioni al terreno non superino mai i 12-15 centimetri di profondit; raccomandano inoltre, al fine di avere un omogeneo sviluppo delle radici nei peri allevati a palmetta e innestati su cotogno, il seguente sesto d'impianto: m 3,30-3,50 tra la fila e m 2,50 sulla fila. Solo per variet poco vigorose si pu scendere a sesti d'impianto inferiori. Records on the root sistem of pear on quince rootstock in the area near Rome are referred. Six plants ten years old of the cv. "Abate Ftel "trained as palmette were observed. They were grown in a not deep soil with a waterproof subsoil. The AA. point out: 1) Absorbing roots prevail at 25-30 cm. from the trunk 25-50 cm. depth. 2) Absorbing roots are more developed between the rows than in the direction of the row. Nutritional competition is the limitating factor caused from too closed spacing between the plants. 3) Roots were more developed in one of the two sides of the row because plants in the two next rows were of different vigour. 4) No correlation was found between development of scaffolds and roots, but the development of root sistem was favoured from better soil conditions. 5) Damages from mechanical cultivation were found in the roots growing at a depth of less than 20 cm. On the basis of the observations they have made the AA. reccommend: 1) To take care of a good drainage of the soil before planting. 2) Mechanical cultivation, to avoid damages to root sistem, has to attempt the maximum depth of 12-15 cm. 3) Particular care is needed on the distance between the trees to have the best root development and to avoid competition. The AA. recommend : the distance of m. 3,30-3,50 between the rows and m. 2,50 between the trees in the sense of the row. Only with poor growing varieties distances could be reduced.

42874668|Osservazioni effettuate al termine della stagione vegetativa su rami di pero (cv. "Precoce d'Altedo "), che erano stati amputati alla fine di giugno e quindi trattati con acqua distillata, e con soluzioni di acido betaindolilacetico alle concentrazioni di 0,01; 0,1; 1; 25; 50; 100; 200; 400 e 1.000 ppm hanno messo in evidenza quanto segue: a) nei rami di controllo non trattati non si  formato callo di cicatrizzazione. Al di sotto della superficie lesa dal taglio i tessuti viveriti sono degenerati per un tratto pi o meno profondo e sono stati separati da quelli sani da tessuto suberoso. b) l'acqua distillata ha favorito la cicatrizzazione delle ferite stimolando, seppure in misura limitata, la produzione di callo cicatriziale; c) i trattamenti con acido beta-indolilacetico hanno stimolato la formazione di callo cicatriziale in proporzione crescente fino alla dose di 50-200 ppm, oltre la quale la cicatrizzazione  risultata nuovamente rallentata in misura proporzionale alla concentrazione; d) nelle tesi trattate con acido beta-indolilacetico alle concentrazioni di 25; 50; 100; 200 ppm parte dei rami  risultata con la superficie del taglio completamente ricoperta da callo cicatriziale, nell'interno del quale  stata accertata la presenza di un cambiforme esteso dal cambio cribrolegnoso fino al margine del cercine di cicatrizzazione. Shoots of the pear variety "Precoce d'Altedo "cut at the end of June have been treated with the same amount of beta-indolilacetic acid aqueous solutions ranging from 0 to 1.000 p.p.m. (i.e. 0.00; 0.01; 0.1; 1; 25; 50; 100; 400; 1,000 p.p.m.) An untreated group of shoots has been left as control. Observations carried out at the end of the growing season have shown that: a) the untreated shoots didn't produce any wound callus: beneath the cut surface tissues of wood and bark were altered and dead more or less deeply; in the bark they were separated from the sound ones by korky layers; b) the application of distilled water to the cut surfaces improved the wound healing and sometimes stimulated wound callus growth, probably by preventing the callus cells from drying; c) the application of aqueous solutions of beta-indolilacetic acid greatly affected the wound healing: the stimulating effect of I.A.A. on callus growth increased with rising concentrations and reached the optimum rate at 50-200 p.p.m. level; higher concentrations of I.A.A. caused the callus growth to fall, probably because of a toxic action on the living cells beneath the cut surface; d) the initiation of a cambium has been detected in the callus tissues completely covering the wound surfaces in the shoots treated with I.A.A.
42874669|Su due variet di pomodoro da mensa, "Marmande" e "Nunhem's Tuckqueen", nell'annata 1964-65  stata studiata l'influenza dei trattamenti ai fiori con tre prodotti a base di fitoregolatori (Apiren, Hormo 7 e Tomatotone), somministrati in quattro concentrazioni diverse. Particolare importanza  da attribuire ai risultati relativi alla produzione complessiva la cui entit  rimasta decurtata soprattutto a causa di un minor numero di fiori e di frutti sui grappoli superiori al primo. L'azione di Apiren e Tomatotone  risultata costantemente pi marcata di quella di Hormo 7. La precocit commerciale  espressa dalla quantit di prodotto maturato nelle prime due raccolte   risultata favorevolmente influenzata. I frutti da fiori trattati hanno presentato un aumento dei diametri longitudinale e trasversale, un pi elevato numero di logge e riduzione del peso specifico. In the year 1964-65, the influence of treatments with three phytoregulating chemicals (Apiren, Hormo 7 and Tomatotone) sprayed on flowers at four different concentrations, was studied in the two varieties of table-tomato  Marmande  and  Nunhem's Tuckqueen . The total production was reduced especially in consequence of a lower number of flowers and fruits on the clusters above the first. The influence of Apiren and Tomatotone always resulted as more evident than that of Hormo 7. The amount of yield ripened up to the second harvesting  commercial precocity  was seen to be favourably affected. The fruits from treated flowers showed an increase in longitudinal and transversal diameters and in the number of cells, and a decrease in specific weight.
42874670|Si riferiscono i risultati di alcune prove di conservazione di garofani "Sim" in A.C. usando cabine a refrigerazione indiretta a temperatura di 0 C e umidit 90%. L'esito della conservazione  stato valutato rilevando le variazioni ponderali, la traspirazione e la durata dei garofani post-conservazione. Le estrazioni sono state effettuate ogni 15 giorni fino a 2 mesi dall'inizio delle prove. La prima prova che doveva mettere in evidenza l'influenza dell'O ha mostrato che i migliori risultati si ottengono a bassi tenori di ossigeno: 3 e 8% fino ad 1 mese di conservazione, 3% dopo 1 mese. Nella seconda prova  stato messo in evidenza che livelli troppo bassi di CO 0-1% non sono favorevoli, buoni risultati si sono ottenuti a livelli del 5-20%,  stato inoltre confermato l'esito di bassi livelli di O (1%). Le formule pi indicate per la lunga conservazione dei garofani sono risultate: 5% CO - 1% O, 5% CO - 3% O, 20% CO - 3% O. Results are reported on the possibility to prolong the life of cut flowers (carnation "Sim"). The experiments have been carried out in a refrigerator at 0 C 90% of umidity in controlled atmosphere. Sampling every fifteen days have been taken for two months changin in fresh weght, transpiration and deterioration have been considered. The first experiment pointed out thet the low level of oxigen gave the best result, 3 and 8% during the first month 3% afterword. The second experiment suggested that 5-20% CO levels were recommended while 0-1% CO were too low. The low O level (1%) was also confirmed. The best combinations of O and CO gas mixtures to be used in the refrigerator chamber were: 1%-5%; 3%-5%; 3%-20%.
42874671|Il metodo della  goccia pendente  nella germinazione del polline di Nocciuolo, non da risultati attendibili come invece nelle specie comuni da frutto. Le percentuali di granuli pollinici germinati a carico delle diverse cultivar di Corylus non esprimono la reale vitalit del polline. La individuazione della migliore tecnica che consenta al polline di germinare,  stata oggetto della presente ricerca. Dai risultati  emerso che germinazioni regolari di polline, si hanno quando i granuli non sono inglobati dal substrato, ma solo appoggiati, in un ambiente con giusto grado di umidit. La tecnica consiste nel distribuire su di un coprioggetto, uno strato sottile della soluzione di saccarosio al 20% e gelatina all'1%, da lasciare asciugare all'aria. Sul substrato si esegue la semina e il coprioggetto viene fissato, con vasellina, alla Van Thiegem nel cui interno si pone circa 1/10 di cc di acqua. Alla temperatura di 20 C circa, dopo 24 ore, si ottengono germinazioni regolari e abbondanti. The method of the  leaning drop  in the pollen germination of Filbert, does not offer any results worthy of attention, like in the ordinary fruit trees. The percentages of germinate pollen grains of the several Corylus cultivar do not indicate the true vitality of pollen. The research of the best technique which allows the pollen germination, has been the object of this paper. It has emerged, from results that regular pollen germinations occur when the grains are not enclosed by the substrate, but they are only supported, in the weather with a right amount of humidity. The technique consists in the portioning up on a cover glass, a thin layer of the solution of the sugar up to 20% and the gelatine up to 1%, which must be left to dry in the air. One must execute the sowing on the substrate, and the cover glass is fixed, with vaseline, to the Van Thiegem cell, in the inward of which one must put about 1/10 of cc. of water. At the temperature of about 20C after 24 hours, one can obtain regular and abundant germinations.
42874672|By the observation trench method investigations were made on root growth of a newly planted filbert tree, grown under optimal conditions of soil moisture. Soil temperatures have been recorded at the depth of 20, 40 and 60 cm. by a geothermograph. Results have shown that roots growth continues during the whole year. The rate of growth varies during the season, according the following 5 periods: 1) slowincrease during the early spring-beginning of summer; 2) decrease during the hot summer-months; 3) fast increase at the end of summer-beginning of fall; 4) speed decrease during the fall-beginning of winter and 5) low growth rate during the winther months. Such different rates of growth can be explained by considering both the soil temperature and the vegetative activity of the top.

42874680|Piantine di pesco sono state consociate a pesco, albicocco, pomodoro e medica, in coltura idroponica. Parallelamente il pesco  stato allevato a contatto di substrati (perlite) contenenti residui della germinazione delle altre specie sopra elencate (ad eccezione dell'albicocco). Inoltre, piantine di pesco sono state allevate a contatto di substrati (perlite) contenenti estratti di radici di pesco, melo e susino o estratti di rami e di foglie di pesco. Infine,  stato seguito anche lo sviluppo del ciliegio e del pero su substrati contenenti estratti di pesco. Le influenze pi negative sullo sviluppo del pesco sono state provocate dalle due specie erbacee saggiate (pomodoro e medica), sia in consociazione, sia semplicemente attraverso residui nel substrato di coltura. Influenze negative sul pesco sono state provocate dallo stesso pesco, in misura minore dal melo, ancora meno dall'albicocco e solo in misura molto piccola dal susino. Inoltre il pesco ha ostacolato lo sviluppo del ciliegio e, in minor misura, del pero.  stata messa in evidenza una notevole azione negativa esercitata sullo sviluppo del pesco anche dagli estratti acquosi di foglie e di rami, prospettando alcune considerazioni pratiche in rapporto agli attuali indirizzi della meccanizzazione della potatura, tendenti a lasciare in posto il materiale asportato dalle piante. Nel complesso, i risultati mettono in dubbio che le manifestazioni osservate possano essere ricondotte semplicemente a competizioni tronche tra le piante. L'impiego di substrati con livelli nutrizionali ottimali, la mancanza di qualsiasi rapporto fra diminuzione dello sviluppo del pesco e accrescimento delle piante di varie specie ad esso consociate, l'azione ugualmente negativa esercitata da alcune specie nel breve corso della germinazione dei propri semi, l'analoga azione di semplici estratti acquosi di organi diversi, hanno portato a concludere che, nelle condizioni delle prove, la riduzione rilevata nello sviluppo delle piante sia da attribuirsi soprattutto alla presenza di prodotti tossici. L'attivit di queste sostanze, si eserciterebbe non solo su piante della stessa specie dalla quale derivano, ma, talvolta, anche su specie diverse. Si prospettano quindi alcune considerazioni pratiche nei riguardi dei rapporti antagonistici tra colture consociate nonch dei problemi relativi alle successioni colturali ed in particolare ai reimpianti. Peach seedlings were associated with peach, apricot, tomato and alfalfa, in hydroponic culture. In the same way peach was grown in perlite substrata containing germination residues of the other species above cited (with exception of apricot). Besides peach seedlings were grown in perlite substrata containing water extracts of peach, apple and plum roots and also water extracts of stems and peach leaves. Finally peach, cherry and pear seedlings were cultured in substrata containing water extracts of peach leaves. The highest inhibition of peach growth was given by the two species, tomato and alfalfa, tested either in associated culture or simply by their residues. Poor peach growth was also due to the peach extract itself and more weakly to apple and apricot extracts and still less to plum extract. Besides, peach extract inhibited cherry growth and also, in a small way, pear growth. It was shown a remarkable negative action on peach growth also from water extracts of leaves or stems. The AA. give some practical suggestions on damages of mechanical pruning residues into the ground. In the whole, results fail to show that differences of fertility status may cause the growth differences thus observed. The AA. therefore conclude that in trial conditions, toxin products obtained from peach or other species caused poor growth in peach and in other species.

42874682|Investigations have been carried out on the winter cold-sensitivity of ten pear varieties directly worked on quince-trees and doubleworked on eleven intermediates. The death percentage of the flower-buds has been assumed as the cold-sensitivity index of the worked varieties. While doubleworking seems to increase the cold sensitivity of the trees, no general conclusion is available in relation to the effects of the different intermediates, the same of which being able to relatively increase or decrease the winter frost sensitivity of the different varieties worked on it.
42874683|Observations have been carried out, during the spring 1967, on the winter frost damages of four years old trees grown in the experimental field of Cadriano (Bologna) with different training systems. The results have shown that: 1) The percentage of death of the flower-buds is higher on the low trees (i.e. Lepage system) than on the tall trees (i.e. palmetta 2) The bark-splits of the trunks are greater on the "Passacrassana "trees provided with a long stem (i.e. pyramide) than on the trees provided with a short stem (i.e. Bouch Thomas); they are also more frequent on the trees with an everywhere expansed crown (i.e. Spindelbusch) rather than on the edge trees (i.e. palmetta). On the whole, the young trees trained with the palmetta system have shown the highest resistance to the winter injuries.
42874684|Pairs of branches grown up out of adjacent buds, of which the higher situated one was bent during the winter pruning, were compared. The number of developed branches, their length as well as the number and the surface of the leaves were determined. There were determined also the weight of a surface unit of fresh leaves, the percentage of the dry weight of the leaves, the concentration of the cell sap, the transpiration, the water hold-up ability, the intensity of respiration, the activity of catalase, the nitrogen content, the quality of chlorophyll  a  and  b , some carotenoids and the intensity of photosynthesis. It was established that the bent branches and their internodes remained shorter and decrease of the average and total surface of their leaves was observed. The dry weight and the concentration of the cell sap of the leaves increased  the draining of the assimilation products was supposed to be hampered. The leaves of the bent branches transpired more intensively and the water hold-up ability was higher, when the influx of water was cut off.

42874687|Sono descritti alcuni casi di clorosi e necrosi fogliari del Garofano dovuti a cause non parassitane. Un primo caso si manifesta con punteggiature clorotiche che, nelle circostanze pi gravi, diventano necrotiche causando un deturpamento delle foglie. Anatomicamente si rileva la presenza di un gruppo di cellule ipertrofiche costituenti una tipica intumescenza. Un secondo caso si presenta con strie clorotiche parallele alle nervature, che gradatamente diventano necrotiche e determinano un parziale disseccamento delle foglie. Anatomicamente si rileva una plasmolisi ed un successivo coartamento di gruppi di cellule del mesofllo. Questa avversit, che compare prevalentemente in maggio-giugno sui primi steli di garofani destinati alla fioritura estiva, pu ritenersi causata da una mancanza di rifornimento idrico negli organi che ne sono interessati. Some cases of chlorosis and necrosis of Carnation leaves, not due to parasitical causes, are described. A first case appears with chlorotic spots that, in the most severe circumstances, become necrotic and cause a damage to the leaves. Anatomically a group of hypertrophic cells is found, that constitutes a typical intumescence. A second case appears with chlorotic. streaks, parallel to the veins, that gradually become necrotic and cause a partial wilt of the leaves. Anatomically a plasmolysis and a successive contraction of the cells of the mesophyl is found. This disease appears only in May-June on the first flower-stems of the carnations that are destined for summer flowering; the disease seems caused by deficiency of water supply in the stems interested by this case.

42874695|L'Autore riferisce di alcune ricerche, condotte in Sardegna, sull'impiego dell'Idrazide Maleica in limoni non rifiorenti appartenenti alla cv. " Interdonato ". Dopo aver controllato la reazione degli alberi in seguito a trattamenti effettuati a diverse concentrazioni e con irrorazioni singole o ripetute, l'Autore perviene alla conclusione che l'HM ritarda l'emissione dei germogli, limita l'allungamento degli stessi, induce alterazioni diverse nelle foglie di nuova formazione, ritarda la fioritura, influenza negativamente le caratteristiche morfo-qualitative dei frutti e favorisce l'allegagione. L'impiego dell'HM, dunque, pur provocando gli inconvenienti messi in evidenza, consente di prolungare il periodo di quiescenza dell'albero conferendogli, perci, maggiore resistenza alle gelate tardive. The Author refers on some researches, carried out in Sardinia, on the use of  Maleic Hydrazide  in not blooming lemon trees of the  Interdonato  cultivar. The Author, having checked the trees reaction to treatments made at different levels and with single or repeated spraying, comes to the conclusion that M H delays the spring shooting, limits their growth, causes various changes in the new leaves, delays the flowering, acts negatively on the fruits morpho-qualitative characteristics and promotes the setting. Then the use of MH, although causing the disadvantages showed, allows to prolonged the tree dormancy making it therefore, more resistant to late frost.
42874696|Giovani semenzali di pesco allevati su substrati artificiali (soluzione idroponica o perlite arricchita di sali minerali) hanno manifestato sintomi di sofferenza (comunemente riferiti a  stanchezza del terreno ) quando al substrato  stato aggiunto un estratto di radici di pesco stesso.  stata studiata inoltre l'influenza di ripetuti trapianti alterni da un substrato all'altro. I semenzali trasferiti da un substrato  stanco  ad uno  sano  hanno mostrato fenomeni di ripresa, rivelando cos una stretta relazione tra malattia e terreno. Il passaggio invece da un substrato  sano  ad uno  stanco   sempre stato seguito da un arresto transitorio dell'assorbimento radicale (con appassimento delle piante) e da turbe dello sviluppo delle radici (con formazione di caratteristiche  radici arricciate  e di  radici esploranti ). Le prove hanno consentito di mettere in evidenza come anche le piante che rimangono su substrati  stanchi  possono manifestare un particolare adattamento ed una ripresa vegetativa soddisfacente, dopo aver superato danni pi o meno gravi nella fase critica iniziale. Peach seedlings grown in artificial media (hydroponic culture or perlite added by nutrients) showed symptoms of sickness (similar to those involved with  peach replant problems ) when peach root extract was added to the nutrient solution. It was also studied the influence of several replants from one to another media. Peach seedlings transferred from a  sick  substratum to a  wealthy  one showed a quick recovering, proving a close relation between disease and soil. On the contrary the transfer from a control ( wealthy ) media to a  sick  one was always followed by an arrest of water absorption (with plants wilting) and by injuries in root development (with formation of  curled roots  and  exploring roots ). The trials pointed out that the plants wich remain on the  sick  media can show a particular adaptation and give a good new growth after having overcomed the injuries of a first critical phase.

La radicazione di pi cultivar ha fornito indicazioni che quasi tutte rispondono bene alla emissione di radici, occorre per provarle durante il periodo pi favorevole. Le ricerche microscopiche sull'origine delle radici hanno fatto rilevare che gli abbozzi radicali derivano dalla proliferazione di cellule appartenenti al cambio o poste in vicinanza di esso. To define the most favourable time of the year as regards to the rooting of the semihardwood cuttings of filbert, periodical trials have been carried out which have indicated that between the 25th of May and the 8th of June, in our climate, the best environments for a good rooting take place. To overcome the period of hardening, the rooted cuttings have been placed on environment with a high moisture, without an excessive water which could sature the substrate. The rooting of more cultivars has furnished some indications the majority of them, answer the emission of the roots well, but it is necessary, to try them during the most favourabler period. The microscopic researches on the source of the roots have remarked that radical initials derive from the prolification of the cells belonging to the cambium or placed in the proximity of it.

42874699|Researches have been carried out on walnut (cv. "Di Sorrento") in order to evaluate the pollen bearing ability and the pollen conveyance by air flow. The pollen production has been evaluated with the aid of a hematocymeter, according to Oberle and Goertzen (1952). The distance reached by the pollen grains have been determined with the aid of glass slides, spread with silicone, and put during the blooming period at increasing distances from the walnut trees (0; 5; 10; 20; 40; 80; 160 meters). Observations on pollen trasport have been carried out also with an electric aspirator provided with a glass slide inside. The results have shown that: a) walnut trees produce a rather high amount of pollen (about 900 grains per anther, that is about 1.8 millions grains per catkin); b) the number of anthers per flower decreases from the botton (about 18) to the apex of the catkins (about 13); c) rather high amount of pollen have been found on the slides placed at the farthest station of observation (160 m).
42874700|Essendo uno dei pochi tessuti aploidi e data la sua importanza per la fruttificazione  stato studiato lo sviluppo del budello pollinico da un punto di vista cariologico. Il polline seminato col metodo della membrana filtrante su di un mezzo composto da agar 0,75%, saccarosio 0,6M HBO 0,01% HO dist. q. b.  stato fissato in soluzione cromo-osmica, idrolizzato con HCI 5N per 18 min. e colorato col metodo del Feulgen. Non  stato possibile porre in evidenza il nucleo vegetativo, mentre il nucleo generativo  visibile fin dalla prima ora dopo la semina. A 20C esso penetra nel budello pollinico tra la 2 e la 3 ora ed avanza nelle ore successive. Indipendentemente dalla posizione che ha nel budello verso la 21 ora (ma in qualche caso anche prima) il nucleo generativo si divide formando due nuclei spermatici. A 20C la mitosi si svolge circa in 120 minuti. Durante la metafase si possono osservare agevolmente i cromosomi che sono n = 17, tutti di lunghezza tra i 2 e 3  e non presentano un centromero visibile. A 25C non si registrano grandi differenze nell'avanzamento del nucleo n nella velocit di divisione, mentre a 10  C e 15  C la mitosi  inibita secondo quanto risulta da osservazioni condotte rispettivamente per 96 e 48 ore. Danni permanenti sono stati riscontrati all'apparato mitotico se il polline inizia la germinazione a temperature aggirantesi sui 10C oppure 15C: infatti si ha una scarsa ripresa del processo mitotico anche se la temperatura  riportata successivamente a livelli pi alti (25C). Peraltro, se la germinazione inizia a 25C e il budello viene lasciato sviluppare per 13 ore, un abbassamento improvviso a + 4, 0C, 6C sospende soltanto la mitosi, ma, con i trattamenti a 4C o 0C soltanto, questa  capace di riprendere abbastanza rapidamente dopo il ritorno della temperatura a 25C. Tuttavia frammenti e ponti anafasici sono pi frequenti che con i 20C costanti. Viceversa la temperatura di 6C appare dannosa al polline che non  in grado di riprendere completamente il processo mitotico al rialzo della temperatura. Being one of the rare haploid tissues and because of its influence on the development of the fruit, the caryology of the pollen tube has been investigated, together with the influence of the temperature on the mitosis of the generative nucleus. The pollen, sown with the membrane method on agar 0.75%, sucrose 0.6 M, HBO 0.01% dist. water q. s., has been fixed by a chrome-osmic mixture, hydrolized with 5 N HCI for 18 min and stained with the Feulgen reaction. While the tube nucleus did not appear in any preparation, the generative nucleus was clearly visualized. At 20C it enters the pollen tube between the 2nd and the 4th hrs and it progress during the following hours. Indipendently from its position into the pollen tube, after 21 hrs the generative nucleus undergoes a division from which two spermatic nuclei rise. Such a mitosis is over in about 2 hrs. The chromosomes can be easily scored during the metaphase: n = 17 can be counted and its length varies from 2 to 3  and do not exhibit any trace of the centromere. At 25C neither the nuclear progression nor the mitotic process are greatly different, while no mitotic nucleus could be scored in the pollen grown both at 10C and 15C respectively for 96 and 48 hrs. Permanents damages are inferred to the pollen when germination occurs at 10C or 15C; in fact a very poor recovery of the mitotic process is exhibited by such pollen, though the temperature is risen to a more healthy level (25C). On the other hand if the temperature is suddenly decreased to very low levels (+4C, or OC 6C) after the germination and pollen tube development was allowed to occur for 13 hrs at 25C, the mitotic process is only suspended but (with + 4C and OC treatments only) is able to start again rather promptly when the temperature is raised again to 25C. However fragments and anaphasic bridges are more frequent than at constant 20C temperature. Conversely decreasing the temperature to 6C appears harmful so that the recovery is not complete when the temperature is raised to higher levels.
42874701| stata saggiata la vitalit del polline di 29 cultivar di Nocciuolo conservato in diverse condizioni. Il rilevamento della germinabilit e della lunghezza dei tubi pollinici sono stati gli elementi presi in esame. La conservazione del polline, in frigorifero, alla temperatura di 2C e con umidit relativa del 50%, ha permesso di mantenere inalterate le sue qualit per circa 45 giorni; dopo 100 giorni la percentuale di germinazione si  ridotta quasi della met. La conservazione in laboratorio, alla temperatura di 22C, ha determinato, dopo soli 13 giorni, la devitalizzazione quasi completa del polline. Una notevole riduzione della germinabilit si  osservata anche nel campione di polline conservato in ambiente esterno, soggetto all'alternanza della temperatura. Pertanto la conservazione in condizioni di basse temperature, si rende indispensabile per chi voglia disporre di polline vitale per un lungo periodo. It has been tested the pollen viability of 29 cultiyars of filbert stored in different environments, by the observations of the germination and of the length of pollen tube. The preservation of the pollen, in the refrigerator, at the temperature of 2C and, with a relative moisture of the 50%, have kept his qualities inaltered for about 45 days; after 100 days the percentage of germination has reduced itself of about a half. The preservation in the laboratory, at the temperature of 22C, has determined, after only 13 days, almost the whole devitalitation of pollen. We have observed a remarkable reduction of the germination also in the pollen stored on outward environment, subjected to the alternation of high and low temperatures. Therefore the preservation, in environment of low temperatures, is indispensable for whomever desires to dispose of living pollen for a long period.

42874706|The Autor reports on some results on physiological differences between R. muh tiflora (easy-to-root) and R. canina (diffcult-to-root) tissues. The auxin-like substances and rooting cofactors have been estimated with the Avena first internode and mung bean biological tests. The R. multiflora tissues have a higher content in auxin-like-substances expecially in the basic phase, than R. canina tissues. Despite the high rooting capacity R. multiflora tissues have a lower content in rooting promoting cofactors than R. canina. The results point out that the differences in auxin-like substances are not the cause for the failure to root of R. canina cuttings and that the rooting cofactors are not the only factor necessary for rooting. The A. suggests the possibility that the R. canina tissues have a high IAAoxidase content which may destroy the auxins or the precursors; it still is possible that the presence of some substance(s) may inhibit the rooting cofactor action either by inactivating or inhibiting the oxidation process which is necessary for the activation.
42874707|As part of a research programm on mutation breeding in flowers, a study was carried on the effect of Co gamma rays on some varieties (Oscar Mansoer, S. Souci, Johann Strauss, Aristocrate) all triploids but S. Souci (a tetraploid). The possibility of useful mutation breeding has been shown in this material, provided some parameters are taken into consideration, such as the choice of a radiation dose with low physiological effect, a one-year propagation aimed at the stabilization of induced mutations, a thorough knowledge of diplontic selection processes. A serie of 15 different mutations is presented which were obtained at variable frequencies in the 5 varieties under study. Two of the mutations already propagated in vM are to be considered stabilized. Some data on somatic competition processes are also discussed in relation to Gaul's hypothesis of diplontic selection.

La potatura venne eseguita dalla stessa manodopera specializzata al fine di evitare influenze soggettive. I risultati di questi primi quattro anni, esaminati statisticamente, hanno permesso di indicare alcune differenze significative attribuibili a diversi fattori. A parit di tutte le altre condizioni (portainnesto, forma di allevamento e tecnica di potatura) l'ambiente pedoclimatico maremmano ha indotto nelle piante una maggiore attivit vegetativa ed una migliore attitudine produttiva. La forma di allevamento a vaso (nello stesso ambiente e con lo stesso portainnesto) ha stimolato l'attivit vegetativa delle piante, ritardando il raggiungimento della maturit. La tecnica di potatura nei due ambienti ha mostrato di influire principalmente sulla precocit della messa a frutto. Il cotogno quale portainnesto ha permesso di ottenere piante meno sviluppate ma con pi precoce messa a frutto, rispetto al franco. In definitiva, nelle condizioni in cui si  operato, la tecnica di potatura sembrerebbe esercitare sulla precocit di messa a frutto un'influenza itiiag giore di quella esplicata dal sistema di allevamento, dal portainnesto e dall'ambiente. Vengono infine riportati per ogni tesi i tempi impiegati nel quinquennio per l'esecuzione della potatura verde e di quella invernale. Data were collected over a period of four years on the growth, fruit yield and labour requirement of pear trees trained as palmettes or goblets, and pruned by thinning one-year old lateral shoots ( tutta cima ), or by cutting back the main shoots ( spuntatura ). Observations have been performed in two experimental plots established near Bologna (North Italy) and near Livorno (Central Italy). The responses to treatments were influenced by the environmental conditions of the different localities concerned. In the Livorno district trees have been more productive and more vigorous than near Bologna. Under the same environmental conditions, therefore, the goblet has shown a higher level of vegetative activity. In both the plots, the pruning method has proved to influence the first bearing of the trees more than environmental conditions or the training systems which have been compared.
42878954|Comparative observations have been made about the main morphological and histological aspects that characterize the vegetative growth of young trees of the cultivar "Golden Delicious" and of its sport "Starkspur Golden Delicious ". These observations permitted to verify that the spur trees compared as follows to the original cultivar: 1) reduced growth; shorter internodes; more numerous leaves; reduced trunk exstension. 2) less terminal dominance. 3) thicker leaf blade, in particular relation to a thicker lacunose layer. 4) vascular system characterized by a wereased translocation capacity. As a consequence of these factors, the spur trees assume a more reduced and compact habitus of growth, with a leaf/wood ratio corresponding to the morpho-functional pattern of the grown up trees.

42878957|Fruits of 17 peach cultivars have been picked at: commercial maturity, eating maturity and over-maturity. Each time ascorbic acid content of the fruits has been determined immediately. The cultivars most provided with ascorbic acid have been found to be " Vesuvio ", " Panamint ", " Gialla di Firenze " and " Regina Vemberg ". The statistical analysis of data reveals that the ascorbic acid content is significantly influenced by both varietal effect and fruit maturity stage. Moreover the significant interaction between maturity and cultivar could seem to indicate that the ascorbic acid evolution is not similar for all the cultivars during the maturation. For most of the cultivars considered it stands that statisticaly the ascorbic acid content of fruits picked at commercial stage is not less than the ascorbic acid content of fruits picked at eating stage. Fruits of 8 cultivars out of the seventeen have been picked at commercial maturity and stored at room temperature for 4 days, after which the ascorbic acid of these fruits has been determined and it appears that it has not significantly decreased.

From these researches it is possible to see that rooting is negatively influenced by substances moving from the base upwards and positively in the direction of the base.

After having summarised what the literature already points out on the longitudinal bark incision in woody plants, the A. refers about some trials carried out on pear and poplar trees to determine the real influence of such an operation on trees growing. Results show that early longitudinal bark incision on the trunk and main branches (at the beginning of April) does not promote any larger growth; however during the second half of the vegetative period it was observed in some cases a diametral increasing but anyway differences will disappear later on. Therefore it was not possible to confirm that the longitudinal bark incision may practically affect the diametral growth of the trees.

42874730|Researches have been carried out in order to ascertain the effects of B-9 (" Alar 85 ") on the growth and production of strawberry (cv. " Madame Moutot "). Treatments at 6 concentrations, i. e. 0.0.; 500; 1,000; 2,000; 4,000; and 8,000 p.p.m. have been made at beginning, at full and at the end of blooming. Results have shown that: a) concentrations of " Alar 85 " higher than 4,000 p.p.m. decreased significantly the number of fruits per plant; b) treatments higher than 500 p.p.m. increased the number of cull fruits; c) " Alar 85 " did not effect wheight, specific wheight, colour, sugar content, flesh hardness, ripening date of the fruits; d) concentrations higher than 2,000 p.p.m. of " Alar 85 " lowered number and length of the runners; e) leaf area and length of their pedicel have been decreased significantly by treatments higher than 500 p.p.m.
42874731|Osservazioni condotte sull'apparato radicale di albicocchi "Colomer precoce" innestati su tre diversi soggetti (semenzali di albicocco, di pesco e di mirabolano), allevati a distanze di m. 11,4 in file alternate, hanno consentito di mettere in evidenza, oltre al diverso andamento dei tre soggetti, alcune influenze intra ed interspecifiche. Nelle particolari condizioni dell'ambiente in cui sono state effettuate le prove (pianura di Pisa), l'apparato radicale del mirabolano risulta costituito da un numero relativamente basso di radici, di lunghezza rilevante; il pesco viceversa dispone di un maggior numero di radici, le quali mediamente risultano di diametro e di lunghezza inferiore a quelle del mirabolano; l'albicocco infine ha radici meno numerose degli altri soggetti, corte e la cui lunghezza media diminuisce con la profondit. Per il portainnesto mirabolano non sono emersi fenomeni di competizione tra apparati radicali contigui della stessa o di altre specie. Il pesco e l'albicocco sembrano risentire invece di influenze negative derivate dalla presenza di piante della medesima specie, mentre in generale non si notano particolari ostacoli all'accrescimento delle radici verso piante di specie diverse. Anche se competizioni di carattere nutrizionale non possono essere del tutto escluse, queste non sembrano sufficienti a spiegare le vistose reazioni riscontrate per le radici cresciute nel senso del filare, reazioni che, nel caso dell'albicocco, non si annullano neppure qualche anno dopo la scomparsa della pianta adiacente. Observations done on root-system of " Colomer precoce " apricot grafted on three different rootstocks (seedlings of apricot, peach and myrobolan) grown at distances of 1  1,4 m shown some influences intra and interspecific. In the peculiar environment where trials were done (on the plain of Pisa) the myrobolan root-system appears to have a relatively low number of roots of considerable length, whereas peach has a great number of roots which show to be less for diameter and length to the myrobolan ones. Apricot has less numerous roots than the other rootstocks decreasing with depth. For what concerns myrobolan rootstocks, competition actions did not appear among close root-system of the same or other species. Peach and apricot feel the negative effects due to plants of the same kind while generally we do not notice any damage to root growth towards plant of different species. Nutritional competitions, though present, do not sufficiently explain the competition effects observed on the roots grown in the row-way. Thus negative actions in apricot rootstocks remain several years after the plant death.

As result, we obtained on control-branches small fruits, not interesting from the point of view of negotiability. The experiment, in which the Elan and J. Strauss cultivar were used, yielded the following principal conclusions based upon the chemical analysis of the dry organic matter produced. 1) During germination absorption of the nutritive substances is limited; very marked during the flowering period. 2) The ratio nitrogen: phosphorus acid; potassium is most interesting, showing that the importance of both P. and K. increases considerably in the various phases from the corm stage to the flowering stage. While in the first case it appears difficult the formation of hybrids F, in the second one it could be possible to use the self incompatibility of Cichorium intybus. The segregation analysis in some progenies of F Cichorium endivia cultivars shown a complex heredity for what concerns lenght and width of leaves and weight of the plant even though it appears to exclude an high number of genes. The low number of leaves resulted instead dominant and segregated 3:1. Fenotipic correlations resulted to be positive between number and leaves lenght and plant weight; less realibility resulted instead between leaves width and plant weight caused by a negative correlation between width and leaves number.

In the "Grossissima di Firenze" and "Violetta lunga", varieties with more vigorous roots, they on the contrary produced less.

42877619|Negli anni 1965-'66-'67 sono state condotte alcune ricerche allo scopo di conoscere meglio la distribuzione dei rami anticipati negli astoni di pesco e verificare la possibilit di ridurre il numero di questi, al fine di facilitare la potatura di formazione. Sul germoglio destinato a costituire l'astone  stato praticato un accorciamento (nella cv. " Fertilia " e " Dixired ") ed una cimatura (nella " Cardinal " e " Dixired "). L'accorciamento, specialmente se drastico, ha mostrato di deprimere la vigoria delle piante, dando spesso origine anche ad astoni contorti. La cimatura invece, non solo non compromette la vigoria e la forma delle piante, ma ha dimostrato di poter essere vantaggiosamente utilizzata per la produzione di astoni con un ridotto numero di rami anticipati ed una buona percentuale di gemme dormienti all'altezza della impalcatura. L'efficacia pratica di questa operazione ha mostrato di essere influenzata in buona misura anche da diversi fattori, quali la cultivar, l'andamento climatico e l'ambiente pedologico. In the years 1965-'66-'67 trials were carried out in view to know the range of feather shoots on peach maidens and to verify the possibility to reduce their number by pruning practices. The young shoots were: cutted back (on " Fertilia" and " Dixired") or pinched (on " Cardinal " and " Dixired "). Cutting back the shoot reduces, specialty if hard, plant vigour, causing frequently crooked maidens. The pinch may be advantageously utilized to produce good maidens with a low number of lateral shoots and a good average of normal axillary buds from wich the main branches should arise. Many factors may influence partly the effectiveness of this method as the cultivars and the environmental conditions.
42877620|Cycocel sprays, applied three times to " Tulip " peach trees starting from 20 May to 20 July 1967, increased fruit bud differentiation in the year of the treatments. Fruit buds on treated trees were also much less damaged by winter frost; consequently, the flowering and the fruiting amount, in the following year, were higher. The relationship among the mechanism of the growth retardants, the fruit bud differentiation and the frost resistance, are discussed.

42877627|Trials were carried out on some pear trees of different varieties, age and vigour comparing the shoot inarching done at different times from May till February. The inarching never affect the corymbs number in the following spring. An influence could be observed a year later as consequence of the depressed vigour of the new shoots born along the descending part of the inarched branch. The growth gradient of the new shoots is also unaffected at the buds opening. This gradient seems to be impressed in the buds before their opening as an acrotone trend along the inarched and control branches. A secondary gradient later overcomed the first one as a result of different influences which induce weaker growth in the terminal part of the inarched branch.

42877630|Trattamenti con soluzioni di CCC (210) e di B-995 (3,510) a piante di Monstera deliciosa Libm., allevate in soluzione nutritiva, hanno permesso di costatare come tali brachizzanti, oltre ad operare una sensibile riduzione dell'apparato radicale, non hanno affatto alterato il normale sviluppo della parte aerea, riducendo altres i volumi unitari e totali delle soluzioni somministrate. L'azione migliore  stata esplicata dal B-995 che, contrariamente al CCC, non ha ostacolato lo sviluppo delle radici di secondo ordine permettendo cos di ottenere un apparato radicale molto pi compatto e funzionale. Si potrebbe affermare che uno o due trattamenti di CCC o di B-995 nei primi stadi di vegetazione permettono di realizzare un minor numero di rinvasi ed un risparmio delle innaffiature. Monstera deliciosa Libm. plants cultivated in a nutrient solution and treated with solutions of CCC (210) and B-995 (3,510) show that such retardants in addition to operate remarkable reduction of the root apparatus did not change at all the normal development of their aereal part but they reduce the unit and total volumes of the given solutions. The best action has been obtained with B-995 which acting in a way contrary to that of CCC, did not hinder the development of the secondary order roots and allowed a much more compact and functional root apparatus to be obtained. So, one can say, thus that one or two treatments of CCC or of B-995 in the first stages of the vegetation demand fewer repottings and few waterings.

42874773|Vengono riferiti i risultati di alcune osservazioni sul processo della microsporogenesi nell'Arancio dolce appartenente alle cv. Tarocco e Washington Navel, nel Mandarino Avana e nel Clementine Comune. Il processo della formazione dei granuli pollinici appare perfettamente normale nell'Arancio Tarocco, nel Mandarino Avana e nel Clementine Comune; nell'Arancio Washington Navel, invece, le cellule madri del polline degenerano ancor prima dell'inizio della meiosi. Si conclude, cos, che l'androsterilit dell' Washington Navel  di natura genetica, legata probabilmente alla presenza di fattori recessivi allo stato omozigote. Microsporogenesis of "Tarocco" and "Washington Navel" sweet oranges, "Avana" and "Clementine" mandarins have been studied. Pollen development appears completely normal in the "Tarocco" orange and in the "Avana" and "Clementine" mandarins; in the "Washington Navel" orange, on the contrary, pollen mother cells degenerate before the time for the first meiotic division. The "Washington Navel" therefore is completely male-sterily and its sterility is more probably relate to presence of recessive homozygous genes.

Studies were made of the rooting and establishment of hardwood cuttings of five apple rootstocks after treatment with IBA and storage with bottom heat. 1) Rootstocks behaved differently in these trials; " M. M. 106 ", "M. M. 111 " and " M. 26 " rooted more readily, produced a higher number of roots and showed a better survival in the nursery than " M. VII " and " M. IX ". 2) Generally cuttings collected in November and January performed best and cuttings collected in November and stored (6C) for 120 days transferred well to the nursery. 3) An IBA concentration of 150-200 p.p.m. (as 24 hours soak) gave a higher rooting percentage (but not survival of rooted cuttings) than 3000 p.p.m. (dip method). 4) The highest temperature in the medium (25C) markedly increased the speed of rooting but did not affect the final rooting percentage. 5) Pre-rooting treatment with captan, made in three seasons, reduced the percentage of rooted cuttings, but slightly benefitted survival after transplanting into the field. 6) Different media and temperatures of storage did not influence survival percentage. Among the four fungicides tested, T.M.D.T. gave the best results. 7) These rootstocks grew to a sufficient size to allow budding in the following September, 5 months after transplanting into the nursery.

42874780|Dopo una minima termica di 2C, verificatasi nella pianura di Pisa il 26 di aprile 1967, quando la cultivar di pesco Cardinal era fiorita da 43 giorni, sono state condotte sistematiche osservazioni (anatomiche e morfologiche) su frutti di peschi (Cardinal, Coronet, Dixired e Morettini 1) allevati a palmetta, a vaso basso ed a vaso alto. Le drupe (il cui diametro trasversale minore, al momento della gelata, oscillava da 10 a 25 mm) manifestavano sintomi variabili da un leggero imbrunimento del tegumento seminale a un complesso di alterazioni (necrosi, fenditure, lacune, ecc.) a carico delle diverse parti del frutto. La diversa sintomatologia del danno, che non ha dimostrato alcuna correlazione con l'epoca di fioritura, sembra legata a caratteri varietali. Anche alla manifestazione di danno pi lieve (imbrunimento del tegumento seminale) ha fatto quasi sempre riscontro la caduta dei frutti. Differenze nell'entit del danno sono state rilevate tra le diverse cultivar: relativamente meno danneggiata sarebbe stata la Coronet. Sono risultati meno colpiti i frutticini pi grossi (nel nostro caso con diametro maggiore ai 20 mm), quelli inseriti sui rami rivolti a nord e, in linea di massima, quelli posti nella parte superiore della chioma. Quest'ultima affermazione, valida per il vaso alto, non pu essere sempre estesa alla palmetta. In pratica per, ogni differenza tra le forme di allevamento non ha dimostrato di avere rilevanza, in quanto la produzione  stata in tutti i casi molto scarsa (con frutti prevalentemente piccoli e malformati). An unusual frost (2C) occurred in Pisa plain in the night of April the 26th 1967, 43 days after "Cardinal" peach variety was in full bloom. In view to study the influence of some factors on the severity of damage, anatomical and morfological observations were made on peach fruits of trees ("Cardinal", "Coronet", "Dixired" and "Morettini 1") trained in  palmetta , low open center and high open center systems. The fruitlets, that at the time of the frost had a diameter between 10 and 25 mm, shown different type of damage which appear to be a varietal character. It was found that even the slightest damage (brown membranous seed coat) caused the lost of the fruits. The larger fruitlets grown on the north or in the higher part of the branches seem to be less damaged. The degree of the injury are not variable with the training system, but rather with variety. The few fruits wich reached ripeness were smaller than usual and showed in most cases short cracks in the skin, deep splits in the ventral suture, cavities in the flesh. Mostly of the pits were splitted and nearly all the seeds were aborted.

42874782|Si descrive la tecnica della coltura degli embrioni di pesco come  applicata nel programma di miglioramento genetico dell'Universit del New Jersey.  noto che le cultivar precoci di pesco non riescono a completare il processo di maturazione del seme prima della raccolta dei frutti. La coltura dei semi immaturi  praticamente impossibile in terra e si rende necessario l'uso di un substrato artificiale. I migliori risultati si ottengono con frutti raccolti 75-80 giorni dopo la piena fioritura. Operando in ambiente il pi possibile asettico si estrae il seme dal nocciolo. Liberato dei tegumenti, l'embrione si semina in substrato nutritivo agarizzato in un tubo di vetro. Dopo un periodo di ibernazione di 5 mesi in frigorifero ad 1C, gli embrioni si fanno germogliare a 15-16C. Si trapianta poi in vaso dove le piantine vengono lasciate fino al momento del trapianto in campo. The embryculture technique, used for peach breeding at the New Jersey State University, is described. Early ripening peach do not complete seed formation before than fruit ripes. Unripe seeds are almost impossible to germinate in the ground. An artificial mean is necessary. Bestresults have been obtained with fruits picked 75-80 days after full blooming. Embryos pulled out from stones as aseptically as possible are dipped, free from the seed coats, in a nutrient agar substratum in a glass tube. After a period of five months in cold storage at +1C, the embryos are put at 15-16C for germination. After germination the young plants are grown in pots till the transplanting to the field.

42874760|Allo scopo di portare un contributo alla interpretazione dei rapporti esistenti negli innesti di pero/cotogno, l'Autore ha condotto una ricerca per mezzo delle colture in vitro su associazioni fra tessuto cambiale di cotogno e tessuto cambiale di diverse variet di pero pi o meno affini. In tutte le unioni pero/cotogno esaminate, sono state ottenute proliferazioni abbondanti che hanno dimostrato l'assenza di influenza negativa di ciascun componente sull'altro. L'esame microscopico del callo di giunzione ha messo in evidenza che esiste una possibilit di continuit per ciascuna associazione. A livello anatomico, anche nelle unioni incompatibili, non esiste quindi inibizione locale; ci dimostra che le eventuali sostanze letali che si accumulano nel cambio e nel floema lungo la linea di unione degli innesti incompatibili, sono in scarsa quantit, dato che in vitro si esauriscono presto. In order to contribute to the interpretation of the relations existing in pear/quince grafts, a research was made, by means of cultures in vitro, on cambial tissue union of more or less compatible pear varieties associated with quince cambial tissue. In all pear/quince unions abundant proliferations were obtained, no component showing to have a negative influence upon the other. Microscopically the observation of joining callus proved that a possibility of an intimate continuity exists in all the unions considered. At the anatomical level no local inhibition can be demonstrated even in horticulturally incompatible unions, which proves that eventual lethal substances which accumulate in the cambium and the phloem near the unions of incompatible grafts, are scarce as in vitro they are soon exhausted.
42874761|In un pereto di Passa Crassane con scarsa allegagione vennero effettuati trattamenti con acido gibberellico a 15 e 20 parti per milione. Il frutteto venne colpito da una brinata dopo una settimana circa; ma gli alberi trattati ebbero salva una parte rilevante del raccolto. Trattamenti eseguiti dopo la brina con acido gibberellico a 25 parti per milione diedero risultati meno buoni; tuttavia fecero realizzare produzioni di 100 ql e pi per ha superiori a quelle di alberi non trattati. Eseguendo un trattamento prima della brina e un altro dopo la brina si ottennero produzioni quasi normali. L'utilit dell'acido gibberellico sule piante colpite da brina  chiaramente dimostrata. Tuttavia si ritiene necessario valutare l'effetto dell'acido gibberellico sulla fioritura dell'anno successivo prima di consigliarne un uso veramente esteso. Gibberellic acid at 15 and 20 p.p.m. was applied in a lowly setting Passa Crassane pear orchard. A severe frost hit the orchard after ten days; however sprayed trees carried a good crop in comparison with unsprayed trees. Trees sprayed with 25 p.p.m. after frost averaged a smaller crop, still they carried 100 and more q/for hectar than unsprayed trees. Spraying before and after frost resulted in a normal crop. Gibberellic acid is very efficient against frost damages; still a control of its effects on flowering during the next season is necessary before recommending it.

In the Pescia (Tuscany) district, control tests against Uromyces caryophyllinus (Sehr.) Wint. are made. The tests have been effected on 56 plots, 14 m, and each 100 plants of Carnation of cv. "Valia", very susceptible to the disease, have been planted. Following the scheme of a randomized block, the 56 plots have been devided in 4 blocks which have been used for 13 different types of fungicides and one check. The tests lasted from April to November 1967, and in this period 18 treatments have been made. At the end of the trial a statistical evalutation of the infection found in the different theses as shown that the fungicides containing Zineb, Zineb-Maneb, Zincpropilenebisdithiocarbamate, Zineb plus colloidal sulphur, Ziram, Zineb-Ziram, Zineb plus etylenetiuramemonosolfide, Zineb plus bisdimetylditiocarbamyle, Captan, Dodine, Maneb plus TMTD and other products and an experimental product indicated as RH 539, have given highly significant results in comparision with the check, but not significant between themselves. All these fungicides have been used in different percentages from 0,15 to 0,30%. A product with TMTD, used at 0,30%, has given highly significant results in regard to the check, but significantly lower with regard to all the other products. In the whole the infection of the rust have been scarse also on the check, which had an high production of flowers. Somewhat lower production have been instead obtained in the plots treated with some of the products and particularly with Ziram and with RH 539. It is possible that these results may be due to a certain degree of phytotoxicity.
42874794|A new cleft grafting technique suitable for walnut in nursery. A new cleft grafting technique has been devised which is suitable for nursery grown walnuts. In order to ensure a fairly high average temperature (18-20C) and a minimum temperature of 10C, this being the range of temperature necessary for a successful take, the grafting period has been delayed until the second half of May. Consequently cold storage of stocks and scions is necessary and this is done at 2C with nearly saturated relative humidity. In this way we have obtained an average take of 81,7% out of 480 plants of Juglans regia and J. nigra grafted with different varieties. We retain, however that this percentage of successful takes could have been higher had all tha scions been of choice quality. To obtain good results : 1 the seedling must be treated in such a way as to give it extensive roots; 2 the scions must be well hardened and ripened; 3 special care must be taken to keep the plants in the shade in the first period after grafting; 4 injury from valnut blight in late autumn must be avoided.

The Author reports the results of research dedicated to studying the influence that the sowing date and the variety have on the yield and production calendar of the vegetable marrow (Cucurbita pepo L.) cultivated in an autumn-winter-spring cycle, both in unheated greenhouses and in the open air. A covering of PVC film, without auxiliary heating, proved to be suitable in achieving an efficacious temperature; as a result, the precocity and the yields were greatly superior to those resulting from cultivation in the open air. Out of the three sowing dates experimented (November 3rd., November 28th. and December 20th.), the intermediary one produced the best results. Among the 7 varieties subjected to study, the Hybrid F " Diamant Clause " showed absolutely the best adaptability to the environmental conditions, both regarding precocity and productivity, as a result of the positive interactions with the other factors experimented.
42874798|Sono state messe a confronto le tecniche correnti di imbianchimento del cardo e del sedano con altre comprendenti l'impiego di materiali plastici di varia natura, rilevando le variazioni qualitative in zuccheri, clorofilla, sostanza secca e rendimento produttivo. In una prima prova  stata esaminata la copertura completa delle piante con film plastici. Dato l'andamento termico esterno assai elevato gi a due settimane dalla copertura l'imbianchimento sotto queste protezioni era in uno stadio avanzato sia nel cardo che nel sedano. Quindi, se da un lato la copertura completa  apparsa positiva nell'abbreviare il periodo di imbianchimento, si sono avuti ingenti processi degradativi a causa dell'elevata temperatura raggiunta all'interno delle protezioni. Nel cardo in particolare  stato notato come le piante diritte danno un prodotto che si presenta migliore e che si adatta meglio al confezionamento senza le frequenti rotture dei piccioli foliari presenti nei cardi piegati. Whitening trials on cardoon and celery were used in the employement of plastic material for sugar, clorophyll content, dry matter and yeld compared with some other methods. In the first trial the complete covering of plants with plastic material was tested. Two weeks after the covering the whitening was noticed because of the warm climate outside (middle of October). Such condition was suitable for whitening while full covering caused an high temperature inside and therefore plants suffered. In the second trial, in way to avoid the above mentioned damages a partial covering was used either for cardoon or celery leaving outside the end-leaves. Better results were obtained using the above method; soluble sugar, stark content, dry matter and yeld were increased comparing the first trial. Sugar content increases from outside stems towards inside ones and from stems to basal ones.

The results obtained during the vernalization test on Lilium regale are referred. The tested bulbs were held at low temperature. A part of them suffered a previous treatment in the termostatic cell during different times. All the bulbs were then put in the greenhouse in order to vegetate. All the treatment hastened the germination and the flowering. Including, however, the vernalization in the time required for germination and flowering, the results change. The shortest time is obtained just forcing the bulbs in the temperature and humidity conditions of the greenhouse.
