42878557|AA. have conducted a series of field and laboratory trials for determining the most suitable pollination period and the time during which the stigmas are receptive in Cornice pear. The researches concern following points: 1) Macrosporogenesis has been followed during 12 floral phases. 2) Artificial pollination has been effectuated every day for 7 days on a fixed number of flowers of this cv. (which had been before emasculated and isolated) with pollen of the "Kaiser" pear (7 thesis); for the comparison, some thesis have been left to the free and self pollination (8th and 9th thesis). 3) Microscopical observations with fluorescent light (Martin method, 1959) have been done about the development of pollen tubes in the styles of flowers of each thesis artificially pollinated, in order to establich haw long is receptivity of stigmas and how much time it takes to complete the fertilization process. Microscopical observation on point 1) have confirmed that macrosporogenesis belongs to the normal Angiospermic type. It is a rather early development which finishes just before the flower full anthesis. From the field trials about the point 2), we can see that for the 7 controlled pollination thesis, the fruiting percentage has always been higher than that of the control thesis, left to the free pollination. It has also been possible to see that Cornice pear is near completely self-incompatible. As for the observations about the growing of the pollen tubes in stigmas (point 3) there have not been significative variations among the various thesis. Generally, fertilization happens 24-48 hours after pollination in all the thesis. From the obtained results, we can say that in emasculated and unpollinated flowers, stigmas are receiptive for a rather long period and that ovaric system last also for a long while. In the examined case, this longevity has been of 7 days.
42878558|Sono riportati i risultati di un anno di osservazioni sugli effetti dei fitoregolatori Alar ed Ethephon sulla cultivar di melo " Stark Delicious ". I trattamenti con Alar sono stati eseguiti a due concentrazioni (1000 e 2000 ppm) ed in tre differenti epoche (all'inizio dell'antesi, 21 e 70 gg dopo la piena fioritura). Due settimane prima della raccolta  stato eseguito un trattamento con Ethephon a 500 ppm sia su una parte delle piante trattate con Alar a 1000 ppm 70 gg dopo la fioritura, sia su piante di controllo. I trattamenti con Alar hanno fornito interessanti risultati riducendo la cascola pre-raccolta, intensificando la colorazione dell'epicarpo ed aumentando la consistenza della polpa; alcuni trattamenti hanno presentato effetti collaterali negativi, come la minor allegagione (rispetto al controllo), provocata dal trattamento all'inizio dell'antesi e la riduzione della pezzatura dei frutti causata dalle irrorazioni eseguite 70 gg dopo la piena fioritura a 2000 ppm. I frutti delle piante trattate con solo Ethephon due settimane prima della raccolta hanno presentato un pi elevato residuo secco solubile ed una minor consistenza della polpa rispetto a quelli delle piante di controllo o trattate con Alar. I trattamenti con Alar eseguiti in fioritura e tre settimane dopo hanno indotto una maggior fioritura nell'anno successivo. Inoltre l'Alar ha influito positivamente sull'entit del  riscaldo  durante la loro conservazione. L'impiego abbinato delPEthephon e dell'Alar non ha fornito risultati soddisfacenti probabilmente a causa dell'elevata dose usata per il primo prodotto. "Red Delicious" apple trees were sprayed with Alar at two different rates (1000 & 2000 ppm.) and in three different dates (at the beginning of flowering, 21 and 70 days after blossoming); later Ethephon (500 ppm) has been sprayed both on a group of trees sprayed with Alar 70 days after flowering and on a group of control trees. Trees sprayed with Alar at the beginning of flowering time showed a fruit set lower than the control trees. Trees sprayed with Alar have been affected by a lower pre-harvest fruit drop, and showed an increased of skin color and of flesh firmness, but treatments at 2000 ppm 70 days after blossoming reduced the fruit size. Trees sprayed with Ethephon only showed, at the harvest, a higher content of soluble solids but a lower firmness of their flesh. Treatments at 1000 and 2000 ppm 21 days after blossoming increased the flower bud differentiation. Alar sprayes decreased scald during cold storage. Supplementary treatments with Ethephon 500 ppm two weeks before harvesting time have not satisfactory effects, probably owing to the high rate used for these treatments.
42878559| stata saggiata la resistenza ad Alternaria porri (Ell.) Saw. f. sp. cichorii (Nattr.) Schmidt di numerose cultivars di Endivia (Cichorium endivia L.) e di Cicoria (Cichorium intybus L.). Questa malattia risulta dannosa soprattutto durante i primi stadi di sviluppo e nel periodo dell'attecchimento dopo il trapianto. Nella presente ricerca le piantine sono state inoculate all'et di 2 mesi con una sospensione conidica contenente 50.000 conidi per cm, e sono state mantenute in condizioni di elevata U.R. La intensit degli attacchi  stata determinata valutando la estensione dell'area fogliare colpita. Resistance to leaf spot caused by Alternaria porri (Ell.) Saw. f. sp. cichorii (Nattr.) Schmidt has been tested on several endive (Cichorium endivia L.) and chicory (Cichorium intybus L.) cultivars. This disease is serious in the early stage of growth and after transplantation. In the present research two months old plants were inoculated with a suspension of 50.000 conidia/ml, and maintained at high R. H. conditions. The intensity of disease were determined evaluating the leaves area infected. The plants with leaves area infected less than 5% were considered resistant or tolerant. All the chicory cultivars had high livel of resistance. On the contrary all the endive cultivars were very susceptible, only a small difference in susceptibility having been shown among the tested varieties. Results obtained inoculating hybrid progenies from crosses between endive and chicory showed that resistence is provided by one dominant gene (AA).
42878560|Le indagini svolte in pieno campo sulle malattie da virus della lattuga in Campania, hanno portato alla identificazione di quattro virus: il virus del mosaico della lattuga (VML), il virus del mosaico del cetriolo (VMC), il virus del mosaico dell'Arabis (VMA) e il virus della necrosi del tabacco (VNT). Il VML causa danni notevolissimi inducendo i sintomi ben noti. Il VMC, anch'esso molto diffuso, produce mosaico giallo e necrosi sulle foglie; i sintomi indotti da questo virus sono spesso simili a quelli causati dal VML, sopratutto perch le piante colpite non riescono a formare il grumolo. Il VMA causa un nanismo clortico e qualche necrosi sulle foglie; il virus  presente nei terreni dai quali sono stati isolati nematodi del genere Xiphinema (probabilmente X. italiae). Il VNT appare dannoso sopratutto su alcune variet locali quali la "Sarnese" e il "Cavolo di Napoli", sulle quali induce riduzione di sviluppo e necrosi fogliare, in particolare sulle nervature; nei tessuti radicali delle piante malate sono stati rinvenuti sporangi del fungo Olpidium brassicae. Il VNT  stato isolato anche da radici di piante senza sintomi fogliari; i danni prodotti da questo virus sembrano direttamente collegati all'et della pianta al momento dell'infezione. I sintomi delle malattie studiate sono stati riprodotti in piante di lattuga con inoculazioni in serra. Sono stati rinvenuti numerosi ospiti naturali del VML e del VMC. L'identificazione dei virus studiati  stata effettuata anche con l'ausilio di prove sierologiche. The research carried out in the field on the virus diseases of lettuce in Campania (Italy) led to the identification of four viruses: lettuce mosaic virus (LMV), cucumber mosaic virus (CMV), Arabis mosaic virus (AMV) and tobacco necrosis virus (TNV). LMV causes heavy losses producing the well known symptoms. VMC is also widespread and causes yellow mosaic and necrotic lesions on the leaves; the symptoms cused by this virus are very often similar to those caused by LMV, for instance, the plants fail to develop hearts. AMV causes a chlorotic stunt and necrotic spots on the leaves; the virus was isolated from soil samples in which nematodes of the gen. Xiphinema (probably X. italiae) were found. TNV seems dangerous especially on some local varieties of lettuce, e.g.  Sarnese  and  Cavolo di Napoli , wich show light stunting and necrotic spots on the veins and roots; in the root-tissues were found several sporangia of the fungus Olpidium brassicae (Wor.) Dang., TNV was isolated also from roots of symptomless plants; it seems that the damage caused by this virus is strictly related to the age of the plants at the time of the infection. The symptoms of the diseases were reproduced on lettuce plants, in greenhouse, by mechanical inoculation. Several natural hosts of LMV and CMV were found. The identification of the viruses was performed also with the aid of serological tests.
42878564|Ricerche effettuate sul melo (cv. "Jonathan" su franco) nel biennio 1969-70 in due aziende del Friuli ed in una del Veronese, hanno permesso di accertare che la copertura con reti antigrandine riduce la colorazione dei frutti ed il loro accrescimento, mentre non influisce sull'epoca di maturazione. Nei frutteti coperti sono state rilevate temperature leggermente inferiori e soprattutto sensibili riduzioni dell'energia luminosa, variabili dal 7% al 20% a seconda dell'altezza da terra, dell'ambiente e delle condizioni metereologiche. Nessun effetto invece  stato osservato sull'umidit relativa dell'aria. Si ritiene che gli effetti negativi riscontrati sulla qualit dei frutti dipendano principalmente dalla riduzione dell'energia luminosa provocata dalle reti antigrandine. Si prospettano alcuni possibili accorgimenti tecnici al fine di attenuare e forse eliminare tali effetti negativi. During 1969-70 researches have been carried out in two different environments in order to ascertain the effects of covering with plastic netting on the microclimate of the orchards and on the quality of the Jonathan apple fruits. The covering reduced both the extent and the intensity of the red color of the fruits. The extent of color was reduced from 10% to 16% according to the distance of fruits from the soil and the environmental conditions. The covering reduced also the fruit growth, so that the mean diameter of the fruits under plastic net was slightly smaller. The effects of the covering seemed to vary more or less with the environmental conditions and probably with the training system of the trees. Not marked differences in fruit maturity were observed between trees under and out the covering. The covering did not modify the relative humidity, but decreased the air temperature and especially the solar radiation (as far as 20%). The negative effect of the covering on both color and size of the fruits seems mainly to be a consequence of the lowered light energy. The Authors point out that only the covering with plastic netting allows a safety protection from the hail and suggest some possibilities for the minimization of the observed disadvantages.

Le piante diradate meccanicamente, pur producendo anche loro meno di quelle diradate a mano, hanno per portato a maturazione frutti di uguale pese medio a quello delle piante diradate manualmente. Chemical and mechanical fruit thinning trials have been carried out on peach trees, "Southland" variety, during 1971. Treatments have been done with PRB 8 (2000 ppm) on full bloom, NPA (200 and 300 ppm) 3 days after blossoming, 3 CPA (150 and 300 ppm) 30 days after blossoming and Ethephon (30, 60, 120, 180 ppm) 34 days after blossoming. A limb shaker has been used for mechanical thinning. With all the treatments the number of the fruits has been reduced nearly to that of hand thinned trees, and more with Ethephon at 120 and 180 ppm. The fruit medium weight and the total production of the chemically thinned trees have been lower than those of hand or mechanically thinned ones, which have shown also a more regular size of their fruits. Further investigations seem necessary to find uot the reasons of these inexplicable effects of the chemicals used on the final size and the uniformity of the thinned fruits.
42878567|Alcune ricerche condotte in Sardegna nel biennio 1969-70 hanno messo in evidenza che la distanza degli impollinatori pu influenzare notevolmente l'attivit produttiva del Clementine "Comune", cultivar, com' noto, autoincompatibile. Infatti la vicinanza del Mandarino, che fungeva da impollinatore, ha migliorato efficacemente l'entit dell'allegagione, la produzione e la qualit dei frutti. Ovviamente, alcune caratteristiche, come il numero dei semi per frutto e la percentuale di succo, sono state leggermente peggiorate in conseguenza dell'impollinazione incrociata. Si conclude, quindi, che per ottenere regolari produzioni nel Clementine  necessario, fra l'altro, adottare una migliore distribuzione degli impollinatori nell'ambito dei singoli appezzamenti. Some researches carried out in Sardinia during 1969 and 1970 have evidenced that distance from pollinators can greatly affect the productive behaviour of self-incompatible Clementine trees. Field plots consisted in a four rows of Clementine trees block and in un adiacent four rows of Mandarin trees block, being the last ones pollinators. Therefore four different treatments were compared: A -Clementine trees 5 m distant from Mandarin trees B -Clementine trees 10 m distant from Mandarin trees C -Clementine trees 15 m distant from Mandarin trees D -Clementine trees 20 m distant from Mandarin trees In both years various observations were made on flowering and fruit-setting. Data on yields and fruit quality were also recorded. The results have shown that fruit-set, yield and fruit quality as much were improved as nearer was the distance from Mandarin trees. Obviously, some fruit characteristics, like seed number and juice percentage were depreciated as productivity increased. The Author concludes that to reach regular yields a better pollinators distribution should be necessary in self-incompatible Clementine orchards.
42878568|I primi risultati di una prova di concimazione azotata al Pothos (Scindapsus Aureus Lindl.) hanno messo in evidenza la forte reattivit della specie all'elemento nutritivo che ha esaltato le caratteristiche vegetative della pianta con l'aumentare dei livelli distribuiti. 42878569|Cultivar di patata "Ricciona" e "Piattellina" gravemente degenerate per infezioni virali sono state guarite. La combinazione della termoterapia con la coltura di apici meristematici di piante di patata infette da PVX risulta di notevole interesse dal punto di vista del risanamento. Mediante abbinamento delle due tecniche si sono ottenute 34 piante sane su 42, mentre con la sola tecnica della coltura di apici sono state ottenute 7 piante sane su 59. Da piante infette contemporaneamente da PVX, PVY, PVS e PVM sono state ottenute soltanto 2 piante sane su 34. Most of the Italian potato cultivars are seriously infected by severe virus diseases and are disappearing from Italian cultivation. The eradication of some viruses from infected potato plants of "Ricciona "and "Piattellina" cvs by combining thermotherapy with artificial culture of meristem tips has been achieved. Plants of "Ricciona" cv infected with potato virus X (PVX) were grown under artificial light with an air temperature alternating from 33C (in dark) to 35C (in light) for 20 days. Longer treatment was too harmful for the plants. Meristem tips (apical dome plus two leaflets) were then excised and cultured on nutrient medium of Murashige and Skoog, supplemented with gibberellic acid (0.1 ppm), agar (0.5%) and sucrose (2%). They were cultured under artificial light (4000 lux for a 16-hour photoperiode) and at a temperature of 24C in a growth cabinet until they grew into plantlets, and then transferred to soil. The number of PVX-free plants was 34 out of 42 as a result of using thermotherapy combined with meristem tip culture; only 7 out of 59 PVX-free plants were obtained by using meristem tip culture alone. Meristem tips from plants of "Piattellina" cv infected simultaneously with PVX, potato virus Y (PVY), potato virus S (PVS) and potato virus M (PVM) were excised after the same treatment of thermotherapy and cultured in exactly the same conditions. Only 2 virus-free plants were obtained from 34 plants; 32 out of 34 plants were still infected with PVX while none of them were found to be infected with PVY. PVS and PVM were occasionally present. Survival of explants was high: 135 out of 303 meristem tips grew into plants. The advantage of combining thermotherapy with meristem tip culture in order to eliminate PVX from potato plants is discussed. The difficulty of obtaining a high percentage in virus-free plants when PVX, PVY, PVS and PVM are simultaneously present is also discussed.

42878575|During 1970-71 observations have been carried out on the morphological and anatomical aspects of flower bud development on chestnut (Castanea sativa, L.). Results have shown that: a) the earliest indications of the flower differentiation have been detected 30-40 days after the beginning of growth; at this stage tipical structural modifications have been observed in the apical meristems, that lead to the development of a catkin primordia; b) the development of these primordia stops at the end of summer, and start again in the spring, at the beginning of growth; c) the development of the several male flowers in the catkin and of the female inflorescence occurs during the first stage of the spring growth, before the bloom; d) the development of the male flowers in the catkins starts before that of the female inflorescences.

This pattern was confirmed by significancy of the linear component. In particular, ripe fruit yield per hectare rose from qls 385,60 to 530,78 in population range from 30.000 to 75.000 plants. Moreover, about the ripe product the two cultivars gave similar results, while the berry resistance to the parasitic and nonparasitic diseases was better in the cv. "Roma ". Therefore, in order to reduce the loss of production involved by the special cultural pratice and by the one pick harvest, it is necessary to achieve higher plant densities than the commonly realised for the hand-harvest in the area of the trials.

42877752|Biological and agronomical behaviour has been determined for some french and Spanish table olive varieties which were introduced at the "Belvedere" farm situated at Bolgheri (Livorno). We have been led to conclude that it is not convenient to grow these varieties as we have observed that: 1) The blossoming time of these table olive varieties generally precedes the blossoming time of the local oil varieties by as much as 15-16 days. 2) The poor production of the French and Spanish varieties is due to the lack of contemporaneity in blossoming between the oil and table varieties. 3) Flower and fruit biology has shown that only the "Bouteillan" variety is definetly self-fruitful while both "Grossanne" and "Gordales" are scarcely self-fruitful. "Aglandaou", "Picholine", "Verdale", "Tanche", "Salonenque" and "Manzanilla" are definitely not self-fruitful. 4) Among the better pollinators for the varieties taken into consideration, we found the self same varieties but also the "Coratina" imported from the Puglia and the "Razzo" which is a variety occasionally found in the Maremma hills. 5) It is necessary to determine in particular the behaviour of every new variety of table olives, both from the biological and the pedoclimatic point of view, specially if they come from a different ecological milieu although there they might be considered of particular value. The same rule must be applied rigorously to oil varieties.
42877753|From the cross "Moretta di Cazzano  Durona di Padova" as been obtained by Bargioni (1970) a sweet cherry variety ("Vittoria") (Prunus avium, L.), whose fruit, at maturity, loosen easily from their pedicel. Researches have been carried on the anatomical and histochemical changes associated with the abscission of fruits of this variety. Results have shown that: 1) abscission layer formation in the maturing fruits occurs in the transition zone between the fruit and the pedicel; 2) the abscission layer, consisting of 4-5 rows of cells, was first detectable from its low affinity for haematoxilin; 3) the walls of the cells in the abscission layer contain less total polysaccharides, the pectines and the cellulose are partially degraded, and the Ca and Mg level decreases during the maturation. Therefore, the anatomical and histochemical process of abscission occurs in the fruits of "Vittoria" variety in the same manner observed in the fruits of the sour cherry.

42877759|Nel 1970 fu impostato il presente lavoro al fine di fornire un contributo circa l'influenza dell'intensit luminosa su alcuni caratteri morfo-fisiologici di Spinacia oleracea L. cv. "Riccio d'Asti". I risultati ottenuti possono essere sintetizzati nel seguente modo: l'ombreggiamento ha favorito lo sviluppo vegetativo delle piante ed il prolungamento dello stadio di rosetta, mentre ha limitato il numero delle foglie della rosetta ed il loro contenuto in acido ascorbico. The work here reported was begun in 1970 as a contribution to research on the influence of intensity of solar radiation on some morpho-physiological characters of Spinacia oleracea L. cv. "Riccio d'Asti". The results obtained can be synthetized as follows: shading favoured vegetative growth and prolonged the pre-shooting stage, while it limited the number of leaves produced on the shoots and their ascorbic acid content. With regard to sexual expression, a greater though not statistically significant differentiation of female as compared to male plants (B  + L ) was found in the shaded plots.
42877795|Le indagini, che rappresentano una tappa preliminare nella messa a punto di un nuovo modello di telaio raccoglitore, sono state condotte al fine di determinare le caratteristiche tecnologiche del  piano collettore  del telaio di raccolta e del  dispositivo di decelerazione  destinato a rallentare la caduta dei frutti prima del loro impatto sul piano collettore. Researches, representing a preliminary study for a new type of catching frame, were carried on the technological characteristics of the catching platforms and the fruit deceleration devices. An experimental catching platform has been prepared with 10 mm playwood, covered with 20 mm sponge rubber and with a Texilten sheet 1.5 mm, or a poliethylene film 0.1 mm thick. The deceleration systems, placed 20 cm over the catching platform, consisted in rubber or canvas parallel strips, both 6 cm wide, spaced 2 or 4 cm and transversally connected each other or not; a sponge rubber frame, provided with holes 6 or 5 cm wide, has been also tested. In order to test the different solutions, apples cv. "Rome Beauty" have been thrown from a container placed 4 m over the catching frame. These fruits were then examined to determine how much they were bruised. The best results have been obtained covering the sponge rubber with a Texilten sheet and using a deceleration system fitted with connected rubber strips or a rubber sponge holed frame.
42877796|Applicando la tecnica della  margotta di ceppaia  non  possibile moltiplicare convenientemente alcuni portainnesti di pesco ("Missour I", "Missour II" e "Nemaguard") poich spesso pochi rami vengono emessi dalle piante madri e solo sporadicamente questi riescono a formare radici. 42877798|Prove di auto-ed eteroimpollinazione sono state effettuate nel 1971 sulla cv. "Granny Smith", usando come impollinatori le cv. "Cox Orange", "Golden Delicious", "Idared", "Morgenduft", "Mutsu", Rome Beauty", e "Starking". In base alla entit della allegagione, buoni impollinatori sono risultati le cv. "Starking", "Golden Delicious", "Morgenduft", "Rome Beauty" e "Cox Orange". Risultati meno soddisfacenti sono stati invece forniti dalle cv. Apple producers of some italian areas, where "Granny Smith" has been introduced during the last 10-15 years, often complain poor and sometimes erratic fruit set and more or less wide reddish blush over the green ground color of this apple variety. During 1971 researches have been carried out, in order to ascertain whether the above troubles depend on the influence of the pollinator variety. The results of self - and cross - pollinations have shown that: a) the "Granny Smith" is self incompatible; b) among the seven tested varieties, "Starking ", "Golden Delicious", "Rome Beauty", "Morgenduft" and "Cox Orange" resulted the most suitable pollinators and gave similar or even higher percentages of fruits set respect to open pollination; "Idared" did not result a good pollinator and "Mutsu" gave extremely low percentage of fruit set. c) the pollen parent variety did not affect neither the skin color, nor the shape of fruits of "Granny Smith".
42877799|Si  realizzato uno studio genetico e biochimico su progenie segreganti, derivanti dall'autofecondazione di due variet commerciali di garofano ("5774" e "480p"). Si sono analizzati i seguenti caratteri: resistenza in acqua del fiore reciso e numero dei petali (presi come esempio di caratteri sotto controllo poligenico), colore del fiore e aberrazioni morfologiche. Si  effettuata la stima dell'ereditabilit che  risultata sufficientemente alta per un efficace lavoro di selezione. Questi risultati sono stati confermati dalla selezione divergente che ha permesso di aumentare la resistenza in acqua del fiore reciso nella cv. "5774" (1,28 giorni) ed il numero dei petali (26,55 nella "6774" e 10,69 nella "4800"). L'analisi dei pigmenti ha rivelato la presenza dell'antociano pelargonidin-3-monoglucoside variamente acilato con radicali fenolici. L'analisi genetica del colore dei fiori ha permesso l'identificazione nella cv. "5774" di almeno due geni (forse I e A) eterozigoti. I dati relativi alla cv. "4800" sono risultati pi complessi e non hanno permesso una completa interpretazione in termini genetici. Una variet ("4800")  risultata eterozigote per molte caratteristiche morfologiche (nanismo, foglia larga, assenza di cera, giallo-verde), di cui una (nanismo) risulta controllata da un singolo gene recessivo. Si discutono, infine, i dati ottenuti in ordine all'interesse generale per il lavoro di selezione nelle piante a propagazione vegetativa. A genetic and biochemical analysis has been carried out on the segregation progenies, deriving from selfing of two commercial varieties of the carnation (Dianthus caryophyllus) ("5774" and "4800") The following characters have been analysed: vase-life of cut flowers and petal number (taken as examples of characters under polygenic control), flower color and morphological aberrations. Estimates of heritability were carried out and found to be sufficiently high for an efficient selection work. Divergent selection for vase life and petal number confirmed these results and gave an increase in vase-life in "5774" (1,28 days) and in petal number (26,55 for "5774" and 10,69 for "4800"). Pigment analysis showed the presence of pelargonidin-3-monoglucoside with a varying number (0-2) of phenolic radicals. Genetic analysis of flower color revealed the presence of at least two genes (may be I and A) heterozygous in "5774". Data for "4800" were more complex and did not allow a complete interpretation in genetic terms. One variety ("4800") was shown to be eterozygous for several morphological characters (dwarfism, wide-leaf, waxless, yellow-green), one of which (dwarf) was shown to be controlled by a single recessive gene. The data obtained are finally discussed in view of their general interest for selection work in a vegetatively propagated plant.
42877800|L'Autore propone un nuovo metodo per ottenere una misurazione pi precisa della forza di attacco dei frutti all'albero. Questo metodo fornisce la Resistenza Integrata, attraverso l'elaborazione dei dati riguardanti la resistenza dinamometrica e la cascola dei frutti, questi ultimi calcolati numericamente e riferiti al totale di quelli presenti sulla pianta. The Author propounds a new method to obtain a more precise measurement of the force required to pull the fruits from trees. This method provides the Integrated Resistance through the combination of the data regarding the dynamometric resistance (measured by means of a special equipment) and the spontaneous fruit drop, which is numerically calculated and referred to all the fruits actually on the tree. The formula is: $F\,val\,0\, - \,\frac{{Fc.\,Fm}}{{Ft}}$ $Ri\, = \,\frac{{Rd\, \times \,(Fm\,---\,F\,val\,0)}}{{Fm}}$ F val 0 = Fruits with resistance zero Fc = Number of dropped fruits Fm = Number of fruits for which the dynamometric resistance has been determinated Ft = Total number of fruits on the tree Ri = Integrated Resistance Rd = Dynamometric resistance
42877801|Il peperone  soggetto, in Campania, alle infezioni di numerosi virus. Sino ad oggi sono stati individuati il virus del mosaico del Tabacco (VMT) ed il virus  Y  della patata (VYP), ambedue molto diffusi. Il VMT  presente sul peperone sottoforma di due ceppi: il ceppo del pomodoro ed un ceppo che pu assimilarsi a quello comune del tabacco. Il primo ceppo, che  il pi diffuso, causa mosaico giallo vivace, riduzione delle dimensioni delle foglie, necrosi dei fusti, defogliazione, riduzione dello sviluppo, deformazione e maculatura gialla dei frutti. Il secondo ceppo, induce mosaico internervale, leggero, riduzione delle dimensioni delle foglie, defogliazione, riduzione dello sviluppo, deformazione leggera dei frutti che appaiono pi piccoli di quelli sani. Le variet "Yolo Wonder 43" e "Yolo Wonder L." vengono infettate localmente solo dal ceppo comune del VMT da noi isolato. Sono descritti anche i sintomi indotti su altri ospiti erbacei. Il VYP lo si riscontra sottoforma di due ceppi: il ceppo normale (Y) ed il ceppo necrotico (Yn). Il primo causa tipiche bande in corrispondenza delle nervature fogliari, mosaico indistinto, riduzione dello sviluppo, aborto fiorale, deformazione dei frutti che manifestano anche strie clorotiche; il secondo appare pi dannoso e provoca necrosi delle nervature fogliari, mosaico, deformazione e riduzione di sviluppo delle foglie, aborto fiorale, deformazione e maculature necrotiche dei frutti, riduzione accentuata dello sviluppo delle piante. Le variet di peperone pi sensibili al VYP sono: "Pimiento", "Rosso di Nocera", "Giallo di Nocera" e "Marconi". Sono descritti anche i sintomi indotti da ceppi diversi del VYP su numerosi ospiti erbacei. I due virus, VMT e VYP, sono stati identificati anche con l'ausilio di prove sierologiche e di osservazioni al microscopio elettronico. In Campania (Italy) the pepper is affected by several virus diseases. Till now two viruses have been identified: tobacco mosaic virus (TMV) and potato  Y  virus (PYV). TMV is present as two strains, tomato-strain and common-strain. The first one is the most diffused and causes bright-yellow mosaic, reduction in size of the leaves, necrotic spots on the stem, leaf abscission, stunting, deformation and yellow-spots on the fruits. The latter causes a mild interveinal mosaic and reduction in size of the leaves, leaf abscission, a milder stunting, reduction in size of the fruits that are much smaller than the healthy ones. An other strain that causes a mild mosaic in pepper and tomato was isolated; the strain produces the same symptoms in other test-plants as the tomato-strain does; we called it, tentatively,  mild-atypical tomato strain . PYV is present as two strains, the normal (Y) and the necrotic one (Yn). The  Y -strain causes a typical vein-banding, faint mosaic, reduction in size of the leaves, stunting, flower-abortion, deformation and chlorotic streaking of the fruits. The  Yn -strain is more dangerous than the  Y  one, and causes vein-necrosis, severe-stunting, deformation and reduction in size of the leaves, flower-abortion, deformation and necrotic spots on the fruits, necrosis and splitting of the stem. The most sensitive varieties to PYV are:  Pimiento , "Rosso di Nocera", "Giallo di Nocera" and "Marconi". Symptoms caused by different strains of PYV on several hostplants are also described. TMV and PYV were also identified with the aid of serological tests and electronmicroscopical observations.
42877802|Vengono riferiti i risultati di alcune osservazioni microscopiche sulla megasporogenesi nell'Arancio dolce (cv. "Tarocco" e "Washington navel"), nel Mandarino (cv. "Avana") e nel Clementine (cv. "Comune").  stato rilevato, anzitutto, che nel Mandarino e nel Clementine la formazione del sacco embrionale si completa normalmente dando luogo ad ovocellule perfettamente funzionali. In qualche caso nel Mandarino "Avana"  stata osservata la formazione di due tetradi di megaspore nello stesso ovulo, derivanti probabilmente da due megasporociti. Negli Aranci "Tarocco" e "Washington navel"  in misura maggiore nel secondo  il gametofito femminile degenera prima del completamento del sacco embrionale. La degenerazione si manifesta pi frequentemente dopo la meiosi, coinvolgendo i nuclei delle quattro megaspore, ma interessa talvolta anche gli stati bi - e tetranucleati del sacco embrionale. Tale forma di ginosterilit, gi nota nella cv. "Washington navel",  stata riscontrata, come si  detto, anche nel "Tarocco", una delle cultivar pi rappresentative del patrimonio agrumicolo Italiano. Da un punto di vista strettamente pratico, se da un lato la sterilit dell'apparato sessuale femminile porta indiscutibili vantaggi per le cultivar che ne sono caratterizzate  dal momento che comporta una pressoch totale assenza di semi nei frutti  dall'altro ne limita notevolmente l'utilizzazione nei lavori di ibridazione. In this paper the results of some microscopic observations on megasporogenesis in the "Tarocco" and "Washington navel" sweet oranges, "Avana" and Clementine mandarins are reported. First of all it has been observed that in the "Avana" and Clementine mandarins embryo-sac development normally occurs up to functional egg-cell formation. Occasionally in the "Avana" mandarin two megaspore-tetrad are formed in a ovule, probably arising from twin megasporocytes. In the "Tarocco" and "Washington navel" sweet oranges  to a greater extent in the last one  the female gametophyte very often degenerates before embryo-sac development is completed. With both varieties such degeneration occurs only after the row of four megaspores has been formed, or even, occasionally, until one of the spores has divided to form the embryo-sac. This kind of female sterility, already known in the "Washington navel" orange, has been found also in the "Tarocco" orange, one of the most representative Italian Citrus varieties. From the wiewpoint of the consummer, the one general important horticultural advantage of female sterility lies in the resulting absence or scarcity of seeds, but obviously low generative fertility is a serious hindrance to the use of a variety in hybridization.

42878591|Sono provate due epoche di raccolta, la refrigerazione immediata e ritardata, quattro atmosfere e precisamente CO = 0%, O = 2,5%; CO = 3 % O = 2,5%; CO = 5%, O = 2,5%; frigorifero tradizionale. Le variabili esaminate sono: durezza e tessitura della polpa, colore di fondo della buccia, incidenza di riscaldo, di maculatura lenticellare e di marciumi. Experiment try to find out harvest and refrigeration optimum stage of maturity for C.A. (+ 3 C) and to find out the best gas mixtures. Immediate or delayed refrigeration does not give any differences as for scald, rotting, fruit firmness. Immediate refrigeration certainly improves fruit crispiness and juiciness, while on the opposite increase lenticel spot. Trials seem to recommend the following practice: sufficiently early harvest time, 12-15 days delayed storage with anti-scald treatment, 2,5 C - 3 C, controlled atmosphere storage with 3% CO and 2,5% O.

This new variety appears to be interesting owing to its early ripening time (a week before "Fortuna"), which could allow to start earlier the canning cycle of cling peaches.
42878602|Vengono riferiti i risultati di alcune prove aventi lo scopo di studiare l'azione del Cycocel sul comportamento vegetativo e produttivo di alcuni vitigni coltivati in Toscana, quali il "Sangiovese", il "Trebbiano", il "Canaiolo", la "Malvasia", la "Vernaccia" e il "Ciliegiolo". In particolare si  voluto indagare sulle possibilit offerte da tale composto nel controllo della cascola post-fiorale o  colatura  cui vanno soggette numerose variet coltivate. Dalle prove, con le quali sono state saggiate l'azione delle concentrazioni, delle epoche di somministrazione del prodotto, nonch l'effetto esercitato da applicazioni singole o ripetute 2 o 3 volte sulle medesime piante,  emerso che il CCC: 1) ha mostrato di controllare pi efficacemente la  colatura  quando somministrato alla dose di 500 ppm. 15 giorni prima della fioritura; tale trattamento ha determinato un incremento di produzione del 50% rispetto al controllo; 2) ha quasi sempre determinato una modificazione della struttura del grappolo (pi corto, con acini pi numerosi e pi piccoli del controllo) ed una riduzione del grado glucometrico del mosto; 3) ha ridotto pi o meno sensibilmente lo sviluppo dei tralci e la lunghezza degli internodi, con la sola eccezione dei trattamenti effettuati 10 giorni dopo la fioritura che non hanno mostrato variazioni rispetto al controllo; 4) tra le varie cultivar esaminate, il CCC non ha mostrato di influenzare il comportamento produttivo del "Sangiovese", mentre ne ha ridotto lo sviluppo vegetativo. A study was conducted to evaluate the effect of Cycocel on vegetative growth and production of some grape varieties cultivated in Tuscany. Particular attention was paid to the effect on coulure. The cv. "Ciliegiolo", which shows the greatest incidence of coulure among those tested, was treated with Gycocel at 500, 1000 and 1500 ppm., 15 days before bloom, at bloomtime, or 10 days after bloom, either as a single spray or repeating the spray two or three times. Results showed that: 1) the treatment with 500 ppm. of Gycocel sprayed 15 days before bloom was the most effective in reducing coulure and for that matter yields were 50% higher than in the non treated plants. 2) Cycocel treated vines produced shorter clusters, with more berries of smaller size and lower sugar content than the controls. 3) All treatments, except those carried out after bloom, caused a reduction in stem and internode length. The cv. "Sangiovese", "Trebbiano", "Canaiolo", "Malvasia" and "Vernaccia" were treated with Cycocel only at 1000 ppm. 15 days before bloom. The cv. "Sangiovese" was not affected significantly but all the others showed responses similar to those described for "Ciliegiolo".

42878605| stata esaminata la composizione minerale del melo "Golden Delicious" e del suo mutante "Starkspur Golden Delicious" durante un intero ciclo vegetativo (aprile-dicembre 1969). Differenze statisticamente significative tra la cv. di origine e il mutante spur si verificano a livello del contenuto in Ca e Mn, che presentano un maggior accumulo nel mutante spur. The chemical composition of leaves was compared between four years old trees of standard "Golden Delicious" apple and of the spurtype mutant "Starkspur" from April to December 1969. 42878606|During a number of years, the Author has conducted some researches on flowering and fruiting biology of the Comice pear, an appreciate autumnal variety, typical for its variable and often low productivity. These researches have been conducted in different places of the country surrounding Florence, Siena and Modena. They can be divided in three parts: 1) Researches concerning the macrosporogenesys - It has been followed the development of the female gametophyte, in order to control the correspondance among the different phases arid the different moments of flowering, from the beginning of the bud growing to the end of the anthesys. 2) Controlled pollinisation field trials, with pollen of diploid varieties. 3) Microscopical observations with fluorescent light on the pystil of artificially pollinised flowers in different dates in order to establish the receptivity period of the stygmas and the time required by fcondation. It has resulted that: 1) Macrosporogenesys begins very early and the ovule appears completely differenciated a little before the flower complete anthesys. It seams also that a certain number of ovules decay at different stages of their development, both when they are not yet ripened, before fecondation, and when they contain well formed embryos. The first sympthomes of that phenomenon are the very appearent differences in the embryosacs development of a same ovary. The tendency to decay of the ovule seems to be a typical character of the Comice pear (Jaumien, 1968) 2) The variety seems to be practically selfuncompatible and very little parthenocarpic. The percentage of fruiting changes following the pollinising variety and the period in whith pollinisation occurs. Among the tested varieties, best pollinisators seem to be: "Mirandino rosso", "Conference", "Clapp's Favourite", "Kaiser", "Passe Crassane ", "Williams". 3) Microscopical observations in fluorescent light have revealed the increasing degree of pollinic tubes in the stygmas, which seems to be influenced, first of all, by atmospheric temperature. Fcondation occurs generally between 24 and 48 hours after pollinisation. The period of receptivity in the stygmas is rather long (7-10) days, according to environmental conditions.
42878607|Si segnala un forte attacco di peronospora su melone (cv. "Arancino") in Umbria. La diffusione della malattia sembra correlata all'aumento delle colture di cucurbitacee e all'andamento climatico piuttosto umido verificatosi questa estate. Tentativi di contenere l'infezione con prodotti a base di rame e ditiocarbammati, non hanno dato risultati apprezzabili. Si consiglia pertanto l'introduzione di cv. resistenti. A serious attack of downy mildew on muskmelon (cv. "Arancino") in Umbria is reported. The recent spreading of the infection in this country seems related to the increase of cucurbit cultivations and humid weather of this summer. Attempts to control the disease with several cupric compounds and dithiocarbamates failed. The use of resistant varieties seems suitable.
42878608|A circa settanta anni dalla introduzione del termine clone, il suo significato  tutt'altro che chiarito. Alcuni studiosi intendono il clone un gruppo di individui geneticamente omogenei, altri un gruppo di individui non necessariamente omogenei. Da alcuni, in frutticoltura, viene attualmente seguito il primo concetto. Sulla base delle conoscenze sulla struttura dell'apice vegetativo delle piante chimeriche e della loro evoluzione nel tempo, possono essere fatte le seguenti considerazioni: 1 - nel caso in cui non si verifichino mutazioni spontanee in qualsiasi stadio della vita della pianta madre (dall'embrione alla pianta adulta), in ognuno dei suoi istogeni e negli stessi individui del clone, il clone sar geneticamente omogeneo. 2 - Quando si verificano mutazioni non rilevabili fenotipicamente, il clone risulter fenotipicamente omogeneo, ma geneticamente eterogeneo. 3 - Nel caso in cui la pianta madre che da origine a un clone sia una chimera instabile, con una mutazione vistosa in uno strato profondo e quindi non visibile, si possono avere, negli individui che ne discendono, diverse combinazioni istogenetiche. Alcune di queste combinazioni permetteranno di supporre che il clone  geneticamente eterogeneo. 4 - Quando la pianta madre chimerica  stabile e la mutazione si trova in un istogeno profondo questa pu risultare, anche se vistosa, fenotipicamente non apprezzabile. 5 -  impossibile stabilire prontamente, nelle piante da frutto, se tutti i rami e le gemme della pianta madre e degli individui del clone (che a loro volta possono divenire altrettante piante madri) siano istogeneticamente omogenei. L'omogeneit o l'eterogeneit genetica di un clone dovrebbe essere dimostrata. Ove ci fosse possibile, i cloni potrebbero essere a loro volta distinti in geneticamente  omogenei  ed  eterogenei . Il concetto di clone in frutticoltura dovrebbe quindi essere allargato e considerato un gruppo di individui geneticamente omogenei o eterogenei, ma fenotipicamente simili, discendenti per propagazione asessuata da una singola cellula o da un individuo. About seventy years after the introduction of the term clone, its meaning is not yet clear. Some scholars consider the clone as a group of individuals genetically homogeneous, others as a group of individuals not necessarily homogeneous. In fruit growing some, actually follow the first concept. On the basis of known vegetative apex structure of chimerical plants and their evolution in time, the following considerations can be formulated: 1) In case there are no spontaneous mutations in any stage of life of the mother plant (from proembryo, to adult plant) in each one of its histogenic layers and in the individuals of the clone itself, the clone will be genetically homogeneous. 2) When phenotypically irrelevant mutations occur, the clone will result phenotypically homogeneous but genetically heterogeneous. 3) When the mother plant which gives origine to a clone is an unstable chimera with a showy mutation in a deep layer and therefore not visible, in the individuals which follow several histogenetic combinations may arise. Some of these combinations will allow to suppose that the clone is genetically heterogeneous. 4) When the chimerical mother plant is stable and the mutation situated in a deep histogenic layer the latter may result phenotypically unappreciable althought showy. 5) In fruit plants it is impossible to establish promptly whether all the branches and buds of the mother plant and of the clone's individuals (which can later become other mother plants) are homogeneous histogenetically. Genetic homogeneity and heterogeneity of a clone should be demonstrated. Where this is possible the clones could in there turn be recognized as genetically homogeneous or heterogeneous. In fruit growing the concept of clone should therefore be widened and considered as a group of genetically homogeneous or heterogeneous individuals but phenotypically similar descendant by asexual propagation from a single cell or individual.
42877870|L'uso dell'acido indolacetico (IAA) quale sostanza rizogena  ormai generalizzato, mentre non sono ancora sufficientemente chiari i rapporti tra questa auxina ed altre sostanze come giberelline, kinetina, ecc. conoscenze, queste, che potrebbero migliorare la tecnica di impiego. In questa nota si riferiscono i risultati relativi all'uso dell'IAA congiuntamente a diverse sostanze quali l'acido giberellico, la kinetina, l'adenina, ecc. nel radicamento di talee di Dracaena deremensis. L'acido giberellico impiegato alle dosi di 2, 4, 8 e 16 ppm, ha avuto un'azione antagonistica con l'IAA riducendo, all'aumentare della concentrazione, l'attivit rizogena dell'auxina. I migliori risultati, nel potenziare l'azione dell'IAA si ottennero con l'aggiunta simultanea di adenina e kinetina alla concentrazione, rispettivamente, di 10 M e di 4 ppm; in tal modo la formazione di tessuto radicale sub un notevole incremento, risultando triplicato il peso fresco delle radici, nei confronti del trattamento effettuato soltanto con IAA a 10 ppm. Indoleacetic acid (IAA) is now in general use as a rhizogene substance, while the relation of this auxin to other substances such as gibberellins, kinetin, etc. are not yet sufficiently clear; obviously, such knowledge would improve the technique used. This note gives the results of using IAA together with various substances such as GA, kinetin, adenine, etc. in rooting Dracaena deremensis cuttings. GA used in doses of 2, 4, 8 and 16 ppm proved antagonistic to IAA and with the more concentrated doses, reduced the rhizogene activity of the auxin. The best results in reinforcing the action of the IAA were obtained by adding adenine and kinetin to the concentration in the doses of 10 M and 4 ppm respectively. In this way a considerable increase in the formation of the rootstock was obtained, the fresh weight of the roots being tripled as compared with those treated only with IAA at 10 ppm.
42877871|Sono state effettuate prove di radicamento di talee di rosa, aceri, magnolie ed ilex con trattamenti ormonici, impiegando la nebulizzazione intermittente e, in alcuni casi, continua, il taglio laterale alla base delle talee per gli aceri e due tipi di talee, di punta e di nodo, per le rose. L'Acer saccharinum Wierji ha risposto sfavorevolmente alla temperatura pi alta (21 C) e negativamente al taglio laterale praticato alla base della talea. I tre diversi tipi di Acer palmatum hanno avuto un comportamento in generale migliore alla temperatura pi bassa (18 C), alla dose di IBA pi elevata (2%) ed al taglio laterale. Le Magnolie hanno risposto positivamente alla dose pi elevata di IBA (2 %). La nebulizzazione continua ha favorito il radicamento di Magnolia soulangeana, quella intermittente di Magnolia stellata. Mentre Ilex crenata non ha permesso conclusioni chiare, Ilex aureomarginata ha radicato meglio con la dose pi bassa di IBA (1%) e con la temperatura pi alta; la prima specie si  avvantaggiata della nebulizzazione intermittente, la seconda di quella continua. L'aggiunta di acido naftalenacetico (0,25%) ha condotto a risultati meno soddisfacenti del solo IBA per Ilex aureomarginata. Trials were made to test the rooting ability of greenwood different cuttings of ornamental plants in different conditions of bottom heat and mist with particular preparations according to the species. Rose cultivars had reactions very different to treatments with indolebutyric acid in talc powder, applied to tip cuttings and node cuttings with different medium temperatures. The cv Generosa profited by hormonal applications; the tip cuttings rooted better than the node cuttings. The contrary was noted in the case of the cv Regina delle rose. The cv Garnet rooted easier than the other cultivars and reacted better to temperature of 18 C. rather than 25 C. Acer saccharinum wierji reacted favourably to higher temperature (21 C) and negatively to heavy wound. The different types of Acer palmatum had a better reaction to the lower temperature (18 C vs 25 G. and to IBA higher doses (2%) vs the lower (1%) and to heavy wound. The same IBA concentration favoured both Magnolia soulangeana and Magnolia stellata', constant mist was better for the first and intermittent mist for the last. Ilex crenata and Ilex aureomarginata rooted better with the lower concentration of (1%) and the higher temperature; intermittent mist favoured the first, constant mist the last.
42877872|Allo scopo di accertare l'efficacia di trattamenti a base di acido indolbutirrico (IBA) applicati nella porzione apicale e basale di talee legnose, sono state impostate alcune prove con il portainnesto clonale "Mirabolano B", propagato mediante la  tecnica del riscaldamento basale . Inoltre si  voluto indagare sul movimento dello stimolo rizogeno indotto dall'IBA mediante l'asportazione peridica di un segmento di talea della lunghezza di 2 cm. Dai risultati ottenuti  emerso quanto segue : 1) La maggiore efficacia del trattamento apicale che ha indotto una radicazione del 99%, contro 80% determinata dal trattamento basale ed il 53% del controllo. Anche il numero medio delle radici  risultato sensibilmente superiore nelle talee in cui l'IBA era stato applicato nella porzione apicale. 2) Lo stimolo rizogeno indotto dal trattamento apicale e basale migra attraverso i primi 2 cm della talea in tempi diversi; con l'applicazione apicale la maggior parte dello stimolo  disceso con movimento basipeto nelle prime 12 ore, con il trattamento basale  risalito con movimento acropeto entro 24 ore. 3) Il trattamento con IBA applicato nella parte apicale delle talee ha temporaneamente inibito la schiusura delle gemme, che viceversa sembra essere stimolata dal trattamento basale. Some experiments have been carried out in order to test the effectiveness of the IBA treatments applied to the proximal and distal ends on plum hardwood cuttings (Myrabolan B), propagated by bottom heat. Investigations on the rooting stimulus movement by periodical removal of 2 cm of the cutting segment were done. Risults showed that: 1) The IBA distal applications are more effective (99% rooting) than either proximal applications (80%) or check (53%). The number of roots was higher in distal treatments. - 2) The rooting stimulus induced by both IBA distal end proximal applications exceeded the first 2 cm of the cuttings at different times; with IBA distal application most of the stimulus goes down with basipetal movement within 12 hours, whereas with proximal application the stimulus goes up with acropetal movement within 24 hours. 3) The bud burst has been temporarily inhibited by IBA distal application and improved by IBA proximal application.

42877874|Si sono studiati gli effetti di diversi fattori sulla radicazione con la tecnica della nebulizzazione di talee erbacee di Prunus sinensis. Sono stati presi in considerazione: a) il tipo di talea (di ramo o di punta); b) l'impiego di due fitormoni rizogeni, IAA, e IBA, a diverse concentrazioni ; c) la temperatura del substrato di radicazione; d) il tipo di substrato. Le talee di punta hanno dimostrato di radicare meglio e pi facilmente di quelle di ramo; dei due ormoni provati, l'IBA si  dimostrato pi attivo dell'IAA; con entrambi gli ormoni, i migliori risultati si sono ottenuti con le pi alte concentrazioni provate, 4000 ppm, che sono apparse quasi ottimali per le talee di punta, suscettibili di ulteriore aumento per le talee di ramo; la temperatura del substrato  risultata ottimale tra i 23 e i 26 C; a temperature pi elevate corrisponde un aumento della mortalit che raggiunge il 100% a 35 C; fra i substrati impiegati si sono dimostrati pi adatti quelli esclusivamente minerali. Softwood terminal and intermediate semihardwood cuttings of Prunus sinensis alba, were treated with hydroalcoholic solutions of IBA and IAA at 0, 1.000, 2.000 and 4.000 ppm. and put under mist on six different media (sand, peat, calcined pyrophyllite and their mixtures), at five temperatures (23C, 26C, 29C, 32C, 35C). Terminal cuttings, with young leaves still growing, rooted more and better than intermediate ones; IBA treatments produced a greater percentage of rooted cuttings with more roots than IAA; concentration of 4.000 ppm. of IBA was the best for terminal cuttings, but too low for intermediate cuttings. An interaction was found among temperature of the medium, type of cutting and concentration of the hormone. Best results were obtained at 23-26 C, while at higher temperatures mortality increased to 100% at 35 C. The media in which cuttings rooted better did not contain peat.
42877875|Allo scopo di studiare i rapporti che intercorrono tra dormienza e radicazione in talee legnose di pesco, nel periodo compreso tra la met di ottobre e la fine di febbraio, sono stati prelevati, con intervalli quindicinali, rami misti della cv. "Coronet". Una parte di tali rami  stata utilizzata per la preparazione di talee (100 per tesi) che sono state trattate con IBA a 4000 ppm e sottoposte a riscaldamento basale (20 C). Le tesi differivano tra di loro per un diverso grado di degemmazione operata sull'intero tratto della talea. L'andamento della dormienza  stato osservato su un altro gruppo di rami (20 per ciascun prelevamento) posti periodicamente in una cella termostatica regolata ad una temperatura di circa 25C e 70-90% di UR, illuminata per 12 ore giornaliere a 4000 lux.  stato possibile rilevare che la radicazione delle talee presenta valori massimi prima che il fabbisogno in freddo sia stato soddisfatto. La rizogenesi presenta flessioni molto significative in corrispondenza della met di novembre e del mese di gennaio. Mentre il primo periodo sembra coincidere col momento di massima dormienza, il secondo si verifica in concomitanza con l'inizio dell'attivit delle gemme a fiore e della parziale inibizione della germogliazione. La rizogenesi  risultata quasi sempre direttamente correlata al numero delle gemme. Solo in due casi essa ne  apparsa indipendente; cio durante la massima radicazione (fine ottobre) e nel periodo di minima radicazione (gennaio). In order to study the relationships between dormancy and rooting on peach hardwood cuttings, one year old shoots of "Coronet" variety were collected at two week intervals from October 15, 1969 until the end of February 1970. At each collection date 400 cuttings (100 per thesys) about 20 cm long, were placed over bottom heat (20 C) after treatment with 4000 ppm. of IBA. Several disbudding degrees were compared. Dormancy was studied placing periodically 20 shoots in growth chamber at 25 C, 70-90% HR and 4000 lux of artificial light per 12 hours a day. Times and percentage of bud bursting were recorded at 3-4 days intervals. Rooting showed maximum level before the chilling requirent was satisfied and a minimum one in the middle of November and in January. The first low rooting period seems to be related with higher level of peach dormancy, the other one corrispond with the beginning of breaking of flower buds dormancy and partial inibition of leaf buds opening. Rooting was almost always directly related with buds number retained on cuttings. Only in two period such relationship was not found: during the period of maximum rooting (end of October) and the minimum one (January).
42877876|Chamacyparis lawsoniana flecteri is an easy to root specie in which the rooting capacity may be increased by chemical tratment and centrifugation. The cuttings show best rooting during summer time where as centrifugation increases the rooting percentage regardeless of the harvesting period. Abies picea albertiana conica is a difficult to root specie which responds fairly to chemical treatment and centrifugation. The rooting capacity is different around the year the best periods being July, September and January, March. The chemical treatments which induce the best effect are IBA alone or in combination with p-hidrossy-benzoic acid and pirogallol in the fall, IBA and pirogallol in the spring and IBA alone and in combination with phydroxy benzoic acid in summer time. The optimal chemical concentration decreases from winter to summer. In Abies picea albertiana conica IBA at 2.500 ppm, when applied either at the base or at the top of the cutting induces one of the best effects. A possible mechanism of chemical action in the rooting process will be discussed.
42877877|Prove di radicazione del noccilo con la tecnica del riscaldamento basale hanno messo in rilievo l'azione positiva dell'ANA ad alte dosi, sia da solo che combinato con IAA e IBA. L'impiego del DMSO da solo (0,1 e 1%) non modifica sostanzialmente la percentuale di radicazione, aumenta alla dose maggiore il n. radici/talea e lascia inalterato il peso secco delle radici. Impiegandolo invece assieme all'IBA (2000 e 4000 ppm) ne aumenta l'efficacia ad entrambe le dosi, ma ad un'accresciuta percentuale di radicazione si contrappone sovente una riduzione nel peso secco delle radici, nel numero delle stesse per talea e, per conseguenza, nella massa radicale delle barbatelle. Hazel propagation trials by bottom heat have shown a positive action of the high doses of NAA alone as well as combined with IAA and IBA. The DMSO alone (dosed at 0.1 and 1%) did non change the rooting percentage and the roots dry matter, but the greatest dose improve the number of roots/cutting. An improved effect of IBA (both 2000 and 4000 ppm) is got by the two doses of DMSO; unfortunetly the higher rooting percentage is often related to a reduced root dry matter as well as to a lower roots/cutting number.
42877878|Una delle difficolt che si incontrano, nel radicamento di talee di numerose specie,  quella della regolazione dell'umidit del substrato di radicamento soprattutto nelle fasi iniziali quando, per la completa assenza dell'apparato radicale, condizioni improprie dell'umidit del substrato possono causare danni alla talea o ritardi nel processo di rizogenesi. Con l'intento di fornire un contributo alla risoluzione di questo problema, vennero effettuate due esperienze di radicamento su talee di Dracaena deremensis, utilizzando quali sostanze rizogene l'acido indolbutirrico (30 ppm) e l'acido naftalenacetico (10 ppm) con tre diversi substrati (vermiculite, perlite e torba). Lo scopo principale della ricerca era quello di verificare la validit dell'impiego di sacchetti di polietilene trasparenti, nella veste di contenitori del substrato di radicazione, al confronto con la tecnica tradizionale che si avvale dell'uso di vasetti di plastica. Nei sacchetti di plastica venne introdotta una quantit di acqua calcolata e supposta sufficiente per tutto il periodo di radicamento; la chiusura del sacchetto attorno alla talea impediva la perdita di acqua per evaporazione del substrato. Le esperienze misero in evidenza la piena validit dell'impiego dei sacchetti di polietilene che evitano ogni successivo intervento irriguo, fornendo anche una notevole protezione all'apparato radicale durante le fasi di trasporto. I risultati ottenuti confermarono anche la validit dell'uso dei fitormoni nel promuovere l'attivit rizogena di questa specie. One of the difficulties met with in rooting cuttings of many kinds lies in regulating the moisture in the rooting substratum, especially in the initial phases when, in the complete absence of root formation, unfavourable conditions of moisture in the substratum may damage the cuttings or delay the process of rhizogenesis. With this problem in mind, two experiments were made on the rooting of Dracaena deremensis cuttings, using IBA at 30 ppm and NAA at 10 ppm as rhizogene substances with three different substrata (vermiculite, peat and perlite). The chief aim of the experiment was to find whether it is an advantage to use transparent polyethylene bags as containers in the rooting substratum rather than the plastic jars previously in use. A quantity of water calculated and supposed sufficient for the whole rooting period was introduced into the plastic bags; loss of water by evaporation from the substratum was prevented by closing the bags round the cuttings. The experiments showed the full advantage of using the polyethylene bags, which make any further irrigation unnecessary and provide the rootstock with considerable protection during transport. The results obtained also confirm the advantage of using auxin growth-substances to promote rhizogene activity in this species.

The  free  fraction of the shoots was the most active in changes and seems to correlate with the effect of light on floral stalk elongation. 42877880|Alberi adulti di pesco cv. "Southland" sono stati trattati con acido gibberellico (GA) a diverse concentrazioni (25, 50 e 100 ppm) ed a quattro diverse epoche (inizio e met di luglio, inizio e met di agosto). A ciascuna di tali epoche alcune branche di alberi non trattate sono state sottoposte a defogliazione. I risultati ottenuti dimostrano che l'acido gibberellico controlla la differenziazione a fiore delle gemme in misura tanto maggiore quanto pi precoce  risultata l'esecuzione del trattamento e quanto maggiore  stata la dose. Di fatto, i trattamenti effettuati ai primi di luglio (durante lo stadio cosiddetto  reversibile  dell'induzione a fiore) sono stati comunque efficaci, anche alle dosi pi basse. Quelli effettuati a met luglio sono stati efficaci solo a partire dalla 2 concentrazione (50 ppm). I trattamenti a 100 ppm ripetuti alle 4 epoche hanno quasi completamente impedito la differenziazione a fiore. Tali risultati, discussi anche in base ai rilievi effettuati sulla mortalit delle gemme, sulla cascola e sulla allegagione dei frutti, nonch sulla pezzatura dei frutti raccolti, portano alla pratica conclusione che attraverso una differenziazione controllata delle gemme pu essere limitato l'onere del diradamento dei frutti nella primavera successiva. Gli Autori si soffermano anche sull'interpretazione biologica dell'effetto dell'acido gibberellico, specie per quanto riguarda la modifica dei rapporti esistenti fra gemme a fiore e gemme a legno ed il comportamento di queste ultime nell'annata successiva. Matures peach trees, cv. "Southland", have been treated by GA at 25, 50 and 100 ppm at four different times (July 3, July 18, August 2, August 20). The results have shown that the chemical control of the flower buds differentiation is directly related to the earliness of the tratment and to its rate. In fact the tratments at July 3 were effective starting from the lower concentration, while, those at July 18 were effective starting from 50 ppm. Four replicated treatments at 100 ppm prevented almost completely the flower buds differentiation. On the basis of these results (flower buds drop, fruit set, fruit drop, fruit size at harvest, a.s.o.), the Authors demonstrate the commercial possibility of a chemical control of flower buds differentiation in order to reduce or to avoid fruit hand thinning in the following spring.

42877883|Con lo scopo di studiare la modificazione della reazione al fotoperiodo in una cultivar di crisantemo per fiore reciso ("Yellow Spider 2275") sono stati sperimentati: IAA (100 e 400 ppm), NAA (100 e 200 ppm), NAAm (100 e 200 ppm) e NAAm in combinazione con GA 3 (50 + 50 e 100 + 100 ppm) in confronto a due tesi testimoni (una senza modificazione della lunghezza del giorno e l'altra con le prime quattro settimane di coltura a giorno lungo). Nelle tesi con NAAm si  avuta una clorosi tardiva che  persistita fino alla raccolta. With the idea of studying the modification of the reaction to the photoperiod in a chrysanthemum cultivar for cut flowers ("Yellow Spider 2275"), IAA (100 and 400 ppm), NAA (100 and 200 ppm), NAAm (100 and 200 ppm) and NAAm combined with GA (50 + 50 and 100 + 100 ppm) were tested in comparison to two control test (one without modifying day length and the other with the first four week of cultivation with long days). The growth substances were administered three times a week for the first four weeks of cultivation. In the tests with IAA and NAA, after one week from the beginning of tratment phytotoxic phenomena (leaf edge primpling and twisting of small leaves and successive chlorosis) appeared, but then disappeared at the end of treatment. In tests with NAAm there was a late-forming chlorosis which lasted until harvesting. The results obtained indicate that growth substances cause effects similar to those of the long day as regards to flower differentiation. In particular, NAA at both dosages and IAA at 400 ppm caused later blooming than artificial lengthening of the day. In plants treated with NAA, especially at 100 ppm, there was also greater stem length and in all plants treated with growth substances there was greater inflorescences. Best results have provided by NAA and IAA 100 ppm.

In 1967 the following treatments were compared: a) one spray every year about 50 days after full bloom at 5000 ppm of CCC; b) two spays every year at 5000 ppm of CCC as in a), followed by a second 40 days later; c) control. Treatments compared in 1968 were: a) one spray about 50 days after full bloom at 2500 ppm of CCC; b) as a)  the same spray 40 days later; c) one spray about 50 days after full bloom at 5000 ppm of CCC; d) as c) + the same spray 40 days later; e) control. In both trials, CCC sprays caused a considerable growth reduction. In the spring following the sprays, the sprayed trees showed sympyoms of residual effect of CCC and the growth was notably reduced. The bigger crop obtained in trees sprayed with CCC are probably due to a reduced nutritional competition between shoots and flowers during the set and the first stage of the fruits development. Differences between the treatments 2500 and 5000 ppm were not essential. More evident the differences between 1 and 2 sprays concerning the growth.

E stato possibile mettere in evidenza come il CCC favorisca in certi casi la schiusura di un limitato numero di gemme a legno anche nel periodo di massima dormienza (novembre). In seguito, quando con l'avvento dei primi freddi la dormienza delle gemme a legno  quasi completamente interrotta, il Cycocel inibisce parzialmente la schiusura di queste. Successivamente, i primi di gennaio, quando con l'inizio della schiusura delle gemme a fiore si ha una diminuzione della germogliazione, il Cycocel annulla questi fenomeni competitivi, stimolando anzi a certe concentrazioni la fioritura. A partire da questo momento quando le migliorate condizioni climatiche esterne favoriscono il rapido sviluppo delle gemme, i trattamenti con Cycocel non hanno pi alcuna influenza. In order to test the effectiveness of Gycocel on blossom delay of fruit trees, trials were carried out on "Coronet" peach variety, dipping one year snoots (12 per treatment), excised bimonthly from November 15 till the end of February, in aqueous solutions of Cycocel at 0, 2000, 4000, 6000, 8000, 10.000 ppm concentrations. Treated shoots were placed in little pots filled with wet quartzi sand into a growth chamber 25 C, 70-90% R. H. with 12 hours plus one of cool white fluorescent ligth at 4000 lux. In the same time shoots, excised from "Okinawa" and "Cardinal" peach trees, sprayed on November 16, 1970, were subjected to the same conditions. Times and percentage of buds bursting have been recorded at 3-4 days intervals. Substantial informations were obtanied on the different chilling and heat requirements of leaf and flower buds on the three peach varieties, which show different degrees of dormancy. Cycocel treatments dont showed any practical or steady influence on the opening buds date. However this growth regulator in some cases promoted the bursting of a few number of leaf buds, also in the period of maximum dormancy (November). Later on, when the first cold spells came, the leaf buds dormancy is almost completely broken, Cycocel partially inhibited their opening. Subsequently, early, in January, when a decrease in leafbud opening corresponded with the beginning of the flower- bud burst, Cycocel undid these competitive effects and promoted flowering in certain cases. After that, when the weather improved inducing bud growth, Cycocel treatments ceased have any effect.

In this cultivar an excessive development in height was also noted, especially when not exposed to light. The number of flowers per plant was also modified in a different way by lighting: in "Gay Anne "the highest number was seen with one week of lighting, in "Festival" with no lighting and in "Mandalay" no differences in this respect were noted. Alar does not seen to have acted on the number of flowers per plant.

In tutte le tesi trattate si  riscontrato aborto dei fiori pistillati formatisi nelle prime 3-4 settimane dal trattamento. I fiori femminili presentavano peduncolo allungato ed ovario di forma ellitica, caratteri che hanno influenzato la morfologia dei frutti. Entrambi i trattamenti hanno causato inoltre uno sviluppo stentato delle piante, raccorciamento degli internodi e riduzione del lembo fogliare, accompagnati da fenomeni fitotossici. Alle concentrazioni pi basse si  realizzata una demasculinizzazione meno efficace: i primi fiori maschili sono comparsi dopo 19 giorni dal trattamento, i primi fiori ermafroditi dopo 4 o 5 settimane (3 settimane nel testimone) mentre non sono comparsi fiori femminili. Muskmelon cultivars, "Doublon", "Tzier 3967" and "Orlinabel" cultivated in glasshouse were treated with Ethrel (in 48% of 2-cloroethylphosphonic acid) on the appearence of the first flower buds. The concentrations tested were 0-600-1200 ppm and 0-150-300 ppm in two distinct tests. At the highest concentrations, there was a notable inhibition of the formation of pistillate flowers which appeared 34 days after treatment (17 in the controls) and in differing numbers in the three cultivars. At the same concentrations, male flowers appeared 7 weeks after treatment and in very limited numbers. At 1200 ppm in the "Doublon" and "Orlinabel" cultivars there was a phase (at 34 days from treatment) in which only female flowers were present. In all tests, pistillate flowers that formed in the first 34 weeks from treatment aborted. Female flowers presented an elongated stalk and elliptical ovary, characteristics that influence fruit morphology. Furthermore, both treatments caused stunded plant development, internode shortening and leaf reduction, all accompanied by phytotoxic phenomena. At lower concentrations, there was a less effective demasculinization; the first male flowers appeared 19 days after treatment and the first hermaphrodites after 4 or 5 weeks (3 weeks in the controls), while female flowers did not appear.

B-Nine (1500-3000 ppm di p.a.) e Alar (3000-6000 ppm di p.a.). 42877891|Nell'ambito di ricerche effettuate nel 1971 per accertare la possibilit di stabilire l'epoca opportuna per i trattamenti diradanti sul melo (cv. "Golden Delicious") in base alla dimensione dei frutti, vennero eseguiti una serie di trattamenti con amide dell'acido alfa-naftilacetico (80 ppm) e con 1-naftil-N-metilcarbamato (1250 ppm) dal 10 al 28 maggio 1971, ad intervalli di 2-3 giorni (10, 12, 14, 17, 20, 22, 25 e 28 maggio). Osservazioni effettuate per accertare l'influenza esercitata dai due prodotti sulla differenziazione a fiore hanno messo in evidenza che le due sostanze avevano influito su tale processo, seppure in modo differente, e cio: a) lo NMC ha favorito la differenziazione a fiore, determinando differenze significative rispetto al controllo, solo nel trattamento pi precoce, mentre lo NAD ha esercitato tale effetto con i trattamenti effettuati il 10, il 12, il 14 ed il 25 maggio; b) i trattamenti con NMC effettuati nelle ultime quattro epoche hanno avuto effetto negativo sulla differenziazione a fiore; c) gli alberi trattati con NAD hanno differenziato a fiore in misura maggiore di quelli trattati con NMC; d) nell'anno successivo ai trattamenti la produzione , in linea generale, risultata maggiore negli alberi trattati con NAD, rispetto a quelli trattati con NMC. Tenuto conto che lo NMC ha diradato i frutticini in misura maggiore, o almeno uguale, allo NAD, gli Autori avanzano l'ipotesi che tale sostanza abbia esercitato un'azione ostacolante direttamente il processo di antogenesi. Thinning sprays of NAD (at 80 ppm) and NMC (at 1,250 ppm) have been made on bearing trees of "Golden Delicious" at intervals of 2-3 days, beginning 17 days after full bloom, i. e. on May 10th, 12th, 14th, 17th, 20th, 22nd, 25th and 28th, 1971. Observations on repeat bloom have ascertained that: a) both NAD and NMC sprays affected the mixed buds differentiation on the year of their application; b) trees sprayed with NAD on 10th, 12th, 14th and 25th May differentiated more mixed buds than the control and the NMC sprayed trees; c) trees sprayed with NMC on 10th May differentiated more, and trees sprayed at the last four dates differentiated lesser mixed buds than the control trees; d) in the year following the treatments, the crop (both number and total weight of fruits per tree) was higher on the trees sprayed with NAD. Authors suppose that the NMC may have inhibited directly the mixed buds induction, considering that the intensity of thinning of NMC was higher or at least equal to that of NAD.
42877892|An aqueous treatment of FUdR, FUdR + TdR, TdR (5-fluorodeoxy uridine and thymidine) was administered at the 10- concentration at a 10 days interval since Oct. 17, 1969 up to several termination dates falling, on December 17, and January 18 respectively into and after the inducton period.
