42878128|The effect of various ethylene-releasing products on the reduction of olive fruit removal force (FRF), was studied under field conditions. The effect on both irrigated and non-irrigated varieties was tested. No clear cut influence of temperature and humidity on the activity was found. High temperature accompanied by low humidity had a tendency to reduce ethephon activity. Low-volume application resulted in a satisfactory reduction of the FRF in most cases, even without an increase in concentration, but increased consistently the amount of leaf drop. L'effetto dei vari prodotti etilen-promotori come Ethephon, Alsol e BASF-78-525X fu esaminato in diverse condizioni ambientali e colturali al fine di ridurre la resistenza al distacco delle olive. Gli studi furono condotti in oliveti commerciali intensivi, irrigati e non. Le variet maggiormente studiate furono "Manzanilla", "Suri" e "Nabali". In generale l'azione dell'Alsol e dell'Ethephon fu piuttosto simile su oliveti di "Manzanilla" sia nella pianura della costa che nella valle interna di Bet She'an. Nella maggior parte dei casi l'Alsol ebbe la pi alta efficacia nel ridurre la forza di distacco (F R F) delle drupe, inducendo soltanto una debole defogliazione. Le concentrazioni ottimali dei due prodotti calcolate su base molare furono all'incirca uguali. Non fu trovata una chiara influenza della temperatura e dell'umidit sull'attivit dei due prodotti. Alte temperature, accompagnate da bassa umidit, ridussero per qualche volta l'attivit dell'Ethephon. Sembra che le applicazioni serali fossero le pi efficienti, particolarmente con Ethephon. Applicazioni a basso volume risultarono soddisfacenti nel ridurre la FRF, sebbene qualche volta inferiori ai trattamenti a pieno volume. L'incremento della concentrazione del prodotto attivo nei trattamenti a basso volume ebbe soltano un minimo effetto sulla sua efficacia. Questo risult sia per l'Ethephon che per l'Alsol quando furono applicati alla cv "Manzanilla" irrigata e alla cv "Nabali" non irrigata. Fu stabilito anche che l'Ethephon tamponato ebbe un pi rapido e forte effetto nel ridurre la FRF. La debole risposta della cv "K-1" con applicazioni a basso volume di Ethephon a 1200 ppm non fu superata nemmeno con Ethephon tamponato a PH 7.
42878129|Onion plants (cv "Massese") were subjected to two light regimes of 8 and 16 hours of light. Long day conditions induce bulb formation in the onion plants. Long day and short day plants show the same concentration of ethylene. Growth promoting substances, investigated by mean wheat coleoptile bioassay, increase in long day plants during the first 14 days of treatment, thereafter reaching the level found in short day plants. Neutral growth inhibiting substance(s) found at the Rf 0.7-0.9 increases under long day conditions. La formazione del bulbo, nella cipolla, avviene in condizioni di giorno lungo, mentre in giorno breve la pianta continua a crescere vegetativamente ed a produrre nuove foglie. Giovani piante di cipolle (cv "Massese") sono state sottoposte a due regimi fotoperiodici: 8 e 16 ore di luce. Le piante sottoposte a fotoperiodo induttivo e non induttivo mostrano le medesime concentrazioni di etilene, per cui non  possibile stabilire alcuna correlazione tra concentrazione di etilene e formazione del bulbo. L'attivit delle sostanze promotrici la crescita in "grano coleoptile assay", aumenta nelle piante sotto giorno lungo, nei primi 14 giorni di trattamento, ma cade, subito dopo, al di sotto del livello trovato nelle piante sotto condizioni di giorno breve. Nella fase basica dell'estratto etereo di piante sottoposte a giorno lungo si  rilevato agli Rf7-9 attivit inibente il coleoptile di grano. Questa attivit inibenteaumenta fino a raggiungere un massimo al momento della raccolta sia nel germo di grano che nelle guaine. Nelle piante in condizioni fotoperiodiche non induttive, non  stata riscontrata alcuna inibizione.
42878130|In un confronto fra meli "Richared" su portainnesto "franco" e "M 9" vennero eseguite prove di impollinazione artificiale alla schiusura dei petali, a piena fioritura e all'inizio della caduta dei petali. La allegagione fu inferiore sul "franco" a tutte tre le date. Su entrambi i portainnesti essa fu massima alla prima e minima all'ultima data di impollinazione. Venne eseguita l'analisi al microscopio dei sacchi embrionali dei fiori prelevati alle tre date. Essa indica che gi alla piena fioritura si osserva la degenerazione del sacco embrionale in una certa percentuale di fiori. Questa percentuale  molto forte all'inizio della caduta dei petali. In ogni caso il numero di fiori con sacco embrionale degenerato fu superiore in entrambe le date sul portainnesto vigoroso. Questi risultati collimano con la riduzione di allegagione osservata nelle prove. Si suggerisce che la degenerazione del sacco embrionale sia uno dei motivi della insufficiente allegagione della Richared. In a comparison of  Richared  apple trees on  seedling  and  M 9  rootstocks, hand pollination trials were executed at petal opening, full bloom and petal fall. Fruit set was inferior on the  seedling  rootstock on any pollination date. On both rootstocks a maximum fruit set was reached on the first date and a minimum on the last one. An analysis of the embryo sac was executed in flowers picked on the three dates. Embryo sac degeneration was observed in a certain percentage of flowers already at full bloom, but was emphasized at petal fall. On both dates embryo sac degeneration was more noteworthy on the vigorous rootstock. These results tally with the observed fruit set. It is suggested that embryo sac degeneration might partly account for insufficient fruit set in  Richared .
42878131|A single experimental design was performed to study the amount of cross pollination between untreated (male) and Ethrel treated (female) plants, when the distance of male parents varied from 1 to 7 rows (the distance between the rows spaced 1 meter). A dominant color fruit character (dark green stripes on a lighter green background) of the male untreated parents, was used as marker. No relationship was found between both seed production and cross pollination versus the male parents distance. The amount of cross pollination was: 91%. Poich non esistono dati quantitativi sull'ammontare dell'auto-impollinazione in piante trattate con Ethrel, si  impostato un esperimento basato sull'uso di un carattere marcatore (frutto striato). Si sono impiegate due linee: "Alberello Sarzanese" che produce frutti che all'antesi sono verde chiaro e "Striata d'Italia" che presenta frutti di colore verde con striature scure. Il carattere striatura  dominante sul carattere verde. La cv. "Alberello Sarzanese"  stata trattata con Ethrel (350 p.p.m.) allo stadio di I e 2 foglia vera ed  stato usato come linea portaseme. La cv. "Striata d'Italia" era allevata naturalmente senza alcun trattamento con fitoregolatori ed era usata come linea portapolline. La fecondazione incrociata cos ottenuta era pari al 91%. Nessuna relazione  stata riscontrata tra produzione del seme, impollinazione incrociata e distanza dalla linea parentale maschile, fino a 7 file di distanza.
42878135|Experiments in pea seedlings were performed in order to elucidate the possible role of "hormone directed transport" in regulating apical dominance. Auxin and cytokinin morphogenetic effects were related to the labelled assimilates distribution in inhibited and released lateral buds. Research clearly indicates that lateral bud release from apical dominance is always preceded by an increased assimilated accumulation at lateral meristems. IAA is effective in restoring apical dominance in decapitated plants, but only when applied immediately after decapitation and at an high, non-physiological amount. In such conditions IAA caused an assimilates accumulation at the stem segment just below the cut surface. Benzyladenine applied directly to the axillary meristems enhanced the lateral buds outgrowth and reduced apical dominance; a less dramatic, but similar effect was seen when BA was given to the root system. The stimulating effect of cytokinin on leaf photosynthetic efficiency was also confirmed. These results support the concept of nutrient competition as a basic mechanism in regulating apical dominance; this phenomenon, as well as other inhibitive correlations, can be regulated by environmental and chemical factors in that they are able to affect organs sink activity and growth correlations among different sinks. Nell'ambito del programma di studi volti a chiarire gli aspetti fisiologici della dominanza apicale, sono state intraprese su pisello alcune ricerche per verificare il ruolo che l'" hormone direct transport" svolge nella regolazione del fenomeno. In particolare sono stati messi in relazione gli effetti morfogenetici delle auxine e delle citochinine con la distribuzione degli assimilati in gemme laterali sbloccate e inibite. Per quanto riguarda gli effetti delle auxine, i risultati degli esperimenti indicano che lo IAA  in grado di ristabilire la dominanza apicale in piante cimate solo se applicato immediatamente dopo la decapitazione e in concentrazioni molto elevate, certamente non fisiologiche. Il ripristino della dominanza apicale provocato dallo IAA  accompagnato da un accumulo degli assimilati marcati nel tratto di fusto adiacente alla superficie di decapitazione; ci  prevenuto se, unitamente allo IAA viene applicato anche un inibitore del suo trasporto (TIBA). Nelle condizioni in cui lo IAA si rivela incapace di ristabilire la dominanza apicale, lo sblocco dei meristemi laterali  sempre preceduto da un maggior accumulo di assimilati marcati a livello del nodo sottostante la superficie di decapitazione. Per quanto riguarda gli effetti esercitati dalle citochinine, i risultati degli esperimenti, che prevedevano trattamenti con BA direttamente alle gemme ascellari e all'apparato radicale, indicano che l'ormone  in grado di ridurre la dominanza apicale, esaltando il germogliamento delle gemme laterali di piante intatte. I dati riguardanti la distribuzione degli assimilati evidenziano un maggior accumulo di metaboliti marcati nelle regioni trattate con BA. Sembra possibile che in presenza di pi elevate concentrazioni di citochinina, la gemma ascellare diventi un centro di mobilizzazione pi attivo, al punto di competer con l'apice nella distribuzione degli assimilati provenienti dai centri di mobilizzazione. Analogamente a tutti gli altri fenomeni di correlazione tra organi, la dominanza apicale appare dunque il risultato dei rapporti che si stabiliscono tra l'attivit dei diversi centri di mobilizzazione e di accumulo degli assimilati nella pianta. Il meristema apicale e quelli laterali di una pianta in accrescimento sono centri metabolici e di mobilizzazione che presentano per indici di attivit diversi. La maggior capacit di richiamo metabolico dell'apice rispetto a quella esercitata dalle gemme ascellari costituirebbe un meccanismo fondamentale attraverso cui agisce la dominanza apicale. Tale fenomeno pu pertanto essere regolato da fattori ormonali e ambientali nella misura in cui essi modificando l'attivit dei centri di mobilizzazione e di accumulo, regolano anche i rapporti di inibizione tra questi.
42878136| stata effettuata una prova di conservazione di mele esaminando l'effetto della lecitina, del confezionamento in sacchetti di polietilene e della durata della prematurazione prima della refrigerazione sulla comparsa dell'imbrunimento epidermico, del raggrinzimento, della perdita di peso e dei marciumi. Lecithin treatment caused reduction of weight loss and of shrivelled fruits, but not of browning and of rot. Apples wrapped in polyethylene bags were not shrivelled, but showed more rotten fruits and retarded yellowing of skin.
42878137| stata isolata una mutazione gemmaria della cultivar "Mirandino rosso" che presenta alcune caratteristiche morfologiche e biologiche diverse dalla cultivar originaria. In particolare, la "forma" mutata presenta internodi pi raccorciati, foglie, fiori e frutti pi grandi. Altri caratteri favorevoli invece sono rimasti stabili, come l'epoca precoce di maturazione dei frutti, le caratteristiche organolettiche, la conservabilit e la resistenza all'ammezzimento dei frutti stessi. Dalle osservazioni sulla biologia fiorale la nuova "forma"  risultata anch'essa praticamente autoincompatibile e incapace di produrre sufficientemente per via partenocarpica. Tra le cultivar saggiate sono risultate buone impollinatrici le seguenti:  Passa Crassana", "Conference", "Abate Ftel", "Mirandino rosso" e "William" che hanno determinato una percentuale di allegagione superiore od uguale a quella ottenuta dalla libera impollinazione. Inoltre, dalle indagini sulla microsporogenesi  emerso che il "Mirandino rosso mutato" al contrario della cultivar originaria presenta un andamento anomalo del processo meiotico, con produzione di granuli di polline disformi e scarsamente germinabili. Infine, per quel che riguarda il corredo cromosomico, la cv. "Mirandino rosso"  risultata diploide, mentre la "forma" mutata sembra essere "tetraploide".

42878139|Peach trees cv.  Southland  provided with high fruit set (more than 3.500 fruits per tree), were submitted to an early hand thinning, to reduce the fruits number till 3.500-2.500 and 1.000 per tree. CEPA at 60 ppm has been applied at the same time of hand thinning or 20 days later. The fruit chemical thinning has been stronghly influenced by the  fruit charge  of the trees: with an higher number of fruits, the fruit drop percentage induced by CEPA has been greater. Within certain limits, it seems that the tree might influence the fruit drop modifying its "physiological response to the chemical compound" and or its "natural fruit drop potential": that means the amount of the dropped fruits (by a preliminary hand thinning and a subsequent chemical thinning) tend to reach quite similar or equivalent levels.

The plants were first separated into divisions. Each division was reduced to a bud piece measuring 0,5-1,0 cm in length. After the disinfection, the bud piece was cut further until a 2-3 mm. tall shoot-tip was obtained and then it was transferred into a nutrient tube. The medium of Murashige et al.(1974 (Tab. 1) was used with the addition of kinetin 10 mg/l, zeatin riboside 1,3 mg/l, zeatin 1,6 mg/l and IAA 0,5 mg/l. The shoottip grows into divisions. The unrooted divisions were satisfactory for further culture and increase in vitro. The nutrient medium without citokinine with the addition of NAA 0,5 mg/l and 1 mg/l enhances the rooting in the miniature divisions. 42878146|Vengono riportate le indagini condotte da vari anni allo scopo di studiare la possibilit di coltivare " in vitro " i meristemi apicali di alcuni vitigni del Chianti. Le difficolt iniziali, rappresentate principalmente dalla determinazione del periodo pi opportuno per il prelievo dei meristemi e dalla composizione del substrato colturale, sono state in parte risolte con la messa a punto di una tecnica di coltura. Tale tecnica viene descritta sommariamente mettendo in evidenza alcuni aspetti di particolare rilievo, quali l'allestimento del materiale vegetale per gli espianti, nonch la composizione dei substrati impiegati. Alcuni risultati favorevoli sono stati ottenuti, specie con le cv. " Sangiovese " e " Malvasia nera ", ma il numero delle piantine vitali finora ottenute  piuttosto basso. Tuttavia la maggior parte degli espianti ha dimostrato un discreto grado di differenziazione e solamente in pochi casi si  notata assenza di sviluppo. Researches have been conducted for some years to investigate the possibility of growing " in vitro " shoot tip meristems of Chianti vine varieties. The greatest difficulties, mainly the most suitable period for the material collection and the choice of the cultural substrate, have been partially resolved by the setting of a special cultural technique, of which a synthetic description is given. Some of the most important aspects are the sterilizations and dressing of the expiants and the composition of the substrate. Encouraging results, particularly with " Malvasia nera " and " Sangiovese " cvs., seem to favour the possibility to grow " in vitro " tha shoot tip meristems of Vitis vinifera L. The number of the obtained plantules is reduced, at present although the majority of the explants showed a good differentiation degree, while only a few cases failed to develop. We consider this work as a starting point for more detailed research concerning particularly the composition of the most suitable substrate composition for the different cultivars.
42878147|A study has been carried out in the Sele river area (Southern Italy) for establishing the appropriate quantities and ratios of nitrogen, phosphorus and potattium in fertilization of summer squash grown in heated greenhouse during October - May period. In comparison with the unfertilized control, eight treatments obtained for factorial combination of two levels (150 e 300 kg/ha) of N, PO e KO were tested. In each treatment the same amounts of mineral fertilizers were applied every year determined by the scheme of the experiment. In the first year the yield of variants manured with different rates of mineral fertilizers exceeded that of the control; in the next year most of the variants manured with 150 Kg/ha of N did not differ significantly from the control. In both years, however, the variants manured with 300 kg/ha of N exceeded the corrisponding variants with 150 Kg/ha of N. The highest level of phosporus (300 kg/ha of PO) was generally favourable to the production: the effect on fruit yield was, however, much smaller than in the nitrogen. Yield response to added 300 kg/ha of KO occurred only in the first year and resulted a little difference on average of two years. This in connection, probably, to the high values of available potassium in the soil. The positive effects were due as increases both in the number of fruit for plant in their mean weight.

42878149| stato studiato l'effetto che la bagnatura ha sulla radicazione di talee portinnesti di vite (5BB e 140 R) a diversa capacit rizogena. I risultati ottenuti confermano l'azione favorevole dell'acqua di bagnatura sulla rizogenesi in ambedue i portinnesti e l'effetto positivo sulla formazione di germogli nel 140 R. Inoltre si rileva che i parametri della radicazione nel 140 R, trattato con le acque del 5BB, non vengono modificati, ed il germogliamento viene inibito; quando il 5BB viene trattato con l'acqua del 140 R, si ha uno stimolo nell'allungamento delle radici e dei germogli. Il lavoro  stato eseguito con la collaborazione di L. Petrelli. The effect of steeping in water on rooting of vine rootstock cuttings (5BB and 140 R) with different rooting ability has been studied. The results obtained confirm the favourable action of steeping in water on the rooting of both rootstocks and on shoot formation of 140 R. Furthermore in thas been found that the rooting parameters of 140 R treated with 5BB water, were not modified, while shoot-development was inhibited; when 5BB was treated with 140 R's water a lengthening of both shoot and roots occurred. Centrifugation at 3500 rpm for 60' favours rooting of 5BB only, providing the cuttings had not been previously steeping. Centrifugation combined with steeping in water is negative for both rootstocks, more so for 140 R. It appears that steeping in water promotes root formation favouring a hormone balance inside the cutting, and that the eliminated substances are strictly connected with the internal composition of the plant.

42878156|In winter 1973-74 SADH was applied on December 28, January 15, February 21 and March 18 to mature  Cardinal " peach trees, at concentration of 10,000 ppm. Single treatments were able to delay flower buds opening by 3-4 days. Repeated applications gave a higher inhibitory effect ranging from 4-5 days. Likewise, leaf bud opening was delayed by 4-8 days with SADH applied at single and repeated doses. Earliest treatments showed to delay flower buds but not leaf buds opening; it was the contrary for latest applications. SADH applications reduced the percentage of flower buds opening; fruit set decreased by treatment repeated 4 times. Al fine di saggiare l'effetto del SADH sul ritardo dell'epoca di fioritura del pesco, cv. "Cardinal", nell'inverno 1973-74, sono stati effettuati, in epoche diverse (28 dicembre, 15 gennaio, 21 febbraio, 8 marzo), trattamenti singoli e ripetuti con SADH alla concentrazione di 10.000 ppm. I trattamenti singoli hanno determinato un ritardo di schiusura delle gemme a fiore di circa 3-4 giorni; quelli ripetuti hanno mostrato un maggior effetto posticipando la fioritura di 4-5 giorni. Anche le gemme a legno sono state influenzate dai trattamenti e sono schiuse 4-5 giorni dopo quelle di controllo. Le somministrazioni di SADH effettuate precocemente hanno mostrato un'azione ritardante sulla schiusura delle gemme a fiore, ma non su quella delle gemme a legno; il contrario  stato osservato per le applicazioni tardive. I trattamenti, specialmente quelli ripetuti, hanno ridotto la percentuale di fioritura.

42878158|Nel corso di due anni si  studiata l'evoluzione della dormienza in tre cultivar di albicocco: "Reale dimoia", "Perfection" e "Luizet" prendendo nota dei tempi medi e delle percentuali di schiusura delle gemme a legno ed a fiore presenti su rami misti posti direttamente e periodicamente in cella climatica (25 C) e conservati per tempi crescenti in cella frigorifera (5 C) prima di essere posti nelle condizioni sopraindicate. Si  inoltre seguita l'evoluzione del peso della materia secca delle gemme a fiore prelevate ogni 7-9 giorni su 3 differenti produzioni fruttifere (dardi fioriferi, rami misti e rami anticipati di queste tre variet). Nelle diverse prove  emerso che la quantit di calore necessaria per la schiusura delle gemme , in un primo periodo, inversamente correlata al freddo ricevuto. La quantit minima di calore necessaria per la fioritura fu raggiunta solo quando le gemme ricevettero, all'esterno o in cella frigorifera, 70-80 Unit di freddo, a seconda delle cultivar. Anche il peso secco delle gemme prelevate in campo inizi ad aumentare sensibilmente dopo tali quantit di freddo. La data di fioritura, una volta che le gemme hanno raggiunto una quantit di freddo determinata (U.F.) sembrerebbe essere legata ad una precisa quantit di calore che, nell'ambiente considerato, sarebbe risultata per una stessa cultivar, per altre un decennio abbastanza costante (370 U.C.). Il punto inizale per calcolare le unit in caldo necessarie per la fioritura  stabilito in unit in freddo secondo il metodo esponenziale proposto da Bidab. Tale momento sembra corrispondere al massimo di azione delle basse temperature trovate in laboratorio nell'ambiente considerato. La percentuale delle gemme che schiudono non sembra essere regolata dalla stessa legge, ma piuttosto da una azione combinata di pi fattori. During two fall-winter periods trials had been carried out, to study the dormancy on three apricot varieties: 'Reale d'Imola', 'Perfection' and 'Luizet'. Mean time and percentage of leaf and flower buds opening were recorded on excised shoots, collected periodically and placed into a growth chamber (25 C) or stored for increasing times into a cool chamber (5 C) before passing to the aforesaid condition. In addition, on those varieties the dry weight of flower buds samples, collected every 7 days on three different types of wood (spurs, one year shoots, feathers) was determined. In the different trials it was stated that the amount of heat required for bud opening is, in a first stage, inversely related to the amount of chilling received. The minimum and constant level of heat required for flowering was reached only when the buds received, outside or in a cool chamber, 70-80 Chilling Units according to the variety. The buds collected in the orchard began to increase, appreciably, their dry weight only after this level of chilling. Therefore, the blooming date depends not only on the chilling requirement of the variety, but also on an appointed heat requirement. If the daily temperatures are expressed as exponential actions, according to Bidab, those requirements result, in our climatic condition, constant enough. Observations on phenoclimatological data collected for 11 years on 'Reale d'Imola' confirmed that this variety requires 370 H.U. for flowering.
42878164|Al secondo anno di impianto,  stata controllata la produzione (numero dei fiori e lunghezza media dello stelo) di piante delle cv. "Carla" e "Baccar" allevate secondo quattro differenti schemi di potatura di formazione, parte messe gi in produzione al primo anno di impianto e parte solo al secondo.  emerso che lo schema di potatura di allevamento influenza non solo lo sviluppo della pianta ma anche la produzione; che lo sfruttamento delle piante fin dal primo anno di coltura influenza negativamente la precocit della prima fioritura nella primavera successiva, diminuendo il numero di fiori prodotti ma non la loro lunghezza e che la cv. "Baccar" risente pi della cv. "Carla" dello sfruttamento precoce. La sistematica precoce eliminazione dei boccioli fiorali portati da rami corti, determina un significativo aumento della lunghezza media degli steli. In the first year after frafting young "Baccar" and "Carla" plants were subjected to the 4 following pruning treatments: 1) Shoots were cut above 3 or 4 buds, when they were about 30 cm long. This is the usual pruning method of young roses in our Country. 2) Shoots were pinched above the third five-leaflet leaf as soon as it developed. 3) Shoots were pinched above the 6th leaf. 4) Only flower buds were removed as soon as they appeared. Treatment (1) gave the worst results: the plants had a poor development with a little number of leaves and primary branches; unpruned plants (treatment 4), had a growth twice as much as usually pruned plants (treatment 1). Treatments 2 and 3 gave intermediate results. At the end the of the usual training period, in August, half plants of each plot stopped to be pruned and started flower production, and half continued to be pruned and production was delayed to the following spring. In the second year, ech subplot was divided into two parts: the plants of a part were subjected to traditional disbudding (removal of later flower buds), while on the plants of the other part, besides lateral flower buds, also flower buds produced by weak or short shoots, that could not become salable flowers, were removed as soon as they appeared. Training method influenced not only plant growth but also flower production. Flowering of plants in the first year had a negative effect on earliness of flowering in the next spring, since number of flowers produced was significantly lower for plants already exploited in the previous summer, particularly for cv. Baccar; stem length was not affected. Cv. Carla, more vigorous than cv. Baccar suffered less from flowering in the first year. Regular removal of flower buds produced on small branches induced a remarkable increase of mean stem length of marketable flowers.

42878167|Le acque di bagnatura di talee di due portinnesti di vite caratterizzati da diversa capacit rizogena, sono state saggiate su tessuti di rizoma di Helianthus tuberosus, var. Violet de Rennes, coltivati "in vitro". Questi tessuti formano radici solo se messi in presenza di sostanze auxiniche. Abbiamo evidenziato che il liofilizzato di entrambe le acque di bagnatura saggiate da solo non induce formazione di radici, sembrerebbe pertanto da escludersi la presenza di sostanze di tipo auxinico, per lo meno in quantit sufficiente ad essere rivelata con questo test. Il liofilizzato dell'acqua del 140R aggiunto ad NAA provoca una diminuzione del numero medio delle radici alterandone l'aspetto morfologico (radici ipertronche) soprattutto alla dose maggiore. Il liofilizzato dell'acqua di bagnatura del 5BB aggiunto ad NAA provoca invece una attivazione della radicazione alla dose minore mentre alla dose maggiore provoca un aumento del numero di radici per espianto radicato. Le osservazioni istologiche di questi espianti inoltre hanno messo in evidenza un aumento dei nuclei cribrovascolari considerabili come probabili "focus" di abbozzi radicali neoformati. The soakage water of two vine rootstock cuttings with different rhizogenic capacity, have been tested on "in vitro" cultures of Helianthus tuberosus, var. Violet de Rennes, rhizome tissues which form roots only in the presence of auxins. We have placed in evidence that the liofilised diffusate of both soaking waters on their own do not promote root formation, the presence of auxin-like substances in quantities sufficiently relevant for this test, seems therefore unlikely. The liofilised disusate of 140R added to NAA reduced the average number of roots and altered their morphological aspects (hypertrophie roots). The liofilised diffusate of 5BB added to NAA activates root formation at the smallest dose whilst at the highest dose it increases the number of roots per explant. Histological observations of the explants have placed in evidence an increase of cribrovascular nuclei wich are to be considered probably as "focus" of neoformed root primordia.

Results of a research carried out in the Venetian Region on the effect of tap-root diameter, harvesting time and temperature on chicory production (Cichorium intybus L. cv. "Variegato di Castelfranco") during bleaching are presented. Two harvesting times (29-1-1970 and 3-3-1970), three tap-root sizes ( lower than 15 mm, between 15 and 20 mm, higher than 20 mm), and three temperature regimes (10  0,5; 15  1,5; 20  1,5 C) were compared. 42878174|Dopo un rapido esame dei principali fattori condizionanti la meccanizzazione della raccolta degli agrumi, vengono descritte le diverse soluzioni, a meccanizzazione sia integrata e sia integrale, sino ad ora studiate ed utilizzate, dalle quali se ne evidenziano le prospettive ed i limiti d'impiego. Nella raccolta meccanica integrata, si richiede il ricorso a carri raccolta a "piattaforme elevatrici". I maggiori problemi che queste macchine sollevano riguardano, soprattutto, il limitato incremento di produttivit della manodopera (al massimo del 25-30%, rispetto alla raccolta con scale) e, specie per quelle a piattaforma individuale, il forte investimento di capitale per addetto. Nella raccolta meccanica integrale, attualmente rivolta solo alla produzione per l'industria, l'orientamento prevalente  rappresentato dal sistema a "scuotimento", per inerzia o per correre d'aria pulsante. Nel primo caso, i migliori risultati (1,0-1,3 t/h di prodotto raccolto, con efficacia d'intervento pari al 70-80% della produzione), si sono ottenuti realizzando uno scuotimento alle branche a grande ampiezza (10-12 cm) ed a bassa frequenza (2,5-3,3 Hz). Il sistema di scuotimento per corrente d'aria pulsante, invece, ha fornito le migliori prestazioni (3-4 t/h di prodotto raccolto con efficacia d'intervento del 70% circa della produzione), con frequenza di 1,0-1,3 Hz e con velocit dell'aria di 180-200 km/h. Nella meccanizzazione delle operazioni complementari alla raccolta, infine, il ricorso alla superpalettizzazione sembra offrire, come  gi avvenuto nel settore della frutticoltura, interessanti e valide prospettive, cio sensibile riduzione dell'impiego di manodapera e scarsa, se non nulla, incidenza dei danni al prodotto. After a rapid examination of the main factors conditioning the mechanization of citrus harvesting, the different solutions are described which have so far been studied and utilized, both integrant and for integral mechanization, together with their prospects and limitations of use. In integrant mchanical harvesting, it is necessary to use to a man (multi-man) positioners machine. The major problems that these machines raise concern, above all, the limited increase of labour productivity (at maximum 25-30% compared with harvesting with ladders) and, especially for those with man positioner, the high capital investment for operator. In integral mechanical harvesting, at present carried out only on industrial production, the "shaking" system, either by inerting or by pulsating air currents, is the most used. In the first case, the best results (1.0-1.3 t/h of harvested product, with efficiency equal to 70-80% of the production) were obtained by shaking the limbs, at a wide amplitude (10-12 cm) at a low frequency (2.5-3.3 Hz). Shaking with the pulsation air current system, however, gave the best performace (3-4 t/h of harvested product with efficiency equal to approximately 70% of the production) with frequencies of 1.0-1.3 Hz and an air speed of 180-200 Km/h. Finally, in the mechanization of operations complementary to harvesting, resorting to "bulk-harvesting" seems to offer good and interesting prospects. As has already been found in fruit-growing, there is a considerable reduction in the use of labour and very slight, if any, damage to the product.

42878177|Viene descritto uno studio teso a chiarire le modificazioni anatomiche che si verificarlo alla base delle talee legnose di pesco durante il processo di radicazione. Il lavoro, condotto su materiale della Cv. "Fertilia" moltipllcato con la tecnica dei sacchetti di polietilene, descrive una alterazione che avviene a carico del tessuto legnoso neoformato, con conseguente formazione di gomme. Vengono inoltre descritti iniziazione e sviluppo dei primordi radicali. Dall'esame anatomico non sembra esistano influenze negative della gommosi su insorgenza e sviluppo delle radici avventizie. An anatomical investigation was carried out on "Fertilia" peach cultivar hardwood cuttings, propagated by means of polyethylene bags. The research work deals with some peculiar aspects of the anatomical changes occurring at the base of cuttings during propagation. A gummous degeneration of the cell walls, usually occurring during the first week of propagation to the embryonic wood cells, is observed. Such degeneration, after the destruction of most of the newly formed woody tissue, can be seen as a series of cavities surrounding the central cylinder, being only the main medullary rays respected by the degeneration. After reaching a maximum width, the cavities cease to expand, thus allowing the new wood cells to survive and differentiate; according to the above, such degeneration is not believed to be responsible for the low rate of survival which occurs to rooted cuttings when transplanted. The initiation and development of root primordia are also described. In both cases a large variability was noted for time and mode of development of the phenomena.

From the photographic documentation it is possible to see that the exine sculpturing presents some characters never been described up to now, the study of which should be amplified to decide their future application as a diagnostic element in the recognition of the varieties.
42878183|In 1975 and 1976 we made a comparative study between drip irrigation and the traditional basin irrigation in a citrus area of western Sicily. Climatic and soil conditions of this area are typical of the Sicilian citrus industry: hot, dry climate, red Mediterranean soil. The cultivar tested was the mandarin, " Avana di Palermo ". In 1975, during each two-week period of the dry season (May to October) all experimental plots were irrigated until they had received 700 m/ha of water. Four plots were drip irrigated with different numbers of drippers (one or two) and different periods of water delivery. A fifth plot was basin irrigated. Two of the drip plots received continuous irrigation (up to 700 m/ha) while the other two were irrigated a few hours per day. Since some cases of root rot occurred in the drip plots irrigated continuously, the plan was slightly modified in 1976: in these plots the amount of water was reduced to 80% (560 m/ha) and all 4 drip plots were watered only a few hours each day. The agronomical results did not seem to show appreciable differences in yield, either quantitatively or qualitatively, among the plots, even though the hydrological results showed a clear difference in the soil moisture pattern between drip and basin irrigated plots. As it was presupposed, drip irrigation caused persistence of soil moisture distributed according to the location of the drippers, whereas basin irrigation showed the usual temporal variability in moisture within wide ranges. In una zona agrumicola della Sicilia occidentale si  svolta nel corso degli anni 1975 e 1976, una prova di confronto tra l'irrigazione " a goccia " ed il tradizionale metodo " a conca ". Le caratteristiche pedoclimatiche della zona sono tipiche della agrumicoltura siciliana: clima caldo arido, terra rossa mediterranea. Specie oggetto della prova  il mandarino cv. " Avana di Palermo ". Lo schema sperimentale adottato per il primo anno di osservazioni (1975) ha previsto quattro parcelle irrigate " a goccia ", diversificate per il numero di gocciolatoi per pianta (1 o 2) e per i tempi di erogazione idrica (2 parcelle sottoposte ad erogazione di 24/24 ore per periodi continui durante il turno e le rimanenti due ad erogazione limitata ad alcune ore del giorno per tutti i 14 giorni del turno). Il volume di adacquamento stagionale adottato sia nelle parcelle irrigate con il sistema " a goccia " che in quelle irrigate " a conca "  stato pari a 700 m/ha. Detto schema  stato, nel secondo anno di prove (1976) parzialmente modificato. Essendosi, infatti, verificati nelle 2 parcelle irrigate 24/24 ore casi di marciume radicale, si  ridotto il volume di adacquamento all' 80% (560 m/ha) e le somministrazioni idriche si sono limitate, per tutte e quattro le parcelle, ad alcune ore del giorno per la durata del turno irriguo. I risultati delle osservazioni di carattere agronomico non sembrano evidenziare apprezzabili differenze, sia per gli aspetti quantitativi che qualitativi della produzione, tra le diverse tesi, anche se le osservazioni di carattere idrologico hanno evidenziato una netta diversificazione del regime della umidit del suolo tra le parcelle irrigate " a goccia " e le parcelle irrigate " a conca ". Precisamente, l'irrigazione " a goccia " ha determinato una persistenza nel tempo, per altro prevedibile, di contenuti idrici nel terreno con distribuzione nello spazio in rapporto alla ubicazione dei gocciolatoi laddove con l'irrigazione " a conca " si  rilevata la consueta variabilit temporale dei suddetti contenuti idrici entro ampi intervalli.

42878185|Si riportano i risultati ottenuti nel confronto di quattro diversi substrati e cio: 1/2 torba + 1/2 sabbia, torba, agrilit e 1/3 torba + 2/3 agrilit nella propagazione per talea apicale mediante la tecnica della nebulizzazione del clone " Gallissoniensis " della Magnolia grandiflora L. Alcuni trattamenti con sostanze rizogene si sono mostrati efficaci, in determinate epoche, nello stimolare la radicazione. The high contribution of the propagation price to the total production price or ornamental trees stimulates the search for commercially more profitable propagation methods. Research on the cuttings propagation of " Picea Abies excelsa Oblendorffii " (PAEO) and " Juniperus virginiana Skirocket " (JVS) has been carried out. Cuttings of PAEO show best rooting during the winter and also in June and July. Chemical treatment improve the rooting only in a few particular periods of the year.

42878193|Seadless citrus species show constant and abundant crops as opposed to the biennal bearing habit of seeded varieties. The suggestion from the litterature that the peef is responsable for the hormonal control of growth and development in seedless fruit is substained in this paper by discussing several hormone-dependent disordes in orange fruit development. Among them the rough-feel disorder is caused by an increased cell division responsable for an uninterrupted growth of the peel. Kinetine and gibberellins were found to be more abundant in rough over smoth fruit in both components of the peel (albedo and flavedo). Consistently, SADH and CCC treatment 3 weeks after bloom produced smooth fruit. A second disorder, the peel creasing, an enzymatic (pectolytic) degradation of the albedo, may be counteracted by Gibberellin treatment 8-10 mounts before maturation. Finally, the corky spots caused by unelastic tensione of the peel may be overcomed by tratments with 2,4-D. From these experiences appears that the citrus peel represents an interesting biological model whose hormonal balance may be influenced by exogenous growth regulators.
42878194|Over a three year period, a comparative study has been carried out on the cold damage to flower buds of 77 cultivars of peach and nectarine. The observations were made on two of the Bologna University's experimental orchards, one located in a low land near Bologna and the other in a hilly area near Faenza. The two localities differ more with respect to air relative humidity rather than winter low temperature, with the land zone being much more humid. Cold damage was quite a bit greater during the year in which low temperatures occured early in autumn (as low as  5 C and  7 C in November). This damage was especially significant in the lowland area for cultivars having a long growing period in the season. Likewise, damage was caused by late frosts in March-April, especially in the hilly area for cultivars which begin growth early in Spring. For these reasons, the classification of the cultivars into 3 groups based on their resistance to cold damage (>25%, 25-55% and >55% flower bud drop) is worthwhile only for these particular climatic conditions. In general, in the land area, where cold damage was greater than in the hilly area, peach was more resistant than nectarine, whereas, the opposite behavior was observed in the hilly area. Among the less resistant cultivars (> 55% flower bud drop) were the nectarines, " Armking ", " Early Sungrand ", " Fairlane ", " Fantasia ", " Flamekist ", " Flavortop ", " Mayred ", " Moon Grand ", " Stark Red Gold ", etc. and the peaches, " Early Coronet ", " Flamecrest ", " Merriam ", " Merrill Gem Free ", " Compact Redhaven ", " Cresthaven ", " Springbrite ", " Tufts ", etc. The possible relations between morphological evolution and physiological state of the buds were discussed with respect to resistance to cold damage.
42878195|Sono state messe a confronto due tecniche di incrocio nel pesco, facendo uso del gene marcatore foglia rossa Gr, dominante su foglia verde gr, allo scopo di verificare la possibilit di eliminare qualsiasi tipo di isolatore del fiore nell'impollinazione controllata. Con l'asportazione parziale dei petali e degli stami, l'inquinamento, probabilmente dovuto ad auto ed eteroimpollinazione,  molto elevato, per cui, tale tecnica  da scartare. Pu essere presa in considerazione, invece, la tecnica basata sulla asportazione totale della corolla e degli stami specialmente nel caso in cui, i semenzali di incrocio, vadano soggetti a selezione per un carattere che possa servire anche da marcatore e consenta di eliminare gli eventuali semenzali inquinanti. Il metodo non pu ritenersi valido per studi di genetica. With the aim to ascertain the possibility of eliminating bagging in controlled pollination two breeding techniques are compared in peach using the marker gene Red leaf Gr. With partial removal of petals and stamens, the contamination, probably due to self and cross pollination, is very high and for this reason the technique is rejected. The technique based on the total removal of the corolla and stamens can be taken into consideration, especially where a known dominant gene capable of easy identification in young seedlings is being used in crossing and any accidentally out-pollinated plants will be automatically excluded in the seedling selection. This technique is not valid for genetic studies.
42878196|La analisi delle trasformazioni del substrato associate alle somministrazioni di sostanze minerali ha condotto alla osservazione di un effetto specifico del pH nella rizogenesi di talee di fagiolo mungo. In particolare, quando soluzioni minerali tamponate a diversi livelli di acidit sono state immesse nel substrato di crescita delle piante madri  stato osservato un massimo di radicazione delle talee da esse derivate, coincidente con il pH 6,5. Una risposta analoga  stata anche ottenuta somministrando le stesse soluzioni direttamente alle talee. La coincidenza della risposta nei due sistemi suggerisce una azione diretta del pH delle soluzioni, al di l di possibili fenomeni permseiettivi delle membrane radicali. Ulteriori analisi hanno infine chiarito che il pH esercita una azione specifica ed indipendente dalla natura nutrizionale delle somministrazioni.  stato infatti possibile osservare la presenza dell'effetto pH usando tamponi non nutrizionali (Na, Ba) ed organici (citrato di sodio). Inoltre l'effetto pH persiste a concentrazioni bassissime (10 - 10 molare) e perfino quando i trattamenti vengono confinati alla incubazione dei semi da cui saranno prodotte le piante madri. In conclusione, l'indipendenza dell'effetto pH dalle variabili sperimentali introdotte (elementi, formulazioni e concentrazioni), la costanza della sua azione in sistemi differenziati (semi, piante madri e talee) e la natura non nutrizionale di tale stimolo (risposta a dosi bassissime e ad elementi non nutrizionali) induce a proporre l'esistenza di una funzione regolativa del rapporto H+/OH nella rizogenesi del fagiolo mungo. Nutrient solutions (N, P, K) supplied either to the stock plant or to the cuttings enhanced root regeneration in mung bean (Phaseolus aureus, Robb) cuttings. The activity was strictly pH dependent with maximum response associated with pH 6,5. This pH-dependent effect prevailed over variations due to chemicals or concentrations. However, when nitrogen was supplied to cuttings, a different response was observed, with NH being highly effective and NO ineffective. The stimulatory function of pH was also observed in conditions which seem to exclude a nutritional role of the elements supplied. In fact, a significant response to pH was present at levels of 10 molar concentration of supplied chemicals (equivalent to 0,4 ppm K of the cutting fresh wt). The effect was also reproduced by using non-nutritional elements (Na, Ba) or an organic buffer (Na citrate). The stimulatory function of pH was finally mantained when mineral solutions where supplied to the seed (from which stock plants were derived) during the imbibition stage. Significant (P = 0,001) Na effects were observed in this case up to 10 molar (about 0,3 ppb of the cutting fresch wt). A regulatory role of pH in root regeneration is proposed based on these findings.

42878202|Researches have ascertained the possibility of breaking dormancy and delaying bloom by application of synthetic growth regulators. Neverthless, the use of growth regulators has its limitations, because of difficult timing of treatment, erratic results and phytotossic effects. Researches recently carried out both in U.S.A., and in Italy on the overhead sprinkling irrigation have shown the possibility to increase the accumulation of Chilling Units (C.U.) for meeting the rest requirements of fruit trees and to decrease the Growing Degree Hours (GDH) accumulation for delaying the fruit bud development. Author reviews the present state of knowledge on this subject and discusses the reliability and feasibility of the overhead sprinkling method in comparison with the use of growth regulators, crioprotectants and freeze protection equipments.

42878208|Barbatelle di 4 cultivar di olivo (Carolea, Frangivento, Leccino e Coratina) trapiantate da 15 giorni in vasetti posti in serre di indurimento, sono state trattate per via fogliare 2 volte, con un intervallo di 14 giorni, con gibberellato di potassio alle concentrazioni di 50, 250 e 750 ppm di principio attivo. L'azione, se pure con differenziazioni tra le cultivar,  stata proporzionale alle concentrazioni. La dose pi alta ha causato inoltre una riduzione del diametro dei germogli ed una riduzione dell'area della lamina fogliare. L'intensit e la qualit dell'azione sulle singole coppie di gemme inserite sulla barbatella sembra esser condizionata dalla loro posizione (basale, mediana o apicale) e dalla presenza di foglie. The leaves of rooted cuttinngs of 4 olive cultivars (Carolea, Frangivento, Leccino and Coratina) obtained under mist, 15 days after transplanting in pots and kept in a glasshouse, were treated twice with Potassium Gibberellate at 50, 250, and 750 ppm. The treatment delayed bud opening and determined an increase in the new shoots' growth derived by a greater internode development and an increase of node formation. The action, although unequal in the different cultivars was proportional to the concentration. The highest dose caused a reduction of the shoots' diameter and leaf area. The intensity and quality of the action on the single pair of buds on the rooted cuttings seemed to be conditioned by their position (basal, median and apical) and by the presence of leaves.

42878210|La constatazione della presenza, in piante di " Leccino ", " Frantoio " e " Maurino ", di olive aventi differente peso e diverso contenuto in olio da correlare con una diversa illuminazione dei rametti sui quali erano inserite, ci ha suggerito di saggiare l'effetto dell'ombreggiamento di piante di " Coratina " e " Leccino " sulla loro fruttificazione. Le piante, appena dopo l'impollinazione fino alla fioritura dell'anno successivo, erano coperte con uno o con due strati di rete nera fino a 40 cm da terra. La illuminazione media delle piante controllo, di quelle con uno o con due strati di copertura era di circa 36.000, 6.000 e 1.300 lux rispettivamente. In queste condizioni l'allegagione era di 0,602; 0,180 e 0,071 drupe per mignola. I frutti cresciuti in carenza di luce erano piccoli e con basso contenuto in olio. I germogli delle piante ombreggiate, pur avendo una lunghezza quasi simile a quelli delle piante controllo, non avevano alcun fiore nei confronti dei controlli in cui si riscontravano 1,32 e 1,59 mignole per nodo rispettivamente per il " Leccino " e per la " Coratina ". Pertanto le riduzioni della illuminazione nelle dosi utilizzate nella prova sono responsabili di scarsa allegagione dei frutti, di limitato sviluppo di questi e della inibizione della induzione fiorale. Tali situazioni, di carenza di luce, possono verificarsi in zone di chiome di olivi condotti irrazionalmente o troppo densi. The observation of olives on " Leccino ", " Frantoio " and " Coratina ", with different weight and oil content correlated to the light exposure of the shoots to which the fruit were attached, led us to test the effect of light exposure on the fruitfulness of " Coratina "+ " Leccino " trees. After the 1976 pollination till the flowering of 1977, the trees were covered with one or two layers of black net. The average light exposure of control trees, of those with one or two layers of cover was about 36,000, 6,000 and 1,300 lux respectively. Under these conditions the fruit set was of 0,602; 0,180 and 0,071 fruits per blossom. The fruits grown in darkness were small and with low oil content. The shoots of shaded trees were about the same lenght as those of the control trees and had no flowers respect to controls, where, there were 1,32 and 1,59 blossoms per node, for " Leccino " and " Coratina " respectively. Therefore, the reductions of light exposure used in this trial are responsable for the limited fruit set, for the scarce growth of these and for the inhibition of flower formation. Light deficiency occurs in zones of irrational grown or too dense olive orchards.

Nei tre ambienti si  operato con metodologie sperimentali omogenee ed impiegando la stessa cultivar (" Golden Delicious "). L'irrigazione  iniziata nelle tre localit verso la met di febbraio, quando prove condotte in cella climatica indicavano come superata la dormienza nei tre ambienti climatici. Il livello termico al di sopra del quale si  irrigato  stato fissato a 8 C, la durata dell'irrigazione  variata tra 20" e 40" e gli intervalli sono stati automaticamente regolati in funzione delle condizioni climatiche. La piena fioritura degli alberi trattati (F)  avvenuta con un ritardo di 12 giorni a Bolzano e di circa 14 giorni a Pisa e Verona. Un simile ritardo  stato ottenuto a Verona anche sulla cv. " Granny Smith ". A Pisa le piante sottoposte al trattamento climatizzante circa 1 mese prima della fioritura, hanno presentato un ritardo uguale a quello delle piante che erano state irrigate per l'intero periodo (18/2 - 27/4). Specifiche osservazioni condotte sia a Bolzano che a Verona hanno messo in evidenza una minore produttivit degli alberi irrigati accompagnata da una maggiore pezzatura dei frutti e da una loro minore rugginosit. A jointed research program was carried out in Bolzano, Verona and Pisa provinces to comparatively test the evaporative-cooling effect of overhead irrigation to delay bloom in  Golden Delicious " apple trees. Irrigation was given from mid February to end of April when temperature was above 8 C. The watering-interval cycle was automatically regulated to match the evaporation rate. Full bloom (F) was delayed 12 days in Bolzano and 14 days in Pisa and Verona. A similar delay was also obtained in Verona on the " Granny Smith " variety. In Pisa, the effect of an irrigation treatment limited to the month of April matched the response obtained by irrigating for the entire period. Fruit production was reduced in the irrigated plots along with an increased fruit size and reduced russeting.
42878212|Sono state condotte indagini allo scopo di confrontare l'efficacia diradante dell'Amchem 69380 (75 e 150 ppm) e del CGA 15281 (150 e 300 ppm) rispetto a quella dell'Ethephon (75 e 150 ppm). I trattamenti sono stati effettuati su piante della cv. " Cardinal " in due epoche distinte e cio quando i frutticini avevano una lunghezza media di 15 e 25 mm. L'Amchem 69380 ha presentato la pi elevata azione diradante avendo fornito alla concentrazione di 75 ppm. una cascola di frutti analoga a quella rilevata con gli altri due prodotti somministrati alla dose di 150 ppm. L'effetto del CGA 15281  stato simile o di poco superiore a quello dell'Ethephon a 150 ppm. Nei confronti del diradamento manuale una soddisfacente cascola di frutti  stata rilevata nelle tesi con Ethephon a 150 ppm e con Amchem 69380 a 75 ppm somministrati il 5 ed il 15 maggio e con CGA 15281, ad entrambe le dosi, il 5 maggio. Anche l'Amchem 69380 ed il CGA 15281, come l'Ethephon, hanno influenzato negativamente la abscissione delle foglie e le dimensioni finali dei frutti. Con i trattamenti della II epoca i tre prodotti hanno manifestato un'azione diradante pi rapida: gi 10 giorni dopo le somministrazioni  stato possibile individuare abbastanza precisamente i frutti che sarebbero successivamente abscissi. Trials have been carried out to evaluate the thinning ability of two ethylene-releasing compounds, Amchem 69380 (75 and 150 ppm) and CGA 15281 (150 and 300 ppm), in comparison with Ethephon (75 and 150 ppm). Trees of the peach variety ' Cardinal ' were treated when the mean fruit length was 15 and 25 mm. Amchem 69380 showed a higher thinning effect, and at a concentration of 75 ppm gave a similar fruit drop as Ethephon and CGA 15281 at 150 ppm. These last two treatments influenced fruit drop to a comparable level. A satisfactory fruit drop, similar to the hand thinned treatment, was obtained with Ethephon at 150 ppm, and with Amchem 69380 at 75 ppm applied at 15 and 25 mm fruit length and with CGA 15281 at 150 and 300 ppm, applied at 15 mm fruit length. All three compounds increased leaf drop and reduced final fruit size. The thinning effect of the three compounds was more rapid when the applications were made at 25 mm of fruit length.

Damages to the sprouts and to the fruitlets were observed, due to the perduring of the treatment in the late stages of bud development.

42878215|Gli AA., dopo una rapida rassegna dei principali lavori concernenti la influenza della bagnatura sulla radicazione di talee di specie diverse, riferiscono di una prova volta a verificare l'influenza di pH diversi dell'acqua di bagnatura sulla radicazione di talee di olivo cv "Frantoio  in nebulizzazione. Le talee sono state trattate o meno con IBA a 4000 ppm dopo una bagnatura di 24 h con acqua mantenuta a pH 5,5, 7 e 8,5. Il trattamento con IBA aumenta la percentuale di radicazione, il numero medio di radici per talea e la lunghezza media dei germogli. La bagnatura ai pH differenziati modifica, oltre i parametri precedenti, anche la lunghezza media delle radici. La parte grafica  stata eseguita da P.L. Nannini. The Authors, after a brief review of the main works concerning the influence of steeping in water on the rooting of cuttings of different species, refer about an investigation on the effect of steeping in water with different pH on the rooting of "Frantoio" cuttings under mist. The cuttings, 100 for each trial, were treated or left untreated with IBA at 4000 p.p.m. after 24 hr's steeping in distilled water kept at a pH 5,5 -7 and 8,5 with phospate buffer (KHPO+NaHPO). IBA treatment increases the rooting percentage, the average number of roots per cutting and the average shoot's length. Steeping at different pH affects the average root length as well as the above parameters. Steeping in water at pH 7 in particular, affects negatively almost all the aspects of growth and rooting compared to the pH 5,5 - 8,5 and "non steeped" treatments. The combination of IBA at 4000 p.p.m. treatment with steeping at pH 8,5 has a positive effect on all the parameters under observation and particularly on rooting percentage and shoots growth.
42878222|The purpose of the present paper is to examine the economic problems connected with the growing of cling peaches in Northern Italy. After examining the EEC market characteristics of canned peaches, a detailed picture of the supply situation in some of the main producer countries is given, with particular reference to the production costs for cling peaches, the trend of prices paid to the producers and the growth of the canned peach exportation. 42878223|Starting from 1971 a breeding programme has been carried out with the objective to obtain new cultivare allowing to make wider the processing period, which, in the Po Valley (Emilia-Romagna), covers about sixty days. 42878224|A survey of the bulk experimental results reached in Italy on the chemical and mechanical peach fruit thinning has been carried out with the aim to single out some general patterns which could be usefully applied to the clingstone peach industry. As far as concern chemical thinning, fundamentally based on CEPA sprays, low concentration (30-60 ppm) have proved to give the best results. With higer concentrations phytotoxic effects and remarkable fruit drop can be expected. The best time for CEPA application seems to be when the fruits diameter average is 20-25 mm or 40-45 days after the full bloom. Mechanical thinning has supplied better results than chemichal, but its efficiency has proved to be influenced by the shaker type, the training system and the method of pruning.
42878225|The effectiveness of a self-propelled mono-unit harvester (prototype CNR BO 75/2) has been tested with cling peaches, in relation to different training systems. A recovery of about 85% of the total fruits was obtained and the fruits harvested proved to be suitable for processing. The study has shown that the "californian vase", the "topped pyramid" and, to a less extent, the "4 scaffolds vase", are preferable to the traditional peach tree forms even when these were adapted for mechanical harvesting. Among the tree forms studied, the "topped pyramid" seems to be the most suitable to supply an high harvesting rate with a reduced damage when fruits fall from the tree. The percentage of the fruit falling out the frame was somewhat high because of the not proportional ratio "frame area/canopy size." Trees trained to "californian vase", by using a pruning technique including summer pruning, proved to be suitable for planting with a reduced inter-row distance.
42878226|This paper reports the results of harvesting trials made with a new single-unit machine on seven clingstone peach cultivars. Tests have shown that, for all the varieties concerned, the quality of mechanically harvested fruits was acceptable in terms of both maturity and damage. The average of fruits susceptible to be profitably used for processing was 93% with picking and 80% for mechanical harvesting. The major loss of product in mechanical harvest, compared with hand harvest, was caused by undersize fruits (8,7%) and by unharvested fruits (5,6%) hat is those that remained on the tree of fell before harvesting. Losses caused by fruit injury were very low (1,4%), because most of the injured fruits that cannot be processed as canned halves, can be used for making salad with a modest increase of manpower in the cannery line. Were mechanical harvesting has really shown its big advantage was in the working rate, that was to 10  14 times higher than that of hand picking. In conclusion, the harvester designed has proved to be very effective, and mechanical harvesting very competitive with hand picking.

42878234|Chemical and mechanical fruit thinning have been carried out on freestone ("Dixired", "Redhaven", "Southland" and "Hale sel. Moreschini") and on clingstone ("Dixon", "Coronado") peach trees. Treatments have been done with CEPA (50 ppm), CGA 15281 (150 and 300 ppm) and Morphactin EMD-IT (40 ppm). CEPA has been applied 23 days AFB and at 48-50-55 davs AFB (same time as hand thinning). The CGA 15281 and the Morphactin have been applied only at the time of the hand thinning. On "Southland" variety some trees sprayed with CEPA have been thinned further also by hand in order to obtain a better effect. On this variety with all the treatments the fruit number has been reduced nearly to that of hand thinned trees. Instead the successive hand thinning done on the CEPA sprayed trees at hand thinning time has strongly reduced fruit number and the total production per tree. Good CEPA results have been obtained on "Dixired" and "Redhaven" peach; but, on the contrary, unsatisfactory results have been obtained on "Hale sel. Moreschini" variety. Interesting possibilities of CEPA application have also been obtained on cling peach in Southern Italy. The results obtained with the CGA 15281 and the Morphactin, on the contrary, have been unsatisfactory because of the phytotoxicity and negative influence on fruit size. Regarding mechanical thinning, very interesting results have been obtained on all the varieties using a limb-shaker.

In the following years the variety trial has been improved with new cultivars. Starting from 1970 until 1977, except 1971, the incidence of the desease on 147 cultivars was recorded. The observations were made in spring (end of April, beginning of May), when the symptoms of the desease on young shoots are more evident. The sensitivity, determined by visual estimate, was scored from 0 to 5. To emphasize the differences among the cultivars, the desease control sprays during and immediately after bloom were not carried out. Tight correlations between bloom intensity and Monilia sensitivity and between blooming time and desease symptoms were found; a less strong, but statistically significant correlation, between the desease and rainfall in the week following the first 7 days after blossoming was also pointed out.

42878237|Prove precedenti avevano messo in evidenza la possibilit di ridurre significativamente l'incidenza della rugginosit della mela Golden Delicious, trattando con gibberelline i frutticini nelle prime fasi di sviluppo. Si  intrapresa, quindi, una sperimentazione pi ampia per individuare il tipo di gibberellina, il dosaggio, l'epoca e le modalit di trattamento pi efficaci per il contenimento della rugginosit. Si  confermato che la miscela di gibberelline A-A,  pi efficace della GA nel ridurre la rugginosit. L'epoca e il numero dei trattament hanno una notevole influenza: i migliori risultati si sono avuti con sei trattamenti settimanali a cominciare dalla caduta dei petali, cio con trattamenti eseguiti per tutto il periodo di massima sensibilit all'alterazione. On the ground of previous trials showing that it is possible to reduce russeting of Golden Delicious by GA treatments on fruitlets, it was tried to select the most effective type of GA, dose, time and number of treatments. GA, was tested at 100, 200, 400 ppm; GA/, that in previous trials appeared more effective, was tested at 50, 100, 200 ppm. The six gibberellin solutions were applied on six branches of the same tree according to the schedule that appears in tab. 1. Each group of treatments was replicated on ten trees. All fruits of the 360 treated branches were picked at ripening and scored for russet with scores from 0 (smooth) to 9 (completely russet). In the same way were scored all other not treated fruits of each tree. Taking as 100 the mean russet score of not treated fruits, the percent russet score of each treated fruit was computed. The results (tab. 4 and 5) show that only GA / significantly reduced russeting; greatest reduction was obtained with four or six weekly treatments of GA / beginning from petal fall. These results suggest that, to prevent russet, it is necessary to keep high the GA content of fruitlets during all the period of susceptibility to russet.

Roma selezione Istituto, in vista della raccolta meccanica. Nessuna differenza si  riscontrata negli altri dati biologici, produttivi e qualitativi presi in esame. Le varie interazioni densit  azoto sono risultate tutte non significative. In order to achieve an economical mechanical harvesting of tomatoes, an experiment was carried out during two years (1975-76) in the Sele river plain (Salerno). Three plant pupulations (40.000 -60.000 -80.000 plants/ha) and three nitrogen levels (60 -120 -180 Kg/ha) were tested on cv.  Roma . Once-over harvest yields were greatly affected by the plant population. As this increased, the production of ripe fruits per hectar increased, while the mean weight of fruits, the production of ripe fruits per plant and number of fruits per plant decreased. Differences in the green, turned and cull fruits and in some qualitative characteristics did not result owing to the plant density. As to the nitrogen fertilization, the yield of ripe fruit was increased when the fertilizer applied rose from 60 to 120 Kg/ha of N; no difference was found between 120 and 180 Kg/ha of N. The turned fruits yield was increased progressively by the doses of nitrogen applied; the highest dose increased also the production of cull fruits per nctar The fertilizer applications did not influence other biological, productive and qualitative data. No significant interaction between plant density and nitrogen fertilization levels was found.
42878243|Si riferiscono i risultati di una sperimentazione biennale effettuata in provincia di Salerno al fine di accertare l'influenza esplicata dalla concimazione minerale sulla resa del pomodoro coltivato in serra riscaldata. Sono state confrontate tre dosi di N (0-100 e 200 Kg/ha), tre di PO (0-120 e 240 Kg/ha) e due di KO (0 e 100 Kg/ha) combinate tra loro in modo fattoriale. La produzione complessiva  aumentata linearmente al crescere delle dosi di fosforo fino ai livelli pi elevati sperimentati. La concimazione azotata, alla dose di 100 Kg/ha, ha aumentato significativamente le rese dell'I 1% rispetto al controllo; con il livello maggiore, per, l'incremento non  apparso proporzionale alla dose somministrata. La dose di 200 Kg/ha di risultata inefficace in assenza di concimazione fosfatica o con 120 Kg/ha di PO mentre ha esaltato la produzione in misura rimarchevole in presenza di 240 Kg/ha di PO. Nessuna efficacia sulla produzione totale ha mostrato la concimazione potassica che neppure in combinazione cori gli altri due elementi ha fatto riscontrare effetti statisticamente apprezzabili. Ci in relazione, probabilmente, alla elevata dotazione del terreno in potassio assimilabile. Sulla precocit di maturazione hanno influito favorevolmente il fosforo ed il potassio; la concimazione azotata, invece, sembra aver esplicato un effetto negativo al riguardo. In order to obtain information on manuring tomatoes, fertilizer trials were carried out in heated greenhouse in Southern Italy during 1974-1976. Three levels of nitrogen (0-100-200 Kg/ha N) were tested in factorial combination with three levels of phosphorus (0-100-240 Kg/ha PO ) and two levels of potassium (0-100 Kg/ha KO). Total yield increased linearly with increasing rates of P up to the highest level applied. N-fertilization at 100 Kg/ha increased significantly yields by 11% compared with the controls, but at higher levels the increase was not proportional to the dose applied. Highly significant positive interactions were found bertween nitrogen and phosphorus; the response to one nutrient was greater when the other nutrient was not limiting. Since the soils were rich in available potash the effect of K fertilization on total yield was not significant, but the early yield was increased. The ripening was delayed by the highest levels of N and hastended by P supply.
42878244|Nel corso di una sperimentazione per individuare il tipo di gibberellina, l'epoca e le modalit di applicazione pi favorevoli per il controllo della rugginosit, vennero notati e rilevati effetti collaterali della gibberellina sulla forma e sulla partenocarpia dei frutti di Golden Delicious. The experimental design for reducing russeting considered treatments with GA 3 at 100, 200 and 400 ppm and with GA_ at 50, 100, 200 ppm. in different times according to the schedule reported in tab. 1. At ripening, all treated and untreated fruits of each plant were picked: longitudinal and transversal diameters were measured and number of seeds of each fruit was counted. Both GA and the mixture GA-GA  sprayed on developing fruitlets after blooming caused significant lenghtening of fruits (tab. 3), increased fruit set and induced development of parthenocarpic fruits (tab. 4). All effects seemed to depend more on number and time of treatments than on concentration of solutions.

Studies on the population dynamics of Ditylenchus dipsaci (Khn) Filipjev on strawberry (Fragaria vesca L.) have been carried out in Basilicata in 1973-1974. The nematode population densities increase at first in October-November, after a summer diapause, and reach the maximum level in February-March. Methyl bromide, at the rate of 60 g/m, Dazomet at 500 Kg/ha, and 1,3 dicloropropene at 200 1/ha gave yield increases of 64, 55 and 45% respectively compared with the control. 42878246|The purpose of this study, carried out in Umbria, (Central Italy) on the cv. Moraiolo, was to find out the stage fructification-cycle corresponding to the maximum amount of extractable oil and to test the opportunity of the ethylenepromotors in olive harvesting. The results obtained showed that the best harvesting period lies within the range of 15-20 days: this period can be detected by a recurrent evaluation of a number of parameters such as the fruit drop and the oil-yield. Moreover the study allowed to conclude that, regardless of the harvesting-time, manual harvesting is more profitable than the integrated harvesting with Alsol and CEPA. The harvesting cost has been strongly affected by the cost of the fruit-drop inducing substances and by the pre-harvesting fruit-drop they determined. These phytoregulators however have been effective in reducing the removal force of fruits; their use could be an alternative to manual harvesting, consistently with the price, in those areas where olive crop can still be profitably exploited but are not liable to mechanical harvesting.

42878253|After a general description of different organs of angiosperm flower, cell wall structure of pollen is described. Microsporgenesis, macrosporogenesis, pollination and fertilization are developed with particular emphasis to their morphology and physiology in fruit trees and the influence of atmospheric conditions. Some problem concerning pollen germination are discussed such as the release of different proteins from cell wall and their implications in selfincompatibility. 42878254|Self-incompatibility, which occurs in more than 250 genera including most of fruit species, is defined as the inability of fertile hermaphrodite seed-plant to produce zygotes after selfing. The positive or negative implicatioons of self-incompatibility are considered, and on establishing the outbreeding, is considered. The various types of self-incompatibility due to the interaction between pollen and pistil, under control either of the haploid (gametophytic sistem) or of the diploid genome (sporophytic system) are considered. The distribution of self-incompatibility among the different fruit species has been reviewed and the distinction has been pointed out between self-incompatibility and other types of sterility. The main methods for overcoming the self-incompatibility barrier and some of the results so far obtained are discussed.

On the olive the ovary sterility is frequent and the physiologic sterility is normal, therefore each cultivar cannot be fertilized by own pollen, but by that of interfertile cultivars, for this purpose the time of cultivar flowering and the results of interfertility with the list of the effective pollinators for each cultivar are carried out. After the fruit set, there are two periods of big fruit drop, depending from nutritional or climate reasons. On this manner the tree adjusts the fruit production to the own productive power. 42878263|La vite  una pianta che non presenta grossi problemi a livello di differenziazione delle gemme, fenomeno influenzato, in particolare, dall'azoto. I problemi posti dalla biologia fiorale della vite sono pertanto numerosi ma non sono insolubili; pi difficile  invece realizzare simultaneamente una fertilit elevata e la qualit dei prodotti. No big problem in generally met in bud morphogenesis of the vine, a phaenomenon largely influenced by nitrogen nutrition. Difficulties may met by anomalous of feminine flowers in the detachment of the calyptra. Such inconveniences may be partly corrected with hormone (benzyladenine) or nutrient (Boron) sprays. Flowers and fruits drop may be reduced with different interventions; mostly reducing vigour, or with mineral nutrient (particularly B or Zn), administration or hormone (benzyladenine and gibberellin) sprays also in order to increase parthenocarpy. Gibberellin may also act as a killing agent of pollen and therefore a thinner, during flowering. Preharvest drop is not frequent in vinegrape but it is very difficult to prevent. Genetical means such as clonal selection and intervarietal crosses, or polyploidy and hybridation at a minor extent, are a frequent for improving fertility. Flowering biology seems therefore concerned with many but not insoluble problems. A bigger difficulty however is met in obtaining both a high fertility and a good quality of the crop.
42878264| stata condotta un'indagine sulla biologia fiorale delle cultivar di olivo da olio pi diffuse in Abruzzo ("Dritta di Moscufo", "Gentile di Chieti", "Moraiolo" e "Leccino"). Dai risultati della prova  emerso che le cultivar esaminate sono autoincompatibili e pertanto, richiedono, per una buona fruttificazione, idonei impollinatori. La "Dritta di Moscufo" e la "Gentile di Chieti" sono interfertili e quest'ultima  risultata, tra le cultivar saggiate, quella con pi spiccate attitudini impollinanti nei confronti della Dritta di Moscufo. Il Leccino ed il Moraiolo sono interincompatibili ma esplicano una buona azione fecondante nei confronti della "Dritta di Moscufo" e della "Gentile di Chieti". Il polline delle cultivar esaminate ha fornito, su prove in laboratorio, buone percentuali di germinazione comprese tra il 35% della Dritta di Moscufo ed il 42% del Leccino. In this paper the results of a study on the flower biology of the cultivars of the most widespread oil olive-trees of Abruzzo ("Dritta di Moscufo", "Gentile di Chieti", "Moraiolo" and "Leccino") are presented. The results have shown that the cultivars studied are self-incompatible and therefore suitable pollinators are needed for a good fruit yield. The "Dritta di Moscufo" and the "Gentile di Chieti" are interfertile; the latter was among the cultivars under study the best pollinator for the "Dritta di Moscufo". The "Leccino" and the "Moraolo" are interincompatible, but they show a good suitability as pollinators for the "Dritta di Moscufo" and the "Gentile di Chieti". The percentage of the flowers with an aborted ovary has been about 10% in the cultivars "Dritta di Moscufo", "Gentile di Chieti" and "Leccino" and 25,9% in the "Moraiolo". The pollen of the cultivars under study has shown good percentages of germination in laboratory-tests, which lie between 35% in the "Dritta di Moseudo" and 42% in the "Leccino". From a practical standpoint the mixture between the cultivars "Dritta di Moscufo" and "Gentile di Chieti" which is possible because of their interfertility is considered to have advantages in connection with the use of labour and of harvesting-machines.

42878271|In questa prova si  indagato sulla vitalit del polline di "Picolit giallo" utilizzando la colorazione di Alexander. This experiment is an inquiry into pollen viability of Vitis vinifera L. cv. "Picolit giallo" using Alexander staining. From results it appeared that the pollen of "Picolit giallo" is viable about 90%, with equal viability to "Tocai friulano", a somewhat inferior viability to "Cabernet franc" and "Corvina veronese", and a somewhat superior viability to "Verduzzo friulano". From this experiment pollen viability appeared to be dependant on the flowering time of the bunch of grapes and not on the origin or whether the inflorescence was covered or not.

42878274|In questo lavoro vengono descritte le principali caratteristiche morfologiche ed istochimiche del tessuto trasmittente stilare del melo. Questa specie presenta uno stigma umido e stilo pieno e la sostanza intercellulare, dove crescono i tubetti pollinici,  formata da proteine e polisaccaridi. La presenza di queste sostanze viene discussa e messa in relazione al fenomeno dell'autoincompatibilit. The main morphological and histochemical features of stylar trasmitting tissue have been analysed in Malus communis. This species shows a wet stigma and a solid style. The stylar transmitting tissue cells ore very rich in organdes. The Rough Endoplasmic Reticulum is particulary abundant; some cisterns of it are dilated and contain weakly electron-dense material. Connection between nuclear ennvelope and RER cisterns have been found. A close relationship between the RER dilated cisterns and the plasma membrane is observed. After histochemical treatments, the stylar intercellular substance (through which the pollen tubes grow) positively reacts to tests for proteins and polysaccharides. The presence of these substances is discussed also in relation with the incompatibility phenomen.
